Te atreves a vivir 3 días de auténtica aventura y emoción por las montañas y bosques del pueblo de Paüls? Esto es lo que te espera en la Trencacims 7000, un desafío para los más valientes, un trail combinado de 3 etapas donde podrás disfrutar de los lugares más emblemáticos de las montañas de Paüls, disfrutar de sus paisajes y de las impresionantes vistas que encontrarás , así como también encontrarás dureza y desnivel, mucho desnivel, estás listo?La primera parada de esta aventura la encontramos viernes tarde y es la Up & Down, de 10km y 750+, combina el Km Vertical Trencacims y un descenso técnico y vertiginoso de vuelta al pueblo. Y para continuar, el plato fuerte de esta Trencacims 7000, el Ultramaratón de las Tierras del Ebro, la prueba reina, de 50km y 4000+, una combinación de belleza y dureza. Y por último, el domingo, la Media Maratón, que también tiene su dificultad, de 23km y 1950+, donde podrás disfrutar de todo tipo de terrenos y sensaciones, vamos !!!
Description in English
Do you dare to live 3 days of authentic adventure and excitement through the mountains and forests of the town of Paüls? This is what awaits you at the Trencacims 7000, a challenge for the bravest, a 3-stage combined trail where you can enjoy the most emblematic places of the Paüls mountains, enjoy their landscapes and the breathtaking views you'll find, As well as you will find hardness and unevenness, a lot of unevenness, are you ready?The first stop of this adventure is found on Friday afternoon and it is the Up & Down, of 10km and 750+, it combines the Vertical Km Trencacims and a technical and vertiginous descent back to the town. And to continue, the strong plate of this Trencacims 7000, the Ultramaratón de las Lands of the Ebro, the proof queen, of 50km and 4000+, a combination of beauty and hardness. And finally, on Sunday, the Media Marathon, which also has its difficulty, 23km and 1950+, where you can enjoy all kinds of lands and sensations, come on!

Prueba reina de Trencacims, la Ultramaratón recorre muchos lugares emblemáticos de las montañas de Paüls, donde el corredor podrá disfrutar de zonas técnicas, subidas difíciles y paisajes excepcionales, 50 kilómetros de pura montaña.
Description in English
Test reigns of Trencacims, the Ultramarathon goes through many emblematic places of the Paüls mountains, where the runner can enjoy technical areas, difficult climbs and exceptional landscapes, 50 kilometers of pure mountain.

Media Maratón de montaña que combina zonas muy duras y técnicas y otras donde el corredor podrá disfrutar de senderos rápidos, la carrera de montaña perfecta.
Description in English
Half mountain marathon that combines very hard and technical areas and others where the runner can enjoy fast trails, the perfect mountain race.

Description in English
Junior race, only for 18-20 years old atheltes

Primer kilómetro vertical de la historia de Trencacims Paüls, que sale del mismo pueblo directo a la Punta de l'Aigua, 4,5km y 750+.
Description in English
First vertical kilometer of the history of Trencacims Paüls, that leaves the same town direct to Punta de l'Aigua, 4,5km and 750+.

THE SDW50 IS A 50 MILE FOOT RACE ALONG THE SOUTH DOWNS WAY NATIONAL TRAIL, BEGINNING IN WORTHING AND FINISHING IN EASTBOURNE. RUNNERS START BY NEGOTIATING SIX MILES OF CHALK FOOTPATHS AND BRIDLEWAYS, CLIMBING UP TO JOIN THE SOUTH DOWNS WAY AT CHANCTONBURY RING. THE REMAINDER OF THE COURSE IS IDENTICAL TO THE FINAL 44 MILES OF THE SDW100 AND REMAINS ON THE SDW UNTIL THE FINAL TURN OFF - BRINGING RUNNERS OUT TO FINISH WITH A LAP OF THE TRACK AT EASTBOURNE. 7TH ANNUAL. FIRST RACE IN THE 2019 50 MILE GRAND SLAM OF FOUR, 50 MILE EVENTS.

Prueba de montaña que transcurre íntegramente por el macizo de Anaga, parte desde el niveldel mar y la cota máxima alcanzada en de 900 mts en la Cruz del Carmen. Desde el inicio enpunta del hidalgo, esta distancia pasa por Chinamada, Carboneras, Taborno, Taganana, Almaciga, Benijos, Chamorga, Lomo las bodegas, Lomo las Casillas, Igueste de San Andres, Bailadero, Afur, Cruz del Carmen, Bejias , Punta Hidalgo.La mayoría del recorrido va por la vertiente norte del macizo donde predominan los fuertes desniveles con bajadas técnicas, barrancos llenos de vegetación costera y muchísima laurisilva.

Prueba que comparte los primeros17km con su hermana mayor (ULTRA), una vez en taborno tomamos elsendero dirección casa Carlos, para entrar a la Dcha por Llano Frio en una zona de extensa laurisilva (3km) que teharán volar los sentidos, uniéndose a partir de aquí con el recorrido de la ULTRA.
Una media maratón de montaña muy exigente, con un continua sube y baja que nos llevaran hasta los caseríos que aún conserva las antiguas casas-cueva del Batan y Bejias.
Un Trail que nos llevará por el sendero que usaban las antiguas gangocheras desde la montaña a la costa, partiendo desde El Batán, hasta Punta del Hidalgo bajando por el Homician.

济南首个50公里越野跑赛事，比赛由第十一届全运会主会场济南市奥体中心出发，线路涵盖高新区、历下区、市中区、历城区、南山区五个行政区域，线路中“山、泉、佛、寺”点缀其中，沿途经过山（青桐山—济南海拔第二高峰、桃花山、黑龙寨、朱凤山、白云山、禹登山、藏龙涧）、泉（斗母泉—济南海拔最高的72名泉、东流泉、白云泉、林汲泉、露华泉）、佛（齐鲁第一大佛—唐代开凿、高9.05米，冠绝齐鲁）、寺（大佛寺、泰山行宫、云台寺、观音寺、乡义寺、般若寺），大小景点10余处。
比赛由济南市奥体中心—第十一届全运会主会场出发，线路贯穿高新区、历下区、市中区、历城区、南山区五个行政区域，线路特点贯穿“山泉佛寺”
Carrera por montaĂąa que transcurre en pleno parque natural de Los Calares del mundo y de la Sima, en Albacete.
Prueba de trail running de 25K con toda la esencia del parque Natural de los Calares del Mundo y de la Sima

This year you will start on the beach, after 700 mtrs. you run thru  the forest and into Tisvilde, here you will hit the beach at HeleneKilde then follow the beach back to the parking lot where the 1. Depot will be.After visiting the depot you will enter Tisvilde Hegn where you will experience some real trail running as the small tricky trails contains lots of small hills. You will have to climb Skovhøj, Harehøj, Ranglehøj, Galgebjerg, Bangshøj and Fredrikshøj.The main depot of the route will be met approximately 30,5 km into the race. Here can you not only obtain water and energy drinks, but also candy, chips, raspberry cake, chocolate, fruit and whatever we may find. You will have to run for another 6 km before you enter Asserbo Plantage and Melby Overdrev. Even though the route is flat when leaving Tisvilde Hegn, please be aware that you are running in on sand and in an open terrain and therefore exposed for the wind.The last approximately 5 km back towards Tisvildeleje and the goal area on the parking lot contains of small single trails. You will come through Enebærdalen og Troldeskoven. You must also take  a walk on the beach before being able to stretching your arms and running into the goal area.

We start at the beach by the parking lot, run along the beach for 700 mtr. then into Tisvilde Hegn turn right thru the 10 ravines,Here are lots of kilometers consisting of small tricky trails and hills. You must climb Skovhøj, Harehøj, Galgebjerg, Bangshøj and Davrehøj. The route and the terrain is very varied and it is almost never straightforward. After 9 km the 1. depot will be.You will run along horse folds, lakes, the deserted village of Torup and past Asserbo Slotsruin. After approximately 25 km you will reach the race’s 2. depot where there will be water, energy drinks, raspberry cake, chocolate, candy, chips, fruit and anything else we can find. In the last 5 km you will, among other things, go through Eneberdalen and Troldeskoven, after which the hardest segment of the race will be aroundWhen it is over, there is just a little detour on the beach before you can stretch your arms and run across the finish line.

Na Aldeia Presépio do Piodão será realizada a 6ª edição do Piódão Trail Running. Um trail desafiante em que os atletas superam os seus limites!

Brand new single day Ultra event2019 is the first ever running of this race taking in the beauty of Northamptonshire's villages, forests, canals and country parksWe are excited to bring you a brand new race to the UK Ultra Running calendar in a fantastic central location, with a single loop making for easy planning and logistics. The route takes in the beautiful Northamptonshire countryside with two country parks, Salcey Forest, the Grand Union Canal and 21 pretty villages and towns following parts of the Nene Way, the Midshires Way and the Northampton Round. There are 6 checkpoints at 6 to 8 mile intervals.Our Race start and finish is hosted by the Brixworth Country Park with plenty of room for parking, and only 20 minutes drive from the M1 Motorway

Course de trail  dans le Sud Sauvage de l'Ile de la Réunion  combinant   la technicité d'une course au relief varié  et la diversité des paysages traversés .Le parcours commence au Gymnase de la  ville européenne la plus australe et se termine au même endroit. C'est son caractère champêtre que le trailer retiendra.Le tracé s'étend des berges de la Rivières Langevin avec ses nombreuses cascades et sa route sinueuse pour traverser ensuite le Grand pays vers la Plaine des Sables et FocFoc .Ensuite ,en suivant toujours le GR2 ,le passage prés du Piton du nez de Boeuf vous conduit vers la descente très technique de Roche plate et sur la piste dans la Rivières des Remparts.L'arrivée se fait aprés avoir traversé l'Ilet Delbon et le sous bois prés du Gymnase:62km ,
Description in English
The trail  is located in the South Wild of Reunion Island.It combines technic and various areas .The Trail starts  and finishes at St Joseph Gymnasium which is situated in  the most Austral European City   .The trailer will keep in memory  the  rural character of the area ..The Race lies along The River Langevin with its beautiful waterfalls and  its winding  road.Then the Trailer still follows the GR2 until FOC FOc and  the Nez de Boeuf before running down to Roche Plate along a technical tract. He goes  through  The River des Remparts valley , crosses  the Ilet Delbon and arrives at the gymnasium again :62km

The Vale Coastal Ultra takes in the entire 32 mile coast of the Vale of Glamorgan from the historic Penarth Pier to Ogmore-by-sea.  It is fast and (relatively) flat course that runs on a variety of cliff top trail, shingle and sand beaches.  As you run along the coast on one side you will have the dramtic scenery of the Severn Estuary and the hills of North Devon and on the other the hills of South Wales!

春风十里，锦绣江南，在或明媚或烟雨的日子里，湖阔天空、江山如画，在沉寂了一个冬的蛰伏后，还有什么比带上装备参加一场全程开满鲜花的赛事来得更令人陶醉呢！合星财富2017无锡越野春季赛就将在这遍布白的李、粉的樱、红的杏、以及成片成片的油菜花……间，在天地最柔情的季节，在独得太湖灵秀之气的山水交融中，在浓到化不开的春风里——一路逶迤舒展而来！忘了这是一场比赛吧！去撒欢、去野、去释放、去拥抱最自然的气息，这里有松林野径、有茶竹飘香、有抛却人工景点后的纯粹、在都市不经意的客厅彰显野性，泥地、苔藓、枯枝、怪石、湖岸野渚甚至荆棘，都会给你不寻常的遇见！一步繁华都市、一步湖岸山野，离地铁口最近的起终点设置、安全周到的赛会保障，无锡越野带给大家的是美好的越野体验，适中的难度，复杂的布线，也是初次接触越野跑的朋友初野的不二选择，随着国内国际赛事风格的些微变化而不断跟进变革的细节安排，更是一次大赛前良好的比赛推演。
Description in English
Come with us and run wild in the mountains along the lake while the spring flowers are blooming

La Carrera Puerta de Muniellos nace en 2011 en un pequeño pueblo llamado Moal (Pueblo Ejemplar de Asturias 2018), situado en la provincia de Asturias.  Su recorrido de 32 kilómetros y +2300m discurre por el Parque Natural de Fuentes del Narcea, y a las puerta de la Reserva Natural de la Biosfera de Muniellos.Durante sus siete años de vida ha albergado diferentes Copas y Campeonatos regionales, obteniendo diferentes galardones como "La mejor carrera de Asturias hasta 50km" en el año 2017 y 2018,   y colocándose como una de las carreras más significativas de la península.
Description in English
Carrera Puerta de Muniellos was born in 2011 in a small town called Moal, located in the province of Asturias. Its route of 32 kilometers and + 2300m runs through Fuentes del Narcea Natural Park, and it is at the door of Muniellos Biosphere Nature Reserve.During its seven years of life has hosted different regional Cups and Championships, obtaining different awards such as "The best race in Asturias up to 50 km" in 2017 and 2018, and placing itself as one of the most significant races of the peninsula.

Description:
The Dragon 100 is a 100 mile race from Rhossili Bay to Cardiff Bay.  It takes in coast path, sand dunes, forests and rolling hills before ending at the iconic Scott memorial in Cardiff Bay. 
Description in English
The Dragon 100 is a 100 mile race from Rhossili Bay to Cardiff Bay.  It takes in coast path, sand dunes, forests and rolling hills before ending at the iconic Scott memorial in Cardiff Bay.

The Dragon 100k Coastal Race is a ultra-trail footrace along the Wales Coastal Path.  100 kilometers from Afan Forest to Cardiff Bay. The route is ideal for a first attempt at this distance or for a seasoned runner looking to post a quick time over some fast runnable trails.  The Dragon 100k route starts with some rolling forest trails, then after approxiately 15 miles joins onto the Wales Coast Path at Kenfig sands and follows it to Cardiff and finishing at the iconic Norwegian Church after a run over the Cardiff Bay Barrage. 
Description in English
The Dragon 100k Coastal Race is a ultra-trail footrace along the Wales Coastal Path.  100 kilometers from Afan Forest to Cardiff Bay. The route is ideal for a first attempt at this distance or for a seasoned runner looking to post a quick time over some fast runnable trails.  The Dragon 100k route starts with some rolling forest trails, then after approxiately 15 miles joins onto the Wales Coast Path at Kenfig sands and follows it to Cardiff and finishing at the iconic Norwegian Church after a run over the Cardiff Bay Barrage.

La prueba de ultra distancia del Ultra-Trail Iturbide 2019 consiste en el recorrido pedestre de senderos y asfalto en la ciudad aledaña de Iturbide N.L., la prueba comienza y termina en la plaza central del municipio y este año contará con 3 diferentes distancias, 12, 30 y 50K, el tiempo máximo para realizar la prueba es de 10 horas.Sin duda Ultra-Trail Iturbide 2019 es una de las pruebas de ultradistancias más rápidas de la zona noreste del país, ya que su altimetría y terreno hacen que sea corrible por la mayoría de los corredores en el 95% de la misma, si buscas una ultra distancia rápida UTI es para ti, de igual forma si buscas tu primer ultra es una excelente opción.

La prueba de ultra distancia del Ultra-Trail Iturbide 2019 consiste en el recorrido pedestre de senderos y asfalto en la ciudad aledaña de Iturbide N.L., la prueba comienza y termina en la plaza central del municipio y este año contará con 3 diferentes distancias, 12, 30 y 50K, el tiempo máximo para realizar la prueba es de 10 horas.

Percorso fisso percorribile tutto l'anno di 36Km con 1940mt D+ nato nel 2015 grazie al contributo di Piacenza Sport e dell'associazione Bobbio Track & Trail. La gara si sviluppa interamente in Val Trebbia toccando anche i comuni di Marsaglia e Coli. Gli scenari delle anse del fiume Trebbia sono qualcosa di unico. Anche il percorso non competitivo di 14Km che segue per un tratto la competitiva è spettacolare con il passaggio alle cascate del Carlone. La partenza e l'arrivo nell' Abazia di San Colombano danno un tocco storico all'evento, potrete ammirare i chiostri e l'arrivo nel corridoio sotto il porticato è qualcosa di emozionante. Arrivando con un giorno d'anticipo potrete visitare i vari musei e passeggiare per le strette vie del Borgo antico di Bobbio.Dal 2018 all'evento del trail è collegato il percorso short che ricalca i primi 16km della gara classica con arrivo a Marsaglia.
Description in English
Fixed route for the whole year of 36Km with 1940m D + born in 2015 thanks to the contribution of Piacenza Sport and the Bobbio Track & Trail association. The race is developed entirely in Val Trebbia touching also the municipalities of Marsaglia and Coli. The scenarios of the bends of the river Trebbia are something unique. Even the non-competitive 14Km route that follows the competitive route for a while is spectacular with the passage to the Carlone Falls. The departure and arrival in the Abbey of San Colombano give a historical touch to the event, you can admire the cloisters and the arrival in the corridor under the arcade is something exciting. Arriving a day in advance you can visit the various museums and stroll through the narrow streets of the ancient village of Bobbio.From 2018 to the trail event is connected the short route that follows the first 16km of the classic race with arrival in Marsaglia.
Entry Fee:

Dal 01/01 al 20/03 Quota € 30,00

Description:
Le MARATHON DES SABLES est une course à pied, ouverte aux marcheurs, en 6 étapes, en autosuffisance alimentaire et en allure libre sur une distance de 250 kilomètres environ, avec obligation pour le concurrent de porter son équipement (nourriture et matériel obligatoires).
Description in English
The MARATHON DES SABLES is a foot race, open to runnersand walkers, with several stages, free style, and with food self-sufficiency over a distance of about 250 Km. Each participant must carry his/her own backpack containing food, sleeping gear and other material.
ENGLISH
ENGLISH

El Trail Cap de Creus es mucho más que una carrera, es la oportunidad de conocer el paraíso de la mejor manera posible: corriendo. Desafía los altísimos acantilados de la costa. Camúflate entre las siluetas de las rocas más caprichosas. Lucha contra el viento y el oleaje. Del mar al cielo, del cielo al mar. Que tus pasos te guíen al corazón de la Costa Brava.
Description in English
The Trail Cap de Creus is much more than a race, is the opportunity to meet the paradise in the best way possible, running. Challenge the towering cliffs of the coast. Hide between the silhouettes of rocks most capricious. Fight against the wind and waves. From sea to  the sky, from sky to the sea. That your steps will lead you to the heart of the Costa Brava.

Description in English
The Trail Cap de Creus is much more than a race, is the opportunity to meet the paradise in the best way possible, running. Challenge the towering cliffs of the coast. Hide between the silhouettes of rocks most capricious. Fight against the wind and waves. From sea to  the sky, from sky to the sea. That your steps will lead you to the heart of the Costa Brava.
www.trailrunpro.it
www.trailrunpro.it

Event: Chinese Fushou Mountain International Trail Race 2019
Description:
中华福寿山位于霍城县境内中部偏北大西沟乡境内，是世界罕见、亚洲唯一的野生樱桃李原产地。中华福寿山景区周围山峦起伏，山沟中有无数涓涓细流汇成大西沟河纵贯其中，河水蜿蜒曲折，夹岸重峦叠嶂，奇石五彩斑斓，沿河床密布，山坡山花烂漫，林木葱茏，空气清新。每当春夏，芳草萋萋，果花漫山遍野，香艳满枝，景色如画，曾被道家选为修心养性之所。大西沟风景秀丽，景观奇异，春可赏花、夏易避暑、秋可品果、冬易赏雪，一年四季风景迷人，每年游人络绎不绝，历来被视为新疆的名胜之地之一。中华福寿山国际越野赛（春季赛）每年选在4月上旬野果树花开的时候举办，畅游花海，心旷神怡。
Description in English
Chinese Fushou Mountain is located in Huocheng County, northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region. There are many different kinds of wild fruit trees in the mountain. Every spring the trees are in bloom, the scene of Chinese Fushou Mountain is amazing. Chinese Fushou Mountain international Trail Race is held in the early April, and it includes three groups, 50K, 27K and 10K. The trail-runners can enjoy the unique and fabulous scene in the race.

Event: Chinese Fushou Mountain International Trail Race 2019

Ultra-Trail Costa Rica in front of the Arenal volcano51km 100% Trail-running !

The Hellbender One Hundred is one of the most scenic hundred milers on the East Coast. This course will take you through a grueling tour of the massive Black Mountains, deep into the valleys below and to the summit of Mt. Mitchell, the highest mountain East of the Mississippi. With a total elevation change of ~40,000+ ft. runners will experience some of the most challenging and beautiful trails in all of Western North Carolina. You'll not want to miss this  graduate level hundred miler through the heart of Southern Appalachia!
Description in English
Trail running in Western North Carolina!

江南百英里越野大赛，将于2019年4月12日至14日再次举行。赛事设置168/110/85/50四个组别，难度适中，景色丰富，是一条可跑型强的美式赛道。延续经典的“爱燃烧·年度最美赛道”，选手将踏上一路樱花，探索春深时节的江南之美。赛事不设报名门槛，装备没有强制。2018年恶劣天气下，总完赛率仍然高达89%。选手今年将从宁波市溪口出发，跑过38个江南村落，穿越田野乡间，与樱花作伴，与春风相陪，越爱越深，越跑越美，焕然新生，为你准备好迎接人生第一条长距离，再一次遇见非凡的自己。 
Description in English
Ningbo Siming Mountain is the birthplace of 7000 years Chinese ancient civilization of Hemudu Site, is also the blessed spot of Taoism. It has nurtured many talents, such as Wang Xizhi, Xie Lingyun, Wang Yangming, and Yan Ziling. Lots of poets like Li Bai, Du Fu and Bai Juyi, who were attracted by the splendid scenery of Siming Mountain came here and opened up the famous Tang Poetry Prosperity. Runners will experience marvelous scenery and culture during this trip.The starting and finishing points located in Xikou Town, Fenghua, Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, which is the hometown of ChiangKai-shek, with thousand years history. The race starts at the foot of the Xuedou Mountain, along the ancient path, and finishes on the top of the mountain. Xuedou Mountain is the ashram where Maitreya Bodhisattva meditated and practiced. Runners can bless safety and health when seeing the 56 meters high bronze statue of Maitreya Bodhisattva along the race track.The race track passes through National 5A Scenery Sites like Qianzhang Waterfall and Sanyintang Waterfall. Waterfall and cliffs along the race road are really beautiful, just like running in a painting.Chiangs former residence in Xikou town, Maitreya Bodhisattva ashram in Xuedou Mountain, National 5A Scenery Sites like Qianzhang Waterfall and Sanyintang Waterfall, Thousand acres of cherries and red maples, Main peak of Siming mountain, Qinghuwangang (the highest peak of Ningbo), Shanglianggang named as the second Lushan Mountain, Primeval forest, Ancient villages with bamboo forests, bridges and streams, Steep rock firebreak and slope.The scenery will definitely get your attention.We expect that you can meet the extraordinary yourself when running through the splendid scenery in the east of Zhejiang.

Description: A challenging, scenic run through the southern Utah desert adjacent to Zion National Park.
A challenging, scenic run through the southern Utah desert adjacent to Zion National Park.

A challenging, scenic run through the southern Utah desert adjacent to Zion National Park. We offer 4 distances- a Half Marathon, 50K, 100K, and a 100 miler. The 100 miler and 100K will start on Friday, the half marathon and 50K on Saturday.

The Zumbro Endurance Run 100MI, 50MI and 17MI trail races take place within the Zumbro River Bottoms Management Unit in Southeastern Minnesota’s Bluff Country – just outside of the tiny village of Theilman, MN approximately 1:45 from Minneapolis – St.Paul, MN. The races start and finish at the West Assembly / Horse Campground Area. Generally speaking the Zumbro River Bottoms Management Unit lies within a portion of the Richard J. Dorer Memorial Hardwood Forest – an expansive 1.7 million acre tract of Minnesota hardwood forest on the Northern edge of the Driftless Region which is mainly characterized by its tall bluffs and deeply carved river valleys. This “bluff country” is rugged, hauntingly beautiful and provides the perfect venue for 100, 50 or 17 miles of trail running – while this is certainly not an “easy” trail race it can still be a great choice for your first 100, 50 or 17, that is if you are ready for a good amount of climbing / elevation gain. This is a laid back, old school, low-key trail race hosted by ultrarunners for ultrarunners.The course consists of a mix of rugged single and double track trail with rubble, loose rock and sand along with minimum maintenance gravel roads. The race is primarily concentrated in two large valleys within an expansive hardwood forest. There are four significant, short, steep climbs (approx 300FT) per loop with small hills in-between along with some significant stretches of flat valley floor running.The weather can be extremely variable for the Zumbro Endurance Run – there have been years of near 100% snow-cover and blizzard like conditions and other years dry with highs in the mid-70’s.  Due to a record setting blizzard and hazardous driving conditions the 2017 edition of the 17 mile race was canceled – the 100 and 50 proceeded “mostly” as normal.

Punkty kontrolne, bufety i limity*Na trasie znajdować się będzie 6 punktów kontrolnych, połączonych z punktami odżywczymi (bufetami), na których obowiązuje limit czasu uprawniający do kontynuowania biegu
Description in English
The route follows the most beautiful tourist trails in Stolowe Mountains National Park (Poland) and Broumovske Steny (Czech Republic). It goes through the exceptional places like Skansen Pstrazna, Bledne Skały Labyrinth, Sovi Hradek, Kovarova Rokla, Szczeliniec Wielki Labyrinth and Biale Skaly, among others.The route is very technical with lots of rocks, curves and important elevation gains. It goes by the marked trails and there will be additional route markers. In April you have to be prepared for changing weather conditions including snow and ice.

Mt. APO Sky & Vertical Race on the 13-14th of April 2019, 12:01mn @ Obuza Beach Resort, Barangay Darung, Municipality of Sta Cruz, Davao Del Sur, Philippines. This event is in partnership with LGU Sta Cruz, Department Of Tourism Region XI and Boulder Face Challenge.Mt. APO is the highest mountain in Philippines with an elevation not more than 3,000 meters above sea level. This is the 3rd year having an ultra distance at the Boulder Face of Sta Cruz trail, Davao Del Sur. This edition we have only two (2) distances, 100km for maximum 35 hours to finish and 50km with 18 hours cut-off. 100km runners will summit the highest rooftop in the country and ofcourse 50km is half way.

Race: Trail De La Casa Del Árbol

Description:
ISLA DE GRAN CANARIA – CONTINENTE EN MINIATURAEl entorno natural que ofrece la isla de Gran Canaria la hace merecedora del calificativo de “continente en miniatura”. La benignidad de su clima, favorecido por los vientos alisios y la carencia de temperaturas extremas, permite la práctica del deporte al aire libre durante todo el año.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® es una carrera por montaña que cuenta con la modalidad reina, una ULTRATRAIL de 72 km y casi 5.000 m. de desnivel positivo. Además ofrece otras modalidades que se adaptan a los diferentes perfiles de cada corredor, que podrán seleccionar su distancia en función de sus capacidades.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® atraviesa la isla de Gran Canaria de Noroeste a Suroeste, con salida en el pueblo de Agaete y llegada a la Playa de Mogán, pasando por el punto más elevado de la isla de Gran Canaria, el Pico de las Nieves con sus 1.954 metros de altitud. Atraviesa las presas más grandes de la isla recorriendo gran parte de los municipios de Agaete, San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Artenara, Tejeda, Vega de San Mateo y Mogán, municipio sede del evento.SKY GRAN CANARIA ®  es una prueba apta para todo tipo de corredores. Los bellos paisajes de la isla de Gran Canaria harán que disfruten al máximo.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® es miembro de la ITRA y de la DUV. Además, es una prueba puntuable para la UTMB (Utra-Trail du Mont Blanc),  . Participa como expositor en el salón de la ULTRA-TRAIL DU MONT BLANC (UTMB) y en la THE NORTH FACE LAVAREDO ULTRATRAIL.
Description in English
ISLAND OF GRAN CANARIA – MINIATURE CONTINENTThe natural environment Gran Canaria has to offer makes its description as “miniature continent” very fitting. The benignity of its climate, stroked by the trade winds, and lack of extreme temperatures, allows the practice of outdoor sports all year round.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® is a mountain race that counts with the main race, a 72 km ULTRATRAIL with almost 5,500 metres of positive elevation. In addition, it offers other races that adapt to the different profiles of the runners who will be able to choose a distance according to their capabilities.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® traverses Gran Canaria from northwest to southwest beginning in the town of Agaete and finishing in Playa de Mogán. It will run through the highest point of the island – Pico de las Nieves, which rises 1,954 metres above sea level- and the biggest dams of the island, wandering through the municipalities of Agaete, San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Artenara, Tejeda, Vega de San Mateo and Mogán; the latter being the host for this event.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® is a race suitable for all types of runners. The gorgeous sceneries the island has to offer will allow your maximum enjoyment.SKY GRAN CANARIA ® is an event that scores for the UTMB (Ultra-Trail du Mont Blanc)  and currently takes part in the UTMB Show as Expositor.

Description: 82 miles in 24 hours over the Jurassic Coast Path.

Trail en ligne sur 3 zones supports distinctes (bord de mer/falaises/sable puis aber wrac'h et enfin terre et vallons multiples le long de la rivière (passage de tunnels, de gués, de ponts et diverses difficultés). Le tout en autonomie complète sans assistance avec barrière horaire
La GRAN TRAIL  es un gran reto por etapas y en parejas, un gran desafĂ­o para descubrir todo el vale y sus pueblos.
La Marato es una carrera alpina, con buena parte de su recorrido por encima de los 1600 de altura, que transcurre por hayedos y prados alpinos.
La 34Trail es una carrera siempre por sendero que nos conducirĂĄ por los diferentes pueblos del valle.

The Traprock course is a loop course of approximately 10.5-11 miles per loop, to complete the 50k, runners must complete three loops.It is a rolling course with 50 % technical single track on the Blue Blaze Metacomet Trail. The balance of the course is double-track. Consisting entirely of rolling forest roads or single track that can be extremely rocky, the course will provide a true test of the runnerâs fitness and mental stamina. You should only consider entering this race if you are confident you have sufficient running experience such as having completed a recent road or trail marathon.

Event: Ultra Maratón De Las Altas Montañas 2019
Ultra Maratón De Las Altas Montañas 2019
Ultra Trail Causses Et Vallées Lot  Dordogne 2019
Description:
« Le Lot, la terre des merveilles » « le Lot, une surprise à chaque pas » autant de superlatifs que les publicistes ont mis en avant pour qualifier ce département. L’Ultra Trail Causses et Vallées Lot Dordogne va tracer son parcours dans l’enceinte du Parc Naturel des Causses du Quercy. . Les Causses, plateaux secs et minéraux constituent le paysage emblématique du Parc. Cette dalle calcaire des causses est entaillée par les vallées vertes et majestueuses du Lot et de la Dordogne, par celles plus sauvages du Célé et du Vers, mais aussi par les impressionnants canyons de l’Ouysse et de l’Alzou et les nombreuses vallées sèches ou combes. Autant de territoires traversés qui proposeront au fil du parcours une diversité de paysages étonnants. 160 kilomètres de chemins et singles qui vont amener les participants de villages en villages à la découverte de Cahors, St Cirq-Lapopie, Cabrerets, Gramat, Rocamadour, Montfaucon, Labastide-Murat et Vers pour retrouver Cahors la ville de départ.
Description in English
"The Lot, the land of wonders" "the Lot, a surprise at every step" as many superlatives as publicists have put forward to qualify this department. The Ultra Trail Causses and Valleys Lot Dordogne will trace its course in the enclosure of the Natural Park of Causses du Quercy. . The Causses, dry plateaux and minerals constitute the emblematic landscape of the Park. This chalky slab of causses is cut by the green and majestic valleys of the Lot and the Dordogne, by the wildest ones of Célé and Vers, but also by the impressive canyons of Ouysse and Alzou and the numerous dry valleys. or combes. So many crossed territories that will offer along the course a variety of amazing landscapes. 160 kilometers of paths and singles that will take participants from villages to villages to discover Cahors, Cirq-Lapopie St, Cabrerets, Gramat, Rocamadour, Montfaucon, Labastide-Murat and Vers to find Cahors the starting city.

Event: Ultra Trail Causses Et Vallées Lot  Dordogne 2019
Description:
Au départ de Gramat, le canyon de l'Ouysse vous amènera au pied de Rocamadour, la Cité Sacrée suspendue entre ciel et terre. De Causses en Vallées vous rejoindrez Cahors la ville d'arrivée et son célèbre pont Valentré 
Description in English
From Gramat, the Ouysse canyon will take you to the foot of Rocamadour, the Sacred City suspended between heaven and earth. From Causses en Vallées you will reach Cahors the arrival town and its famous Valentré bridge

Event: Ultra Trail Causses Et Vallées Lot  Dordogne 2019
Description:
Ce trail en relais est tracé intégralement sur le parcours de l'UTV Lot & Dordogne afin de vous permettre de relever en équipe ce challenge de relier la ligne d'arrivée.Un relais est un défi que l’on relève à plusieurs. La réussite dépend de la force d’un groupe, de la valorisation des compétences de chacun et d’un bon esprit d’équipe. La participation à l'UTVLD est ouverte à tout groupe de 4 personnes désirant constituer une équipe féminine, mixte ou masculine. Sera considérée comme équipe mixte une équipe composée de 2 féminines et 2 masculins. La distance sera celle de l'UTVLD à laquelle il conviendra d’ajouter la distance des zones de transmission du relais. Le parcours sera constitué de quatre portions inégales successives pour permettre aux quatre coureurs d’une même équipe de faire le relais en fonction de leurs qualités physiques. Le dernier kilomètre précédent l’arrivée sera effectué par l’équipe complète (quatre coureurs)
Description in English
This trail in relay is drawn entirely on the course of the UTV Lot & Dordogne to allow you to raise in team this challenge to connect the finish line.A relay is a challenge that is raised by many. Success depends on the strength of a group, the valorization of each other's skills and a good team spirit.Participation in the UTVLD is open to any group of 4 people wishing to form a female team, mixed or male. A team consisting of 2 women and 2 men will be considered as a mixed team. The distance will be that of the UTVLD to which it will be necessary to add the distance of the transmission zones of the relay. The course will consist of four successive uneven portions to allow the four riders of the same team to relay according to their physical qualities. The last kilometer before the finish will be done by the full team (four riders)

Для самых-самых. Эта дистанция ответит на вопрос - хорошо ли вы тренировались зимой. погода непредсказуемая, можете уточнить у тех, кто бежал в 2018 году. Рельеф только кажется неагрессивным. Хотя на 2019 год мы намерены сделать её остро соревновательной и достаточно быстрой.

Нам удалось проложить маршрут ровно на 42 километра. Во всяком случае согласно нашим данным. Не стоит сравнивать этот марафон по сложности с гладким, шоссейным. Уже первые 5 километров смогут вас в этом легко разубедить. Зато после такого марафона вы можете быть уверены, что плоскач станет для вас гораздо легче и быстрее.

В 2017 году у нас были "лайтовые" 16км, в 2018 году - 25. Кажется настало время золотой середины! Новички, учитесь бегать в горку и не будьте наивными - спускаться с горки иногда бывает очень тяжко. А если до финиша осталось всего пара километров - это совсем не означает, что самое страшное позади.

The race takes in some of the highest glacial lakes in Wicklow. The race traverses some of the wildest terrain in Wicklow. Solo runners should ensure they bring adequate clothing and food for all weathers as leg 2 in particular can be very difficult in mist. Participants must touch the water in each lake on their leg. A mobile phone, hat, cagoule, map, and compass are compulsory kit. Bring food and water according to your needs for a run in tough mountain terrain. Solo runners must bring sufficient food and clothing protection for the whole race.Leg 1 starts at the hotel in Glendalough and takes in Lough Ouler with the handover at the car park at the Wicklow Gap. The only part of the Wicklow Gap road that you can run on is the part on the St. Kevin's Way. Challenge: route choice and terrain.Leg 2 takes in Lough Firrib and either of the Three Lakes with the handover at Glenmalure hostel. Challenge: navigation and tough terrain in middle of leg.Leg 3 takes in Art's Lough and Kelly's Lough with the handover at Ballinafunshoge car park). Challenge: route choice and steep terrain.Leg 4 takes in the Upper and Lower lakes in Glendalough with the finish at Glendalough hotel. Challenge: a runner's leg but route choice could win out!

Description: Desde el 2008, primer campeonato de carreras por montaña en Perú. Categoría Purix, para los que recién empiezan.

Se enmarca en Sierra Elvira, zona de baja montaña, situada en los municipios de Atarfe, Albolote y Pinos Puente en las proximidades de la ciudad de Granada. Es un trazado exigente con un desnivel positivo acumulado aproximado de 2000 m, continuas subidas y bajadas que discurren por caminos y senderos con numerosos tramos técnicos. Esta Homologada por la FEDME (Federación española de Deportes de Montaña y Escalada). Presenta un coeficiente de dificultad FAM/FEDME 61 y dificultad técnica alta (más del 70 % del trazado discurre por veredas. 
Description in English
It is framed in Sierra Elvira, low mountain area, located in the municipalities of Atarfe, Albolote and Pinos Puente, very close of the city of Granada. It is a demanding layout with an accumulated positive rise of approximately 2000 m, continuous ups and downs that run along paths and trails with numerous technical stretches. It is certified by FEDME (Spanish Federation of Mountain Sports and Climbing). It has a difficulty coefficient FAM / FEDME 61 and high technical difficulty (more than 70% of the route runs along sidewalks.

Göllüce Patika Koşusu, patika koşu mesafelerini uzatmak isteyenler için başlangıç-gelişme seviyesinde bir parkur sunmaktadır. Göl seviyesinden başlayıp yükselerek 500 metre yukardan baktığınız rota, geniş toprak yollar, zorunlu asfalt etapları ve yer yer dar ve bozuk zeminli patikalardan oluşmaktadır. Tek kontrol noktası olan Derbent, yorucu bir eforun artından patika koşucularını ödüllendirecektir. Sonrasında varışa giden ve dik uzun iniş içeren etaba enerji ayırmayı unutmayınız.
Description in English
Göllüce Trail Run ise a great 18 miler for those who seek a moderate trail as a step to run an ultra trail. Starting lake side, climbs up to the hills to offer a birds eye view of the Iznik Lake. Majority is dirt tracks, includes mandatory road crossings and some sections of single tracks-some rouged. Has only one check point at Derbent. Required good feeding plan and it is advised to develop a running strategy reserving quads for the long last descent.
Relay teams of 2 on Iznik ultra 160K - Stage 1

Derbent Patika Koşusu, İznik Ultra parkurunun son kontrol noktası olan Derbent'ten İznik'in içine giden, patika ağırlıklı bir koşudur. Hala kısmen korunmuş Derbent köy meydanından başlayarak çeşitli yolları kullanarak İznik Lefke Kapı'ya ulaşır.
Description in English
Derbent Trail is the last split of the Iznik Ultra Marathon. Starts from partly preserved Derbent Village, until "Kan Çiçekleri" (Blood Flowers) field, follows the village streets and some tarmac and dirt roads.

Start in the hunting grounds of Case Noyale at sea-level, a steady climb up to the highest point of Mauritius, Piton de la Riviere Noire, on singletrack paths, then down a very technical path to the Black River, then a loop on singletracks up and down extremely technical forest, and then back up the Piton Riviere Noire and back down to the start on different paths.

Etapa: Mestre ÁlvaroDia: 20 e 21 Abril 2019Local: Serra – Espírito SantoO Mestre Álvaro é considerado uma das maiores elevações litorâneas (planalto) da costa brasileira[carece de fontes] e abriga uma das últimas áreas de Mata Atlântica de altitude do Espírito Santo. É um maciço costeiro que possui formato semicircular em planta, estruturado em um corpo de rocha intrusiva granítica com cerca de 833 metros de altitude no Estado do Espírito Santo.
Description in English
Stage: Mestre ÁlvaroDay: 20th and 21st April 2019Location:Mestre Álvaro is considered one of the largest coastal elevations (plateau) of the Brazilian coast [lacks sources] and is home to one of the last Atlantic Forest areas of the Espírito Santo. It is a coastal massif that has a semicircular shape in plan, structured in a body of intrusive granitic rock with about 833 meters of altitude in the State of Espírito Santo.

A Mátrabérc Trail története a Mátrabérc Teljesítménytúrával kezdődött, amelyet 1987 óta szervez a Hanák Kolos Turistaegyesület. A túra útvonala többnyire egy nyomvonalas ösvényeken, izgalmas útvonalon, a Mátra főgerincét követve, kelet-nyugati irányban szeli át az egész hegységet. A teljes távot, magyarországi viszonylatban igen nagy, és változatosan eloszló szintemelkedés nehezíti. Ezen adotságoknak köszönhetően, az elmúlt évtizedek során a Mátrabérc, Magyarország egyik leglátogatottabb és legnagyobb presztizsű teljesítménytúrája lett. A túra résztávján (a Kékes-Szurdokpüspöki szakaszon) a Mátrabérccel egyidőben 1991 óta rendezik meg a Hanák Kolos teljesítménytúrát, valamint 2005 óta a Galyatető-Szurdokpüspöki szakaszon a Muzsla teljesítménytúrát. 2009-ig, egyre többen indultak el a teljesítménytúrán futva - egymással és önmagukkal versenyezve - a minél jobb időeredményért és helyezésért. A leggyorsabbak rendszerint Magyarország legjobb terepfutói közül kerültek ki, amely komoly elismerést jelentett. Az utóbbi években, a hazánkban is folyamatosan gyarapodó terepfutó társadalom egyre növekvő igényt támasztott az igazi terepfutó versenyek létrehozásával szemben. Sokan az Alpokban megrendezett versenyeket - kiemelve a francia és olasz rendezvényeket - tekintették követendő példáknak. Sokáig az egyik legkiválóbb adottságokkal rendelkező hazai, természetes útvonalon nem volt lehetőség valódi versenykörülmények között teljesíteni a távot. Ezt a hiányosságot pótólva, 2010-től, a teljesítménytúra útvonalán önálló rendezvényként megrendezett Mátrabérc Trail terepfutó versenyen bárki kipróbálhatja képességeit, és futva keresztezheti az ország legmagasabb hegységét. A verseny híre hamar átlépte az ország határait, amit az egyre gyarapodó nemzetközi mezőny jelenléte igazol évről-évre.
Description in English
The Mátrabérc Endurance Tour has been organized by the Kolos Hanák Hiker Association since 1987.The track of the tour, which goes through the whole mountain from east to west, follows the main ridge of the Mátra. 99 % of the trace is trail,four fifth of it is usually one-track ridge, with amazing diversified view. One of the major characteristics of the whole distance is the various altitude, which is relatively big in comparison with other trails in Hungary. Thanks to these features Mátrabérc became one of the most frequented and prestigious endurance tours of Hungary during the past few decades. At the same time with the Mátrabérc Endurance Tour two other tours have been organized. One of them is the Kolos Hanák Endurance Tour between Kékes and Szurdokpüspöki since 1991. The other one is the Muzsla Endurance Tour between Galyatető and Szurdokpüspöki since 2005.More and more people took part in the Endurance Tour-at a run-in contest with each other or themselves for the better results. The fastest runners were usually the best trail runners of Hungary, which meant serious prestige for the winners. During the past few years the number of trail runners was getting higher and higher in Hungary. That’s why it was claimed to have “real challenging” contests. Most of them regarded the races in the Alps-especially the French and Italian ones- exemplary. For a long time they haven’t had a chance to fulfill the distance among race conditions although, it was one of the trails in Hungary which had the best features. In order to satisfy this demand-on the trace of the Endurance Tour-the Mátrabérc Trail Running race was born in 2010, where everybody can try out his abilities by running through the highest mountain of the country. The fame of the race soon crossed the country’s borders, which is proved by the increasing number of the international field year by year.

A terepfutás népszerűsége Magyarországon évek óta nő, ez egyre több új arcot jelent itthon, akik szeretnék megméretni magukat és versenyezni akarnak. Nagyon sokan vannak közülük, akik gondolatban már a Mátra bércein járnak de fizikálisan még nem tartanak ott. Számukra hoztuk létre a Muzsla Trail versenyünket, ami egy rövidebb távon - de arányaiban hasonló nehézségi szint mellett - megadja a lehetőséget arra, hogy a résztvevők belekóstolhassanak a Mátrabérc Trail hangulatába és annak a mindenki által legkeményebbnek titulált szakaszát, a Muzslát együtt futhassák a klasszikus távon indulókkal.  
Description in English
The popularity of trail running has been rising in Hungary for years, which means more and more new “faces” who would like to be measured and contest at races. Lots of them have been dreaming about running on the peaks of the Mátra but physically they haven’t been ready for that yet. That’s why Muzsla Trail has been established for them. This race has similar difficulty level as Mátrabérc trail but the distance is shorter. We would like to give a chance to the participants of the Muzsla trail to experience the atmosphere of the Mátrabérc Trail and race together through Muzsla –which is considered to be the toughest stage of the race-with the contestants of the Mátrabérc Trail.

The Yakima Skyline 50K takes place outside of Ellensburg, WA near the Umtanum Creek Recreation Area on Canyon Rd. On the eastern side of the Cascade mountains, this out and back course is located in a beautiful high desert, rainshadow region of the area. The race is exposed, hot, and dry! And with nearly 10,000 feet of elevation gain, it's a tough 50K that some have described feels more like a 50 miler. Expect stunning views of the canyon and of the Yakima river below as well as views of Mt Rainier and the Cascades off in the distance. There are quad burning climbs, screaming downhills, and rolling ridgelines along fields of wildflowers.

Description:
Το Γεγονός  “Sougliani Trail 24.5km” θα πραγματοποιηθεί στις 21 Απριλίου 2019 και ώρα 09:45πμ στο Στρατονικό Όρος, στον Σταυρό Θεσσαλονίκης (κεντρική Μακεδονία). Η διαδρομή έχει μήκος 24,5χιλιόμετρα και θετική υψομετρική διαφορά +1600 μέτρα. Στο μεγαλύτερο μέρος της, η διαδρομή αποτελείται 20,3 χλμ μονοπάτι (82,,8%), ενώ την συμπληρώνουν 2,4χλμ.  δασικός δρόμος (9,8%), και 1,9 χλμ. άσφαλτος (7,4%). Η διαδρομή έχει χαρακτήρα κυκλικό με εκκίνηση και τερματισμό στο 1ο Δημοτικό Σχολείο Σταυρού. Η ποικιλία της βλάστησης είναι μεγάλη και χαρακτηρίζεται από ένα μεικτό δάσος από σκληρόξυλα δέντρα. Στην περιοχή διακρίνονται τρεις δασικοί οικότοποι. Τα δάση φυλλοβόλων πλατύφυλλων με διάφορα είδη δρυός, καστανιές, οστρυές, φιλύρες, κότινους και οξιές με ιδιαίτερο χαρακτηριστικό τα αρχέγονα δάση από οξιές, δρυς και αιωνόβιες μεγάλες καστανιές. Τα δάση αείφυλλων-σκληρόφυλλων πλατύφυλλων ειδών με άρκευθους, ίταμους, αριές, δάφνες, πουρνάρια, φιλύκια και κουμαριές και τα παραποτάμια δάση με είδη όπως, πλατάνια, σκλήθρα, γαύρους, σφενδάμια, ιτιές, λεύκες, φτελιές και φράξους. Στα δάση αυτά ζούνε λύκοι, αγριόγατοι και ζαρκάδια, αλλά και τα πολύ σπάνια τσακάλια που έχουν εξαφανιστεί από πολλούς τόπους της χώρας. Οι πληθυσμοί των θηλαστικών συμπληρώνονται από αλεπούδες, κουνάβια, σκίουρους, ασβούς, αγριογούρουνα, νυφίτσες και 3 είδη νυχτερίδας. Το γεγονός Ορεινού Τρεξίματος  “Sougliani Trail” γίνεται με σκοπό να γνωρίσουν οι συμμετέχοντες  το ορεινό κομμάτι της περιοχής μας (Στρατονικό Όρος)που έχει πυκνή βλάστηση, βρίσκεται στα σύνορα  Θεσσαλονίκης – Χαλκιδικής, πάνω από τα χωριά Σταυρός και Άνω Σταυρός Θεσσαλονίκης και Βαρβάρα Χαλκιδικής. Απέχει από την Θεσσαλονίκη, Δράμα, Καβάλα και Σέρρες 1 ώρα και σε πολλούς είναι άγνωστο.  Επίσης, όποιος θέλει μπορεί να δει και να κατεβάσει την διαδρομή Sougliani Trail 24,5km με GPS στο  link: https://el.wikiloc.com/mountain-running-diadromes/oreinos-agonas-sougliani-trail-run-24-5km-stratoniko-oros-16592451
Description in English
The “Sougliani Trail” will take place on April 21st 2019 and at 9:45pm in Stratoni Alp, in Stavros Thessaloniki(central Macedonia). The route of the race is 24.5 km in length and positive drop +1600m. In its biggest part, the trail is made up of 20.3km path(82.8%),  2.4km woodland road(9.8%), and 1.9km paved road(7.4). The trail is circular with starting point and finish in the First Primary School of Stavros. The vegetation diversity is big and is characterized by a mixed forest of hardwood trees. In the area we can distinguish three main habitats. The hardwood trees forests  with several kinds of oak, chestnut trees, ostryas, tilias, laurels and beech trees with the distinctive characteristic  of the primitive forests of beech trees, oaks and centenarian large chestnut trees. The forests of evergreen-hardwood broadleaves kinds with junipers, yews, arias, daphnes, kermes oak trees, rhamnus alaternus and arbutus and the forests by the river with kinds such as planes, alders, carpinus, maples, willows, poplars, elms and ash trees. This forest is inhabited by wolves, wild cats and roes as well as the very rare jackals that have become extinct in many places of Greece. The mammals’ population is completed by foxes, ferrets, squirrels, badgers, boars, weasels and three kinds of bat. The race “Sougliani trail” is held with the purpose of the athletes meeting the mountain part of our area (the Stratoni Alp) which has a thick vegetation and is situated on the borders of Thessaloniki-Chalkidiki, over the villages of Stavros and Ano-Stavros of Thessalniki and Varvara, Chalkidiki. It is 1 hour far from Thessaloniki, Drama, Kavala and Serres and is unknown to many.  Here you can download the GPX archive of the route Sougliani Trail: https://el.wikiloc.com/mountain-running-diadromes/oreinos-agonas-sougliani-trail-run-24-5km-stratoniko-oros-16592451

Το γεγονός  “Sougliani Path 12km” θα πραγματοποιηθεί στις 21 Απριλίου 2019 και ώρα 10:45πμ στο Στρατονικό Όρος, στον Σταυρό Θεσσαλονίκης (κεντρική Μακεδονία). Η διαδρομή έχει μήκος 12χιλιόμετρα και θετική υψομετρική διαφορά +750 μέτρα. Η διαδρομή έχει χαρακτήρα κυκλικό με εκκίνηση και τερματισμό στο 1ο Δημοτικό Σχολείο Σταυρού. Description in English
The “Sougliani Path 12km” will take place on April 21st 2019 and at 10:45pm in Stratoni Alp, in Stavros Thessaloniki(central Macedonia). The route of the race is 12 km in length and positive drop +750m. The Sougliani Path route is 12km long and has a total positive drop of  +750 metres. In its biggest part, the route is made up of 9km path(75%),  1.1km woodland road(9.1%), and 1.9km paved road(15.8%). The route is circular with starting point and finish in the First Primary School of Stavros. Athletes’ Rewards.Souvenir trophies are given: Sougliani TrailMEN’S CATEGORY-General Men’s category 1st, 2nd & 3rd  race winners; medal, trophy,  souvenir gift.- Male Category 18-29 1st, 2nd, & 3rd race winners; medal, plaque,  souvenir gift.- Male Category  30-39  1st, 2nd, & 3rd race winners; medal, plaque,  souvenir gift.- Male Category 40-49 1st, 2nd, & 3rd race winners; medal, plaque,  souvenir gift.- Male Category 50+  1st, 2nd, & 3rd race winners; medal, plaque,  souvenir gift.WOMEN’S CATEGORY- General Women’s Category W  1st, 2nd,  & 3rd race winners; medal, trophy, a souvenir gift.- Women’s Category;  18-39 1st, 2nd & 3rd  race winners; medal, plaque, souvenir gift.- Women’s Category; 40+  1st, 2nd & 3rd  race winners; medal, plaque, souvenir gift.Sougliani PathMEN’S CATEGORY  Α) Men’s category 1st, 2nd & 3rd  race winners; medal, trophy, souvenir gift. .WOMEN’S CATEGORYΑ) Women’s Category W  1st, 2nd,  & 3rd race winners; medal, trophy, a souvenir gift.Sougliani KidsPraises for the first three boys or girls of each age  group 5-8 & 9-12.Medals for everyone.Also, the athletes that that make it to the finish line can have a hot shower next to the basket Sports Stadium of Stavros.

48 kilometri lungo un percorso TRAIL, con un’altimetria che richiede una buona preparazione e gestione delle proprie forze, avendo un dislivello positivo di 2.300 metri. Una competizione molto sentita per i numerosi Campioni che vi partecipano ed una sfida altissima, attraversando sentieri nella natura selvaggia e luoghi nascosti ed affascinanti, come i percorsi della prima guerra mondiale.Lungo i 48 km verranno attraversati:- Le Ville Venete e del Palladio con le splendide architetture del sedicesimo secolo, incastonatesui pendii e ai piedi dei colli Asolani.-	Asolo centro storico, uno dei borghi più belli d’Italia, da sempre meta di scrittori, poeti, viaggiatori e artisti: è arroccato tra le colline e svetta con la sua Rocca del XII° secolo che offre una vista molto suggestiva.-I colli di Asolo - Maser – Cornuda. Le colline offrono un percorso immerso nella natura e fanno da  spartiacque tra la pianura Veneta e le Prealpi Trevigiane offrendo dei meravigliosi scorci.-Le trincee della Grande Guerra. Lungo i saliscendi dei vari percorsi rimane, attraverso le trincee e gli osservatori, il ricordo permanente della Prima Guerra Mondiale.-Le colline dell’Asolo Prosecco DOC.  Famose in tutto il mondo per le varie tipologie di vini prodotti.
Description in English
48 kilometers along a cross country path with an altitude which requires  good preparation and management of physical strength, having a positive difference in level of 2.300 meters. But this is also a very passionate competition for all the Champions who participate. A route that traverses wild nature and hidden fascinating places as the  First World War trails which makesit a challenging excursion. Along the 48 km will be crossed:- Asolo historic center, one of the most beautiful villages in Italy, always a destination for writers, poets, travelers and artists: it is perched in the hills and stands out with its fortress of the twelfth century that offers a very impressive view.- The Venetian Villas and Palladio with the splendid 16th century architectures, seton the slopes and at the foot of the Asolani hills.-Asolo - Maser – Cornuda hills. The hills offer a path immersed in nature, offering wonderful views between the Venetian plain and the Prealpi Trevigiane.- Trenches of the Great War. Along the way up of the various paths remains the permanent memory of the First World War through the trenches and observatory spots.- Asolo Prosecco DOC hills. Famous throughout the world for the various types of wine products.

Un sogno lungo…100....., Tuscany Crossing ValdorciaGli organizzatori nel disegnare il percorso hanno pensato al viaggio dei viandanti e pellegrini che hanno attraversato a piedi questa terra per secoli e al “Sogno”, perchè correre qui, in queste terre, sarà come essere uno di loro “viaggiatori di un tempo che fu” un sogno ad occhi aperti. Le strade che l’attraversano sono le grandi vie che, in epoca romana, univano Roma all’Oltralpe, la Romea, la Cassia, la Francigena percorsa da Sigerico Arcivescovo di Canterbury e da molti illustri viandanti e guerrieri, testimonianza le fortificazioni, i castelli, le Pievi medioevali ancora presenti sul territorio.
Description in English
A dream long ..100 … Tuscany Crossing Valdorcia.Are you dreaming to race an ultra-trail in the sweets Tuscany hills? The "Tuscany Crossing" is a path of 10o miles in a of the most extraordinary UNESCO SITES, one of this unique places is Val d’Orcia with its unbelievable landscapes.The course remembers the journeys of pilgrims that for centuries have traveled in this land that in Roman age connected Rome with the rest of its empire thanks the Romea, Cassia and Francigena roads. Val d’Orcia is rich of castles, fortifications and medieval churches where travelers, pilgrims, warriors and important persons same as Sigerico bishop of Canterbury found refuge.

trail corto nel Parco patrimoni UNESCO della Val d'Orcia
Description in English
short trail in the UNESCO Heritage Park of the Val d'Orcia

Ultra-Trail® Drakensberg 160 (UTD160) is 163km (102 Miles) in length and starts in the Mountain Kingdom of Lesotho where it traverses 73km of high altitude terrain before joining into the UTD100 course at the top of Sani Pass and following the next 90km to Bushman’s Nek.The race will start at Sani Mountain Lodge (The Highest Pub in Africa), at 12h00 on Friday 26th April, and head into Lesotho on a circuitous route that is almost entirely above 3000m (9842ft) in altitude. A number of high points will be passed with the highlight of these being Thabana Ntlenyana at 3482m (11424ft). Thabana Ntlenyana is the highest peak in Southern Africa and the highest point south of Kilimanjaro and tagging it will be a significant milestone for many of the runners. After 73km the runners will return to the Lesotho Border Post at the top of Sani Pass and, after entering South Africa, they then plunge down the Sani Pass and into the trail which traverses the Twelve Apostles for 6km before the long and fast 19km descent down the Khanti Ridge to Premier Resort Sani Pass at 102km.From the Resort the course climbs the beautiful Gxalingenwa Gorge and skirts the front of Ndlovini before dropping down into Cobham Nature Reserve, which at 115km. From Cobham it is a 20km leg that includes the long climb up to Crane Tarn and the descent into Castleburn Farm at the 135km mark. From Castleburn the runners ascend the face of Garden Castle before topping out at Black Eagle Pass and turning toward the iconic Rhino Peak.The final Checkpoint of UTD160 is in the shadow of Rhino Peak at Swiman Hut with 150km in the bank. From Swiman it is a 13km last effort to the finish at Bushman’s Nek Hotel which includes the final big climb from the Mzimude River to the top of Langalibalele Pass and the 5km swoop down to the Hotel.

Ultra-Trail® Drakensberg 100 (UTD100) is 100km in length with 4400m of vertical climb and occupies an altitude window between 1600m and 2865m.The Race Start is at the South African Border Post on the Sani Pass rd at 05h00 on Saturday morning. The first 13km of the race is on the dirt road of Sani Pass which allows the field to spread out before the athletes enter 87km of unbroken mountain trail. The climb to the summit of the Sani Pass includes just over 1000m of vertical climb in the first 8km and the runners top out on the escarpment with the sunrise at 2865m. They then plunge back down the Sani Pass and into the trail which traverses the Twelve Apostles for 6km before the long and fast 19km descent down the Khanti Ridge to Premier Resort Sani Pass.From the Hotel the course climbs the beautiful Gxalingenwa Gorge and skirts the front of Ndlovini before dropping down into Cobham Nature Reserve, which at 50km, is the halfway point of UTD100. From Cobham it is a 20km leg that includes the long climb up to Crane Tarn and the descent into Castleburn Farm at the 70km mark. From Castleburn the runners ascend the face of Garden Castle before topping out at Black Eagle Pass and turning toward the iconic Rhino Peak.The final Checkpoint of UTD100 is in the shadow of Rhino Peak at Swiman Hut with 85km in the bank. From Swiman it is a 15km last effort to the finish at Bushman’s Nek Hotel which includes the final big climb from the Mzimude River to the top of Langalibalele Pass and the 5km swoop down to the Hotel.

Giant’s Cup Uncut (GCU62) is 62km in length with 2400m of vertical climb and occupies an altitude window between 1600m and 2150m. The Race Start is at the Premier Resort Sani Pass at 06h00 on Saturday morning.The GCU62 is a non-stop traverse of the entire Giant’s Cup Hiking Trail which is certified as a 5 Day hike. The event is entirely on mountain trail and provides the runners with a uniquely pure trail running experience. From the Hotel the course climbs the beautiful Gxalingenwa Gorge and skirts the front of Ndlovini before dropping down into Cobham Nature Reserve at the 12km mark.From Cobham it is a 20km leg that includes the long climb up to Crane Tarn and the descent into Castleburn Farm and the halfway point of GCU62. From Castleburn the runners ascend the face of Garden Castle before topping out at Black Eagle Pass and turning toward the iconic Rhino Peak.The final Checkpoint/Aid Station of GCU62 is in the shadow of Rhino Peak at Swiman Hut with 15km left to the finish. From Swiman it is a last effort to Bushman’s Nek Hotel which includes the final big climb from the Mzimude River to the top of Langalibalele Pass and the 5km swoop down to the Hotel.

Sundowner Run (SDR30) is 30km in length with 1200m of vertical climb and occupies an altitude window between 1600m and 2150m.The Race Start is at Castleburn Farm at 14h30 on Saturday afternoon. SDR30 provides runners with the unusual experience of running into the sunset and eventually the dark to provide an opportunity for many to experience night running for the first time. SDR30 participants will also have the potentially inspiring situation of being out on the course with many of the UTD runners as they complete the final third of their day.Athletes will climb the face of Garden Castle and summit Black Eagle Pass as the sun drops behind the iconic Rhino Peak before approaching halfway at Swiman Hut as darkness falls. From Swiman Hut the field will have 15km of night running down to the Mzimude and up Langalibalele Pass to the finish at Bushman’s Nek Hotel.

Cette course organisée à AMIZMIZ (30 minutes de Marrakech) a la particularité de vous emmener sur les sommets du Haut Atlas et dans les profondeurs du pays… Situé sur le versant nord du Haut Atlas, cet Ultra Trail vous transportera là où les vallées fleuries sont parsemées de villages à l’architecture en pisé. Ainsi vous traverserez de très belles forêts de noyers et d’oliviers, des canyons, le barrage de Ouirgane et de multiples cascades remplies d'eau.
Description in English
This race organized in AMIZMIZ (30 minutes from Marrakech) has the distinction of taking you to the peaks of the High Atlas and in the depths of the country ...Located on the northern slope of the High Atlas, this Ultra Trail will transport you where the flowery valleys are dotted with villages adobe architecture.Thus you will cross very beautiful forests of walnut trees and olive trees, canyons, the dam of Ouirgane and multiple waterfalls filled with water.

The Highland Fling is a 53 mile trail race which takes place every year in April.  The route follows the West Highland Way, Scotland’s oldest official long distance footpath, through the Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park.Our aim is to put on an event which will allow as many runners as possible to experience Scotland’s beautiful scenery and also the camaraderie that exists within the Scottish ultrarunning community.

Description:
Dopo la partenza dal paese di Laives ad attraversato il centro abitato, si comincia a fare sul serio, imboccando il sentiero n. 1 (sentiero della via crucis).Passata la settima stazione (mezzavia 5,5 km) si affronta una discesa breve ma tecnica, che porta nelle Vallarsa, da dove si comincia a risalire. A questo punto si percorre l’Alta Via di Laives (panoramica e a tratti tecnica) per poi salire fino al punto più alto del percorso: il maso Högger (1360 mt) e percorrere un bosco meraviglioso che porta al bivio di separazione con il percorso lungo (15,5 km).Da qui inizia la picchiata verso il paese di Laives attraverso una lunga discesa che metterà alla prova le capacità di ogni atleta.
Description in English
Soon after starting in the city center it gets real on hiking trail nr. 1.After passing the seventh station of the pilgrimage hiking trail (Mezzavia 5,5km), you have to pass a short but technical descent, which brings you to the valley “Vallarsa”. There follows a steep ascent. Here you will pass the hiking trail “Alta Via di Laives”, which offers a beautiful view and has difficult, technical passages. After “Alta Via di Laives” you will reach the highest point of the Sky trail, the old and since closed hut “Höggerhof” (1.360m). Thereafter you will run through a beautiful forest, which brings you to a fork in the road that splits the Sky Trail off from the Trail of 51km (15,5km). Here starts the steep descent towards Laives.

1st December 2018 to 15th March 2019: Laives Trail 35€
16th March 2019 to 20th April 2019: Laives Trail 40€

Avec ce nouveau tracé, l'équipe d'Argelès Nature Trail vous propose un parcours inédit, sauvage, panoramique (paysages superbes entre mer et montagne !) avec un maximum de monotraces et une grande variété de terrains.Précision importante : le parcours est tracé au cœur de zones sensibles qu'il conviendra de respecter en suivant rigoureusement le balisage. Afin d'éviter le passage dans la réserve naturelle de la forêt de la Massane (site protégé), l'épreuve traversera le jour de la course un terrain privé dont l'accès est autorisé par le propriétaire à titre EXCEPTIONNEL. Il en est de même sur le secteur du Rimbau aux abords des vignes.Certains sentiers seront donc ouverts uniquement le jour de la course. Pour toutes ces raisons, nous ne mettrons donc pas en ligne la trace Gpx. Cependant, le profil et l'aperçu du parcours vous donneront une idée assez précise des difficultés qui vous attendent et vous permettront d'orienter votre entraînement.

Kilómetro Vertical Solidario en el Pico de Orizaba. Salida en Villas Pico de Orizaba  a 3,352 msnm hacia La Torrecilla Roja  a 4,277 msnm, en donde estará La Meta. La ruta estará señalizada. El regreso al punto de partida lo harán los corredores por su propio pie. El desnivel positivo es de 960 m  (D+ 960m ) y un recorrido de 5.1 Km.
Description in English
Course goes from Villas Pico de Orizaba  at 3,352 msnm to La Torrecilla Roja  at 4,277 msnm, where the run finish. All the course will have signals. Back to start place will be walked by runner by side way by himself . Positive gain is 960 m  (D+ 960m ) and the course  5.1 Km.

Description:
2019南澳55公里越野挑战赛，是粤东地区首届高规格的国际越野赛事。比赛共设三个组别，分别是55公里全程组（累积爬升2543米）、32公里半程组（累积爬升1317米）、18公里初级组（累积爬升710米）。
Description in English
2019 Nan Ao 55 km Trail Race , is the first high-profile international Trail race in eastern Guangdong. There are a total of three groups in the competition, namely, the entire 55 km group (cumulative climb 2543 meters) and the 32 km half group (cumulative climb 1317 meters),and the 18 km junior group (cumulative climb 710 meters).

El SHERRY MARATÓN ofrece una oportunidad única para recorrer Jerez de la Frontera y el mar de viñas que circundan la ciudad y forman parte del Marco de Jerez, participando en una carrera especial a lo largo de la legendaria distancia de 42.195 km.​El SHERRY MARATÓN combina el desafío personal con la oportunidad de descubrir uno de los grandes patrimonios culturales y naturales de España, Jerez de la Frontera y el Marco de Jerez. Los atletas recorrerán las avenidas, calles y plazas más famosas de la ciudad Jerezana y los caminos y carriles más mágicos del manto de viñas del Marco de Jerez.​El Sherry Maratón está pensado para todos los públicos, por ello, podrás disfrutarla andando con la categoría Senderista, o haciendo trekking con bastones con la categoría Nordic Walking e incluso disfrazado si lo tuyo es pasarlo bien y divertirte con un toque de humor.​Además, los corredores disfrutarán durante la carrera de los mejores productos gastronómico de la zona para convertir el Sherry Maratón en una experiencia para los cinco sentidos difícil de olvidar.
Description in English
The SHERRY MARATHON offers a unique opportunity to run through Jerez de la Frontera and the sea of vineyards that surround the city and are part of Jerez, participating in a special race along the legendary distance of 42,195 km.​SHERRY MARATHON combines the personal challenge with the opportunity to discover one of the great cultural and natural heritage of Spain, Jerez de la Frontera and the Marco de Jerez. The athletes will tour the most famous avenues, streets and squares of the city of Jerez and the most magical roads and lanes of the vineyard mantle of the Jerez de la Frontera.​In addition, the runners will enjoy during the race of the best gastronomic products of the area to make the Sherry Marathon an experience for the five senses difficult to forget.​So, come and run the SHERRY MARATHON. You will repeat!

Description: TRAIL DE LA COCHETTE, sur 95% de sentiers et 5% de route, notre parcours de 34,6 km et 1780 mètres de dénivelé positif s'adresse à des trailers entraînés. Le départ sera donné du gymnase de Saint-Jorioz, vous longerez le lac sur les sentiers de la roselières pour prendre la direction de Duingt et traverser le jolie village et entamer une première ascension du Taillefer, puis vous partirez pour l'ascension du col de la cochette, un point de vue magnifique vous y attend. Ensuite vous continurez en direction du Roc des Boeufs pour redescendre sur les hauts de La-Chapelle-Saint-Maurice, puis une nouvelle boucle autour de Saint-Eustache vous amenera au ravitaillement. De là, vous récupérerez la fin du parcours du Trail de la Bauche pour retourner au point de départ lieu de votre arrivée. Une fois fini vous pourrez venir vous restaurer et profiter d'un moment de partage bien sympa en musique.
Entry Fee:

Description: TRAIL DE LA BAUCHE, sur 90% de sentiers et 10% de route. Le parcours de 21 km et 860 mètres de dénivelé positif fera le tour de la vallée du Laudon. Une course qui traversera les communes de Saint-Jorioz, Saint-Eustache, La-Chapelle-Saint-Maurice. Au pied du Semnoz et de la montagne d'Entrevernes, cette course offre un jolie panorama sur le lac d'annecy. Le départ sera donné du gymnase de Saint-jorioz (route du stade) et l'arrivée sera prévue au même endroit, où vous pourrez venir vous restaurer avec notre repas champêtre.​Nos courses passent à proximité immédiate de zones naturelles protégées (Roselières, marais de l’Enfer), zones particulièrement sensibles sur le plan des milieux naturels. A cette époque, période de nidification pour les oiseaux, nous vous demandons d’être vigilant par rapport au respect de la quiétude des lieux, et d’éviter tout déchet, nuisances sonores, cris susceptibles de déranger la faune.Toute pénétration dans les Roselières est interdite.

Description: TRAIL DES CHARMETTES : sur sentier et très peu sur route. Le parcours de 12,3 km et 380 mètres de dénivelé positif remonte le Laudon : rivière affluente du lac d'Annecy qui prend sa source entre le Roc des Boeufs et le Semnoz, au pied du parc naturelle du massif des bauges. Un trail pour tous niveau et qui s'adresse également aux nouveaux arrivant dans le monde du trail ;-) L'arrivée est prévue à l'espace Augustine Coutin de Saint-Jorioz (salle des fêtes - route du laudon) où vous attendra un chaleureux ravitaillement en musique...​Nos courses passent à proximité immédiate de zones naturelles protégées (Roselières, marais de l’Enfer), zones particulièrement sensibles sur le plan des milieux naturels. A cette époque, période de nidification pour les oiseaux, nous vous demandons d’être vigilant par rapport au respect de la quiétude des lieux, et d’éviter tout déchet, nuisances sonores, cris susceptibles de déranger la faune.Toute pénétration dans les Roselières est interdite.Lieu de départ et d'arrivée : Espace Augustine Coutin de Saint-Jorioz (347 Route du Laudon, 74410 Saint-Jorioz)

Description: Una carrera con una dificultad alta, con tramos técnicos que hará disfrutar a los más montañeros, haciendo de Trail Gordón una prueba mágica, con un apoyo incondicional de sus vecinos que seguro que alcanzará el sueño de ser un referente en este mundo del trail.

L’Ultra Trail del Mugello nasce per volontà di un gruppo di appassionati, amanti della natura e della propria terra e dall’Unione Montana dei Comuni del Mugello che gestisce 4 complessi forestali del patrimonio forestale della Regione Toscana. Con una superficie di 110.000 ettari boschivi la Toscana costituisce il 20% di tutte le foreste italiane.I comprensori di competenza dell’Unione Montana dei Comuni del Mugello si estendono dalle porte di Firenze fino ai confini con l’Emilia Romagna e la provincia di Prato e vengono attraversati dalla dorsale appenninica. Luoghi di storia, d’arte e di grande natura. Di queste terre si trovano racconti nell'opera di Dante, il quale fu esiliato qui da Firenze. E sempre qui ebbero i loro natali Giotto e Beato Angelico.Con queste premesse è nata l’idea di realizzare un tracciato permanete per chi vuole percorrerlo anche al di fuori di questa manifestazione.Il luogo dove si svolge l’Ultra Trail del Mugello è il complesso denominato Giogo-Casaglia e occupa 6.800 ettari delle foreste regionali. Vi è qui un'autentica esplosione di colori, di profumi, di cascate cristalline, un’ambiente naturale e selvaggio quasi unico nel suo genere. Il patrimonio faunistico del complesso, grazie alle norme di salvaguardia previste per le aree demaniali, è particolarmente ricco sia in termini quantitativi che qualitativi. Numerosissima è la presenza di daini e caprioli, ed anche di cinghiali, puzzole, faine, tassi, scoiattoli e molti altri. Ma molto importante è stato l’impegno di riportare il Lupo, che dal 1988 popola questo ambiente come nel passato. Numerosissimi i rapaci, nella Valle del Rovigo nidifica l’Aquila Reale.100% Trail è lo slogan che accompagna un percorso immerso nel cuore dell’Appennino Fiorentino. Due le distanze, 60 e 23.5 km, rispettivamente UTM con 3200m e MT con 1280m di dislivello positivo.L’asfalto viene toccato solo per 300 metri, percorrendo il rimanente principalmente su single track, mulattiere e stradelli forestali.Il percorso tocca 7 tra rifugi alpini e bivacchi che nell’occasione ospiteranno il pubblico e saranno basi vita per ristori e soccorsi.
Description in English
The Ultra Trail del Mugello was the joint brainchild between ultra running enthusiasts and nature lovers proud of their land, and the Mugello Union of Mountain Municipalities. The Union manages 4 forests encompassing 110,000 hectares total. These parts are part of the patrimony of forests of Tuscany, and Italian region which accounts for 20% of all Italy’s forests.The Union of Mugello Mountain Municipalities manages districts stretching from the outskirts of Florence to the border of Emilia Romagna and the province of Prato. The great ridgeline of the Apennines crosses each, and they are places rich in history, art and abundant nature. From these lands were born some of the greatest artists such as Giotto and Fra Angelico, and Dante drew inspiration from the lands, where he was exiled from Florence.With this rich history in mind, a permanent trail was created for anyone who wishes to travel it, even outside of this event.The host site of the Ultra Trail del Mugello is the Giogo-Casaglia district, which encompasses 6,800 hectares of regional forests. These forests house an explosion of colors and scents, with crystal clear waterfalls; it’s practically a one of a kind natural and wild landscape.The forest fauna, thanks to regulations protecting these lands, is particularly rich both quantitatively and qualitatively. Home to numerous deer and roe deer, wild boar, skunk, weasel, badger, squirrel and many other fauna, it’s also become home again, since 1988, to a wolf population, thanks to reintroduction efforts to bring the environment back as it was in the past. There are also many birds of prey; in particular, in the Rovigo valley there exist Golden Eagle nesting grounds .100% Trail is the slogan of the racecourse nestled in the heart of the Florentine Apennines; two races UTM and MT, with respective distances of 60km and 23.5km, and respective elevation gains of 3200m and 1280m.The race only touches asphalt for 300 meters, whereas the bulk is run on single track, mule trails, and forest roads.The route passes 7 mountain huts and bivouacs, which during the race will host refueling/refreshment points, as well as be the base of operations for safety personnel.

Настоящий горный бег в городской черте мегаполиса. Вас ждут самые, самые трейловые живописные трассы с разнообразным рельефом и покрытием.Ну конечно не забываем что есть дистанция для новичков любого уровня и возраста 7 км вдоль живописных скал реки Патрушиха.
Description in English
This mountain run in the city limits of the megalopolis. You are waiting for the most, most trail scenic trails with a variety of terrain and coating.Of course, we don’t forget that there is a distance for beginners of any level and age of 7 km along the picturesque rocks of the Patrushikha River.
KTR CAMPOS DO JORDÃO

A proposta da KTR Series, é proporcionar aos atletas uma experiência diferente nas montanhas da região serrana da serra da mantiqueira e na Ilhabela. São três opções de percurso: a prova longa com cerca de 42km, a prova média com cerca de 21km e a prova curta com 12km. A prova longa é para aqueles que querem superar seus limites de brutalidade.  
Description in English
The proposal for the KTR Series,  is to offer to to athletes a different experience on the mountains and trails of the Serra da Mantiqueira and the Island of Ilhabela.  There are 3 different courses with the main event always having around 40k. The main event is for those who wish to overcome its limits of brutality.
“石野”100公里线路从石家庄西部太行山开始，线路包括公路、山野小径、山间石阶、岩壁和连续爬坡山地路段在内的各种地形。涵盖了石家庄西部山脉的主要山地，翻越数十个山头、八个峡谷，山间路径荆棘、灌木较多.《跑者世界》杂志介绍此赛事为目前国内最野、最虐、最残酷的百公里越野赛。

Бег и fun - это фестиваль бега ROSA RUN!Вертикальный километр, командный квест, костюмированный забег и самый красивый трейл – 4 дня бегового сумасшествия!Трейловая дистанция для тех, кто любит крутые подъемы и скоростные спуски. На маршруте тебя ждут и снег, и камни, и весенние цветы.
Description in English
The first and only 4-day running festival in Russia!Run on the territory of a beautiful all-year-round mountain resort with a stunning scenery.Vertical kilometer, a team quest, a DISCO style costume run and a picturesque trail – all packed in 4 days of running obsession!A mountain trail for those who like steep rises and high-speed slopes. There are boulders, spring flowers and snow areas waiting for you along the course. Course details are coming soon.

Бег и fun - это фестиваль бега ROSA RUN!Вертикальный километр, командный квест, костюмированный забег и самый красивый трейл – 4 дня бегового сумасшествия!Забег на вершину горы Роза Пик по экстремальной трассе из земли, камней и снега. максимальный набор высоты — более 1150 м. Собери волю в кулак и попробуй покорить вершину!
Description in English
The first and only 4-day running festival in Russia!Run on the territory of a beautiful all-year-round mountain resort with a stunning scenery.Vertical kilometer, a team quest, a DISCO style costume run and a picturesque trail – all packed in 4 days of running obsession!Run to the Rosa Mountain Peak along the extreme course containing soil, stones and snow, the maximum height gained being over 1150 meters. It takes guts to conquer the peak!
