Description: The Costa Brava Stage Run is a 3 day stage race beginning in Blanes and finishing in Portbou. It offers the possibility to follow the Costa Brava in a trail-running race next to the sea, following the GR92 and going through landscapes that you will never forget. We will offer two registration options, one without accomodation, and another in hotels.

La Costa Brava Stage Run es una carrera de 3 etapas comenzando en Blanes y acabando en Portbou. Ofrece la posibilidad de recorrer la Costa Brava siguiendo el GR92 y pasando por lugares que nunca olvidarĂŠis. Ofrecemos dos opciones de inscripciĂłn, una sin alojamiento, y otra en hoteles; las dos opciones incluyen la cena.
Description in English
The Costa Brava Stage Run is a 3-day stage race beginning in Blanes and finishing in Portbou. It offers the possibility to run along the Costa Brava following the GR92 and going through places that you will never forget. We will offer two registration options, one without accomodation, and another in hotels. Dinner every night included.

Najteža trka koju nudimo. Ono što Kozaru posebno izdvaja jeste hladovina visokih četinara i stavlja je u red rijetkih planina na kojima će trkači preko 80% dužine staza biti zaštićeni od direktnog udara Sunčevih zraka. Borove iglice, kao posute po stazama, stvaraju potpuno prirodnu trim stazu idealnu za trkače. Ovaj staza je vrlo zahtjevna i ne bi je trebalo olako shvatiti.Opis:- dužina staze: 103.23 km- okupljanje: Kozara – Mrakovica, 03. maj 2019., u 22:30h- start: Rajkovići, 03. maj 2019., u 23:59h- cilj: Kozara – Mrakovica- okrepne stanice: 8 - vremenski limit: 30 sati- broj učesnika: 100- Napomena: Preporučuje se da takmičari na 100 km imaju kod sebe hranu od 600 kalorija, (2 gela + 2 energetske čokoladice).* Napomena: za sve takmičare će biti osiguran prijevoz do starta trke.
Description in English
The hardest race we offer. What distinguishes Kozara is the shade of  high coniferous trees and places it in the ranks of rare mountains where racers, on over 80% of the length of the track, will be protected from the direct impact of the sun's rays. Pine needles, as they are spread down on tracks, create a completely natural trim track ideal for racers. This course is very demanding and should not be taken easily.Description:- length of the track: 103.23 km- gathering: Kozara – Mrakovica, May 3,  2019., at 22:30h- start: Rajkovići, May 3, 2019, at 23:59h- finish: Kozara – Mrakovica- refreshment check-points: 8 - time limit: 30 hours- number of participants: 100- Warning: It is recommended that competitors on 100 km have 600 calories of food, (2 gels + 2 energy bars).* Note: For all competitors will be provided transport up to the start of the race.

Startnina od 01.02.2018. godine 110KM (56.25 €)

Description:
Najljepša trka koju nudimo. Iako spada u niže planine, Kozara svojim prostranstvom, ljepotom, izvorima pitke vode i izraženim bogatstvom flore i faue dominira u ovom dijelu zemlje. Staza je vrlo zahtjevna i velika prilika za trkače koji su manje iskusni u trail trkama.Opis:- dužina staze: 38.48 km   - okupljanje: Kozara – Mrakovica, 04. maj 2019., u 04:30h- start: Rajkovići, 04. maj 2019., u 06:00h- cilj: Kozara – Mrakovica- okrepne stanice: 4- vremenski limit: 13 sati- broj učesnika: 200* Napomena: za sve takmičare će biti osiguran prijevoz do starta trke.
Description in English
The most beautiful race we offer. Although belongs to the group of lower mountains, Kozara is dominating in this part of the country with its vastness, beauty, sources of drinking water and its richness of flora and fauna. The track is very demanding and is a great challenge for runners who are a little less experienced in trail racing.Description:- length of the track: 38.48 km - gathering: Kozara - Mrakovica, May 4, 2019, at 04: 30h- start: Rajkovići, May 4, 2019, at 06:00h- finish: Kozara - Mrakovica- refreshment check-points: 4- time limit: 13 hours- number of participants: 200* Note: For all competitors will be provided transport up to the start of the race.

Description:
Staza nije jako zahtjevna i obilaziti će kako istorijske tako i prirodne lokalitete i time zadovoljiti početnike, rekreative i vrhunske sportiste.Opis:- dužina staze: 19.32 km- okupljanje: Kozara – Mrakovica, 04. maj 2019., u 06:30h- start: Rajkovići, 04. maj 2019., u 08:00h- cilj: Kozara - Mrakovica- okrepne stanice: 2- vremenski limit: 8 sati- broj učesnika: 250* Napomena: za sve takmičare će biti osiguran prijevoz do starta trke.

Description:
Poços de Caldas conhecida como a cidade turistica será palco da 2º STAGE INSANE, considerada a prova mais dura e seguindo os padrões TTRA o nível técnico só tende a melhorar.
Description in English
Poços de Caldas known as the tourist city will be the stage of the 2rd STAGE INSANE, considered the toughest race and following the TTRA standards the technical level only tends to improve.

Poços de Caldas conhecida como a cidade turistica será palco da 2º STAGE INSANE, considerada a prova mais dura e seguindo os padrões TTRA o nível técnico só tende a melhorar.
Description in English
Poços de Caldas known as the tourist city will be the stage of the 2rd STAGE INSANE, considered the toughest race and following the TTRA standards the technical level only tends to improve.

un trail authentique qui vous plongera au coeur du parc naturel des 2 Ourthe à la découverte de sentiers et paysages sauvages dont nous seuls avons le secret. - 4 parcours réellement trail pour satisfaire du débutant à l'ultra-traileur. - une organisation par des traileurs locaux pour des traileurs de tous horizons.- un partenariat avec des associations et des artisans locaux pour mettre en avant notre savoir-faire et nos produits ardennais.- des prix démocratiques dont les bénéfices profitent à une oeuvre caritative.- une épreuve du Challenge Haute Ardenne Trail (CHAT) dont nous partageons et soutenons la philosophie et l'implication.
Description in English
- an authentic trail that will immerse you in the heart of the 2 Ourthe natural park to discover trails and wild landscapes that we alone have the secret.- 4 courses really trail to satisfy the beginner to the ultra-traileur.- an organization by local trailers for trailers of all horizons.- a partnership with associations and local artisans to highlight our expertise and our Ardennes products .- democratic prizes whose profits benefit a charity.- Challenge of the Haute Ardenne Trail Challenge (CHAT) whose philosophy and commitment we share and support.

Carrera a pie de 45km, unos 3450 m de desnivel positivo y unos 3450m de desnivel negativo; que consiste en dar una vuelta circular al corazón de laSierra Espadán pasando por los términos de Alcudia de Veo, Suera y Aín.
Description in English
45km walking race, about 3450 m of positive height gain and about 3450m of negative height difference; which consists in giving a circular return to the heart of theSierra Espadán going through the terms of Alcudia de Veo, Suera and Aín.
Entry Fee:
33€ Federados FEDME, AETRAIL.
38€ No federados FEDME, AETRAIL.

Description:
Carrera a pie de 21km, unos 1500 m de desnivel positivo y unos 1500m de desnivel negativo; que consiste en dar una vuelta circular al corazón de laSierra Espadán pasando por el término de Alcudia de Veo.
Description in English
21km on foot, about 1500 m of positive height gain and about 1500m of negative height difference; which consists in giving a circular return to the heart of theSierra Espadán passing through the municipality of Alcudia de Veo.
Entry Fee:
18€ FEDERADOS FEDME / AETRAIL
20€ NO FEDERADOS FEDME / AETRAIL

Description: Registration Instructions: Available in IMRA PURCHASES - Opeing date TBCRace Number: You must have a race number or know your race number to collect your race pack on the morning. We will not be able to look for your race number online! If you do not have a physical number with you on the day, please bring the print out of membership confirmation and we will write you one.Sign In: From 5:30am to 6:10am strictly. Briefing at 6:15am in HallSafety Kit: There is a mandatory safety kit for all competitors, consisting of a rain jacket, a mobile phone, and a water bottle (with 250ml capacity). Any competitor seen not carrying these items at any stage in the race will be disqualified. There are no exceptions to this rule!Drop Bags: For the Ultra, 2 drop bags can be given for Kilfinnane at 21km and Ballyorgan at 42km. For the Marathon 1 drop bag can be given for Ballyorgan at 21km. Bags should be labelled. No responsibility is taken for the contents of the bags.Bags should be placed at appropriate points in hall before 6:15amAid stations: There will be a number of aid stations on route with water and snacks. Note that there will be no cups available, and all competitors must carry a bottle for this reason.Cut off times: Kilfinnane 21km 9:15am, Ballyorgan 42km 12:30.

Follow in Sir Hubert Wilkinsâ footsteps as you run your way over the Pound wall, across ancient lake beds, through rocky valleys, and along grassy trails in the shadows of the Ranges.All of the races will take in the best the Ranges has to offer by foot, and will most definitely fill you with awe at least once! The history of the area is easy to see as it is evident everywhere. Join us in appreciating the bond that the Adnyamathanha people have had with this land for thousands of years, and be taken in by the Welcome To Country ceremony at Wilpena Pound Resort on the Friday evening.

Bodom Trail on yksi Suomen suosituimmista polkujuoksuista, keväinen juoksujuhla ja kauden avajaistapahtuma. Mukana myös yrityksille suunnattu joukkuekisa ja yöpolkujuoksu.
Description in English
Bodom Trail has been the most popular trail run in Finland since its debut in 2014 and the first trail event in Finland that crossed the limit of 2000 participants in 2018 in all starts together during two days. An accessible location close to Helsinki, wild and challenging trails, beautiful course and cosy atmosphere make it attractive for both elite runners and beginners. Probably the easiest trail event in Finland to attend for a foreign visitor. Ask for a starting slot in foreigner quota if you missed the open registration.

The 100 mile course is a marked point to point race which takes runners from Richmond in South West London to the centre of Oxford. The course follows the meandering route of the Thames against it's flow and is flat and fast with the majority on groomed paths/ trails and paved pathway. There are some truly stunning sections of the route showing off the best of English riverside scenery and life on the Thames.

The route of the DBB Mountain Rockstar is a course where you can venture several times in the past that features gorgeous trails, green views, rolling pastures, ridges and deep ravines. The scenery is a perfect spot for taking photos, hiking and of course trail running. Mt. Batolusong is a bit difficult in the beginning (until you reach the Mapatag Plateau), but there are ample stop overs for a breather and catch views of the Sierra Madre Mountains.
Entry Fee:
REGISTRATION FEES :
Early bird up to March 01, 2019 : PHP3,750
Regular rate up to April 05, 2019 : PHP3,950
Late rate up to April 12, 2019 : PHP4,100

Description:
Staza Ultra ekstremnog maratona je najteža, ali ujedno i najlepša kružna staza koju vam mi nudimo. Proteže se kroz najživopisnije predele Nacionalnog parka ''Fruška gora''.	Tokom trke, imaćete priliku da osetite sve izazove koji donosi trail trčanje (tehnički zahtevne delove staze po kamenitoj i zemljanoj podlozi, gustu šumu, kretanje u noćnim i otežanim uslovim).	Start i Cilj maratona je na Popovici (omiljeno izletište građana Novog Sada). Duž staze, imaćete priliku da vidite i prođete kroz brojne srednjovekovne srpske manastire: Grgeteg (XV vek), Staro Hopovo (XVI vek), Novo Hopovo (XIV vek), Jazak (XVI vek), Bešenovo (VIII vek). Videćete betonsku građevinu televizijskog releja razrušenu u NATO bombardovanju 1999. godine (tzv. TV toranj), Etno naselje ''Vrdničku kulu'', pregazite brojne potoke, popnete se na najviši vrh Fruške gore (539 m) i silazite niz slap Dumbovačkog potoka.	Staza ne izgleda teško, ali verujte nam da sa pravom nosi naziv Ultra ekstremni maraton. 
Description in English
The route of the Ultra Extreme Trail  is the toughest, but also the most beautiful circular cours that we offer you. It stretches through the most picturesque areas of the National Park "Fruska Gora".	During the race, you will have the opportunity to feel all the challenges of the trail run (technically challenging parts of the track on rocky and earthy surfaces, dense forest, moving at night and difficult conditions).	Start and Finish of the race are on Popovica (a favorite excursion place for the citizens of Novi Sad). Along the path, you will have the opportunity to see and go through numerous medieval Serbian monasteries: Grgeteg (XV century), Staro Hopovo (XVI century), Novo Hopovo (XIV century), Jazak (XVI century), Besenovo (VIII century). You will see the concrete construction of a television relay destroyed in the NATO bombing in 1999 (the so-called TV tower), Ethno village "Vrdnik Tower", overtake numerous streams, climb to the highest peak of Fruška gora (539 m) and descend down the waterfall of the Dumbovo stream.	The 133.7 km long cours with 5.700 m hight difference does not seem to be difficult, but believe us to be rightly called the Ultra Extreme Trail. It brings you 6 UTMB points!

Drugi po dužini maraton koji vam nudimo. 	Od samog starta, staza se proteže kroz izuzetno lepe predele Nacionalnog parka Fruška gora. Podloga je u prvom delu zemljana i izuzetno brza. Kasnije se konfiguracija terena menja i čas ste na usponu, a čas se spuštate. Proćiće te kroz brojne srednjovekovne srpske manastire, pregaziti brojne potoke i uživati u mirisima listopadnih i hrastovih šuma. 	I ako dužina od 107 km sa 4.269 m. visinske razlike ne zvuči previše teško, staza jeste prilično zahtevna, posebno ako imate na umu da poslednju deonicu prelazite noću.
Description in English
Ultra Trail is the second longest trail that we offer you.	From the beginning, the path stretches through the extremely beautiful areas of the National Park Fruška Gora. The foundation is earthy and extremely fast in the first part. Later, the configuration of the terrain changes and some time you are on the rise, and the next time you descend. You will pass through numerous medieval Serbian monasteries, overcome many streams and enjoy the scents of deciduous and oak forests.	If the length of 107 km with 4.269 m. altitude difference does not seems too hard, the track is quite demanding, especially if you have in mind that the last section is overnight. It brings you 5 UTMB points!

Ako odaberete ovu stazu, kretaćete se rutom koja zadire u same istorijske početke nastanka naše manifestacije. Njome su gazili i učesnici prvog održanog maratona daleke 1978. godine, kao i svi oni koji su je prolazili proteklih 40. godina. 	Staza je izuzetno izazovna i lepa, te se svake godine za nju prijavi veliki broj učesnika.
Description in English
If you choose Big East Trail, you will go on a historic route that affects the very beginnings of our manifestation.	The participants of the first trail race held in distant 1978, as well as all those who passed through the past 40 years were running that path.	The trail is extremely challenging and beautiful. Every year, large number of participants are reported to be a part of history.

Ova staza ima svojih draži. Specifična je po tome što je dobro pripremljeni takmičare mogu savladati u toku dana, a da pritom ne zagaze u noć. Druga specifičnost ove staze je što prolazi kroz šumske predele, ali se u isto vreme nalazi u blizini urbanih sredina.
Description in English
This path has its challenges. Its specificity is that it can be overcome by well-prepared competitors during the day, without affecting the night. Another specificity of this track is that it passes through forest areas, but at the same time it is located near urban areas.

Najkraća kružna staza koja vam donosi 2 ITRA poena! Ove godine je po prvi put sertifikovana od strane ITRA. Želja nam je da pružimo mogućnost za učešće, svima onima koji su se do sada oprobali u maratonskim uličnim trkama, kraćim trail trkama ili jednostavno postavljaju pred sebe nove životne izazove.	Ovo je odličan početak za sve one koji imaju ambiciju i planove da se naredne godine oprobaju na dužim distancama našeg planinarskog maratona.
Description in English
Small East Extreme Trail is the shortest circular cours that brings you 2 ITRA points! This year, for the first time, it was certified by ITRA.	Our desire is to provide an opportunity for participation, to all those who have been trained in marathon street races so far, shorter trails or simply posed new life challenges.	This is a great start for those who have the ambition and plans to try the long distances of our trail race next year.

Welcome to the Margaret River Ultra Marathon... providing an incredible journey through the forests, trails, beaches and bluffs on the beautiful Cape to Cape coastline in South West WA.You will run past famous surf breaks, iconic wineries and charismatic coastal villages in a journey that is as magical as the Margaret River region is beautiful.Tackle the race as a solo competitor and run the full 80km course or team up with a group of friends and complete the course as a relay team of up to 5 people doing one (or more) legs each.Whether you're an ultra-marathon rookie or long-distance devotee, make The Margaret River Ultra Marathon your next goal!

Nashville Running Company's Dark Sky 50 presents 50 beautiful miles through Pickett State Park and Big South Fork. The course is mostly runnable on single/double track with a couple of jeep road miles thrown in. Expect creek crossings, rolling hills, a little technical terrain, and amazing views! The race takes you by such landmarks as the Hazard Cave and Natural Bridge at Pickett State Park and John Muir Overlook, Maude's Crack, Charit Creek Lodge, Twin Arches, and Gobbler's Knob in Big South Fork.

Event: Quiroga Trail Challenge - Trail Do Lor 2019
Description:
Formado por dos etapas con diferentes distancias, el Powerade Quiroga Trail Challenge se desarrolla en la sierra lucense de O Courel,  la más antigua de Galicia, un lugar mágico, lleno de misteriosas aldeas, valles profundos, densos bosques y gentes que nos recuerdan, con una mezcla de alegría y nostalgia, a otras épocas. Toda una experiencia de vida.Tanto en el Trail do Castelo como en el Trail do Lor ambas pruebas contarán con 65 km, 42 km, 25 km y 15 km. De esta forma, sea cual sea tu experiencia en las carreras de montaña, encontrarás en el Powerade Quiroga Trail Challenge, una distancia ideal para venir a disfrutar de una experiencia inolvidable en O Courel.
Description in English
Formed by two stages with different distances, the Powerade Quiroga Trail Challenge takes place in the Sierra Lucense de O Courel, the oldest in Galicia, a magical place, full of mysterious villages, deep valleys, dense forests and people that remind us, with a mixture of joy and nostalgia, to other times. A whole life experience.Both the Trail do Castelo and the Trail do Lor both tests will have 65 km, 42 km, 25 km and 15 km. In this way, whatever your experience in mountain races, you will find in the Powerade Quiroga Trail Challenge, an ideal distance to come and enjoy an unforgettable experience in O Courel.
Entry Fee:

Trilhas Do Morro Gaúcho - Iii Etapa 2019

Description:
O percursoO percurso principia na União de Freguesias de Vila Nova de Cerveira e Lovelhe, e passa junto aos passos do concelho e outeiro da forca. Esta fase é toda realizada em meio urbano, cruzando-se com algumas esculturas da Bienal das Artes.A partir daqui, entra-se numa zona de subida em estradão e single track em direcção ao Monte do Espirito Santo. Neste miradouro pode-se contemplar todo o estuário do rio Minho.Daí desce-se rumo à Quinta das Mineirinhas, passando pelo aldeamento existente.Inicia-se então uma das subidas mais técnicas da prova, atravessando zonas rochosas e áridas até ao tomo do limite da Serra da Gávea.Chegando à cumeada, o percurso desenvolve-se num single track de constante sobe de desce, no qual se verifica uma mudança de piso: primeiro de granito e depois xisto/piçarra.Aproximamo-nos assim do Convento de San Payo, onde tem início uma nova subida com mais de 400m D+ em direção vigia do Alto de Pena. Esta subida é praticamente toda em aceiro, no fim da qual encontra-se o 1º abastecimento da prova.Descemos depois pela zona frontal do alto da pena, utilizando um single track onde predomina o granito, em direcção ao lugar de Bagoada (freguesia de Loivo).Entra-se no ribeiro de São Gonçalo (o chamado “Grand Canyon”), ascendendo até à casa da Floresta da Bagoada pelo interior do ribeiro.Passando a casa florestal, desce-se até as antigas Pedreiras da Camararia, ponto onde se inicia nova ascensão, desta feita em direcção ao Alto da Castanheira.Já na zona florestal da freguesia de Sopo, a subida será interrompida por uma descida em direcção ao lugar de Bouça e Carvalha, local onde se encontra o 2º abastecimento junto a uma capela.A prova segue pelo interior da freguesia, percorrendo uma levada de água até ao lugar de Pardelhas.Sobe-se então ao alto da Castanheira, referenciado pelo marco geodésico existente, desce-se (em aceiro) ao vale de Sopo de Baixo, sobe-se à cumeada do alto da Castanheira e volta-se a descer rumo à freguesia de Covas. Esta última descida é toda realizada em estradões, com alguma pedra solta, em direcção à antiga central elétrica de covas. Neste ponto de interesse será contornada a antiga central hídrica e percorrido todo o aqueduto até ao lugar da Costa / São Sebastião, local onde se encontra o 3º abastecimento e barreira horária a cumprir.Após o abastecimento, tem lugar uma subida longa até à eólica nº 5., primeiro ao longo de um ribeiro e, depois, em aceiro até ao seu topo. Alcançada a eólica nº5, realiza-se a descida com destino ao lugar de chãos de Covas (4º abastecimento) e, posteriormente, até à casa florestal de Gondar. Nesta zona realiza-se novo azimute rumo ao Alto de Pena.No Alto da Pena, mais precisamente na eólica nº 4, realiza-se a junção com o Trail de Cerveira—22Km, ponto onde principia a descida em direção à freguesia de Candemilatravés de vários single tracks ao longo dos ribeiros existentes.Na freguesia de Candemil, próximo do Lugar dos Malheiros, volta-se a subir em direção do alto de San Payo, onde se encontra o 5º abastecimento.Percorre-se de seguida a cumeada do Monte da Salgosa em direcção à Serra da Gávea e entra-se na União de freguesias de Nogueira e Reboreda. Aí deparamo-nos com uma descida, primeiro via corta-fogo e depois via single track em pleno pinhal, que termina no6º e último abastecimento nos moinhos da Gávea.A prova continua pelo meio urbano da freguesia de Reboreda antes da ascensão ao Alto do Cervo. Esta subida realiza-se inicialmente em estradão e posteriormente em single track, saudando no seu topo a escultura do Rei Cervo e contornado o penedo dos ninhos.Este local é um dos postais mais conhecidos de VN de Cerveira.Por fim, desce-se para a meta em single track até à capela e parque de merendas da Senhora da Encarnação, segue-se pelo escadório até ao lugar da Serra, sobe-se à Atalaia (monumento histórico) e volta-se a descer por estradão até ao centro urbano de VN de Cerveira, onde se localiza a meta.
Description in English
The course begins in the Union of Parishes of Vila Nova de Cerveira and Lovelhe, passing by the stairway and hill of Forca. This stage is all carried out in urban surroundings, crossing some sculptures of the Biennial of Arts.From here, you ascend on road and single track towards the Mount Of The Holy Spirit. At this point, one can contemplate the entire estuary of the Minho River.From there you descend towards Quinta das Mineirinhas, passing the existing village.Then it begins one of the most technical climbs of the race, crossing rocky and arid zones reaching the limit of Serra da Gávea.Upon arriving at the summit, the course runs on single track of constant ascending and descending, in which there's a change of surface: first granite and then shale.We then approach the Convent of San Payo, where a new ascent begins with 400m D+ towards the watchtower of Alto da Pena. This ascent is practically all done along a firebreaker, at the end of which the first aid station is located.We then descend the frontal face of ​​Alto da Pena, using a single track where the granite predominates, towards the Place of Bagoada in the Parish of Loivo.One then enters the stream of São Gonçalo (the so-called "Grand Canyon"), ascending by the interior of the stream until the House of the Forest of Bagoada.Passing the forest house, you descend towards the old quarries of Camararia, the point where a new ascent begins, this time towards Alto da Castanheira.Already in the forest area of ​​the parish of Sopo, the ascent will be interrupted by a descent towards the place of Bouça and Carvalha, the point where the second aid station is located, next to a chapel.The course runs through the interior of the parish, crossing a water stream (levada) and reaching the Place of Pardelhas.Then it ascends towards the summit of Castanheira, referenced by the existing geodesic landmark, descends through a firebreaker to the Valley of Sopo de Baixo, ascends towards the ridge of the summit of Castanheira and turns back descending towards the Parish of Covas. This last descent is carried out around boulders and upon loose stones, towards the old power station of Poços. At this point of interest, the old hydroelectric power station will be crossed and the entire aqueduct will be traversed towards the Place of Costa / São Sebastião, where the third aid estation will be located.After the aid station, there's a long ascent up to Wind Farm No. 5, first along a creek and then up to its summit.After reaching Wind Power nº5, the descent is made to the Place of Covas (where you will find the 4th aid station), and then to the forest house of Gondar. In this area, a new azimuth is carried out towards Alto de Pena, where the union between the two races (22k and 52k) is made, more specifically in the vicinity of Wind Farm No. 4. From here, a descent begins towards the parish of Candemil through several single tracks along the existing streams.In the Parish of Candemil, near the Place of Malheiros, it rises again towards the summit of San Payo, where the 5th aid station is located.After the summit of Monte da Salgosa, the course runs towards Serra da Gávea and enters the Union of parishes of Nogueira and Reboreda. You then come across a descent, first across a firebreaker and then via single track in the middle of the pine forest, which ends in the 6th and last aid station, located in the windmills of Gávea.The course continues through the urban environment of the parish of Reboreda before ascending to Alto do Cervo. This ascent takes place initially on road and later on single track. Greeting you at its top is the sculpture of the King Deer, crossing Penedo dos Ninhos (Boulder of the Nests), one of the best known postcards of VN de Cerveira. Finally, one descends in single track towards the finish line, reaching the the chapel and picnic area of ​Senhora da Encarnação (Lady of the Incarnation), followed by a staircase towards the Place of the Montanha (Place of the Montain), ascending to Atalaia (historical monument) and descending by road to the urban center of VN de Cerveira, where the finishing line is located.

Description: Distance: 43.2kmAscent: 1,240 metresDescent: 1,240 metresRace Format: Single Day, Single Loop Race - fastest runner wins.Race starts at 10:00 on Sunday, May 5th 2019.Finish line cut off at 17:00.Route Overview:A 43 km, 1,400m elevation clockwise loop of the Kerry Way, starting in Waterville, continuing along the northern side of Lough Currane, crossing the hills at the eastern end of the Lake, ascending Eagle Hill, dropping down to the shore in Derrynane and back around through the saddle by Coomakista to finish in Waterville. A fully way marked route including rough mountainside, single track and tarred road. Stunning area of natural beauty, including majestic sea views, rugged mountain passes and foothills, lake and island vistas, and a fantastic 5km ridge run offering unparalleled views across Ballinskelligs Bay. Maps below.Entry:Cost of entry is âŹ75.Entry fee is non refundable and non transferable.Full race day instructions will be emailed to entrants a minimum of 4 weeks before race day.Included in entry fee:GPS tracker and link to race tracking site.Public liability insurance.Wilderness first responder assistance.Free parking.Fully way marked route.Branded finishers souvenirs.Finish line food and refreshments.

Distance: 12kmAscent: 330 metresDescent: 330 metresRace Format: Single Day, One DirectionA to B race from Derrynane Wildlife Sanctuary Car Park via the Kerry Way to Lough Currane Holiday Homes, Waterville (competitors bussed to starting line) - fastest runner wins.Race starts at 11:00 on Saturday, May 4th 2019.Finish line cut off at 16:00.Route Overview:Starting in Derrynane, this race covers tracks, trails, beaches, fields and a few bits of tarmac too. Stunning views of Derrynane, Kenmare Bay, the Beara Peninsula, Ballinskelligs Bay, the Skelligs and Waterville along the way. With fast grassy ramps, technical single track and some leg screaming and lung busting climbs to challenge runners of all standards.Entry:Cost of entry is âŹ40.Entry fee is non refundable and non transferable.Full race day instructions will be emailed to entrants a minimum of 4 weeks before race day.Included in entry fee:Electronic Timing.Public liability insurance.Bus transfers (if requested).Wilderness first responder assistance.Free parking.Fully way marked route.Branded finishers souvenirs.Finish line food and refreshments.

Run the Prom. Wilsons Promontory National Park offers, Australiaâs most spectacular coastal ultra. Experience the sound of waves crashing on rocks, feel the sand under your feet, the wind in your hair and the water up to your waist as you tackle this wilderness paradise. The Prom 100 offers runners 44, 60 and 100 km run loops only 3.5 hours from Melbourne. The run is all on single track, rock, fire trails and beaches offering spectacular coastal views with approximately 10 km on sealed road. Depending on tide movements it may be necessary to wade across the creeks at both Sealers Cove and Oberon Beach.

Description:
Sábado 29 de junioAonijie Ultramaratón PeténSalida: Frente al Caballo de Piedra en San Miguel  Meta: Isla de Flores PeténRecorrido: Terracería - AsfaltoClima tropical, cálido y húmedoHora de Salida: 4;00 PM 90kEntrega de Kits:Isla de Flores Jueves 27 y Viernes 28 Ciudad Guatemala sábado 22 y domingo 23 No se entregan Kits el día del EventoSede del Evento: Salón Municipal San Nicté (Isla de Flores)Distancias: 90k - 50k - 90k MTB - 21k domingo 30Que incluye: Playera conmemorativa, numero Chip, medalla FINISHER, abastecimiento.Leer másNuestro diseño de logotipo esta inspirado y dedicado a El Jaguar, el felino mas grande de Guatemala que habita en las tierras de Petén.Porcentaje de los fondos estarán destinados para ayudar a  Fundación quienes ayudan a la biodiversidad en especial a El Jaguar a preservar su especie. Ultra Petén en Associación con Expediciones Lucianos unen fuerza para llevar este evento al mas alto nivel de logística en Guatemala, tomando en cuenta la distancia de la ciudad nos atrevemos a brindarles la mejor de las experiencias. Un viaje que puedes programar y visitar los lugares sagrados de nuestros ancestros.
Description in English
Saturday, June 29Aonijie Ultramaratón PeténDeparture: In front of the Stone Horse in San MiguelGoal: Island of Flores PeténRoute: Terracería - AsphaltTropical climate, warm and humidDeparture Time: 4; 00 PM 90kDelivery of Kits:Isla de Flores Thursday 27 and Friday 28Guatemala City Saturday 22 and Sunday 23Kits are not delivered on the day of the EventVenue of the Event: Municipal Hall San Nicté (Island of Flores)Distances: 90k - 50k - 90k MTB - 21k Sunday 30What's included: Commemorative T-shirt, Chip number, FINISHER medal, supply.Read moreOur logo design is inspired and dedicated to El Jaguar, the largest cat in Guatemala that lives in the Peten lands.Percentage of the funds will be destined to help the Foundation who help biodiversity especially El Jaguar to preserve their species.Ultra Petén in Association with Expeditions Lucianos join forces to take this event to the highest level of logistics in Guatemala, taking into account the distance of the city we dare to provide the best of experiences.A trip that you can schedule and visit the sacred places of our ancestors.

La nueva ruta que cruza el volcán Tecuamburro y pasando por laguna de Ixpaco. Vistas hacia cafetales y los arboles mágicos. 
Description in English
The new route that crosses the Tecuamburro volcano and passing through the Ixpaco lagoon. Views towards coffee plantations and magical trees.

La ruta que marco un hito en el trail running de Guatemala.Rodeamos la laguna de calderas, subimos el cerro negro y pasamos corriendo sobre la meseta del Parque Nacional Volcán de papaya.
Description in English
The route that marked a milestone in the trail running of Guatemala.We surrounded the caldera lagoon, climbed the black hill and ran over the plateau of the Papaya Volcano National Park.

A prova “Corvus Trail” tem como objetivo proporcionar aos atletas novas experiências e sensações em trilhos distintos. Este evento irá decorrer nos dias 04 e 05 de Maio de 2019, organizado pelo COA - Clube de Orientação  e  Aventura,  com  o  apoio  da  EPDRA  –  Escola  Profissional  de  Desenvolvimento  Rural  de Abrantes,  da  ACROM  –  Associação  Cultural  das  Rotas  de  Mouriscas  e  do  Município  de  Abrantes  nas vertentes de Trail Longo (TL), Trail Curto (TC), Caminhada e Trail Kids.O  “Corvus  Trail”  é  uma  prova  Certificada  pela  ATRP –  Associação  de  Trail  Running  de  Portugal, reconhecida  pela  ITRA –  International  Trail  Running  Association,  e  integra  a  primeira  edição  do  CTR – Circuito de Trail do Ribatejo que conta com as principais provas do Distrito de Santarém.

Sabaneta, el Vallecito del Encanto es un lugar por descubrir, lleno de costumbres, expresiones, colores, olores y sabores.  Ubicado a 8 km de Medellín y a 1.570 mts de altura, es el más pequeño de los 10 municipios que conforman el Valle de Aburrá.Con una espectacular panorámica de fauna y flora, cafetales, bosques y rios, no cabe duda que el entorno natural del sitio posee uno de los paisajes más hermosos del país.Te invitamos a ser protagonista de esta desafiante carrera en este maravilloso escenario.Entre Valles Trail Run es una carrera por caminos y senderos de montaña, non-stop, de participación individual, que cuenta con 3 distancias para todos los perfiles de atletas: de los debutantes en el trail run y corredores de distancias cortas, a los maratonistas experimentados en largas distancias y desniveles. Es un evento con carácter social, respeto por el medio ambiente, promoción de valores, sana competencia, fomento del deporte y sobre todo, mucho disfrute.Únete a nosotros para vivir tu sueño.
Description in English
Sabaneta, the Vallecito del Encanto is a place to discover, full of customs, expressions, colors, smells and flavors. Located 8 km from Medellín and 1,570 meters high, it is the smallest of the 10 municipalities that make up the Aburrá Valley.With a spectacular panorama of fauna and flora, coffee plantations, forests and rivers, there is no doubt that the natural environment of the site has one of the most beautiful landscapes in the country.We invite you to be the protagonist of this challenging race in this wonderful scenario.Entre Valles Trail Run is a race for paths and mountain trails, non-stop, individual participation, which has 3 distances for all the profiles of athletes: from the beginners in the trail run and short distance runners, to the marathoners Experienced in long distances and unevenness.It is an event with social character, respect for the environment, promotion of values, healthy competition, promotion of sports and above all, a lot of enjoyment.Join us to live your dream.

Il Gran Trail Rensen Ă¨ una competizione di TRAIL RUNNING, corsa in montagna in regime di semi-autosufficienza, ovvero con il solo supporto di alcuni ristori alimentari e idrici, posizionati lungo il tragitto, contraddistinta da percorsi su sentieri montani con dislivelli significativi. La manifestazione Ă¨ composta da tre distinte gare che interessano i sentieri del Parco Naturale Regionale del Monte Beigua: Gran Trail 45 km (mt. 3000 D+), Trail 23 km (mt. 1300 D+) e Mini Trail 12 km (mt. 600 D+)

HANGAWAY is a local term for "Warrior". Antiqueños believe to be the descendants of Datu Sumakwel, the brave Bornean tribe leader believed to have arrived in the island in the 13th century. The finisher of this race is given the title BUSALIAN which is believe to the highest rank, most skilled and wisest among the warriors.

HANGAWAY is a local term for "Warrior". Antiqueños believe to be the descendants of Datu Sumakwel, the brave Bornean tribe leader believed to have arrived in the island in the 13th century. The finisher of this race is given the title HANGKILAN which mean to be a highly-skilled, experienced warrior.
Entry Fee:

Late rate up to Apr 29, 2019 : Php2,500.00 / $50.00

Description:
la course extrême du Techni Trail de Tiranges emprunte un parcours très exigeant de part l’enchaînement d’un grand nombre de difficultés qui emmène les coureurs dans des lieux insolites. Le début de course est peu technique avec des sentiers plutôt roulants jusqu'au premier ravitaillement situé au kilomètre 20. La suite offre de nombreuses parties très techniques ainsi qu’un dénivelé total intéressant de + 5000 mètres. Quelques sentiers plus roulants permettront aux coureurs de se relancer en passant par le saut du Bezan avant d’arriver à la fameuse montée au coeur de la coulée de lave de Bourrianne puis au château médiéval de Chalencon. Ce parcours s’adresse à des coureurs aguerris .Cinq ravitaillements seront proposés. Les accompagnateurs retrouveront leurs coordonnées GPS sur le site du TTT ainsi que celles d'endroits où il est possible de voir passer les courageux concurrents. 
Description in English
The extreme race of the Techni Trail de Tiranges takes a very demanding course because of the chain of many difficulties that takes the runners in unusual places. The start of the race is not very technical with rather rolling trails until the first refueling located at kilometer 20. The suite offers many very technical parts as well as an interesting vertical drop of + 5000 meters. A few more rolling paths will allow the runners to relaunch through the Bezan jump before arriving at the famous climb in the heart of the lava flow of Bourrianne and then the medieval castle of Chalencon. This course is aimed at experienced riders. Five refreshments will be proposed. The companions will find their GPS coordinates on the site of the TTT as well as those places where it is possible to see the courageous competitors pass.

c'est un parcours exigeant lui aussi au cours duquel les parties techniques et les sentiers plus roulants se succèdent. Les coureurs emprunteront la célèbre coulée de lave de Bourrianne avant d’arriver au château médiéval de Chalencon. Deux ravitaillements sont prévus sur ce tracé totalisant un dénivelé positif de + 1476 mètres au coeur de paysages exceptionnels. Leurs coordonnées GPS ainsi que celles d'endroits où il est possible de voir passer les coureurs seront disponibles sur le site du TTT. 
Description in English
It is also a demanding journey during which the technical parts and the more rolling paths succeed one another. The runners will take the famous lava flow of Bourrianne before arriving at the medieval castle of Chalencon. Two refreshments are planned on this route totaling a positive drop of + 1476 meters in the heart of exceptional landscapes. Their GPS coordinates as well as those of places where it is possible to see runners will be available on the site of the TTT.

: ce parcours accessible à tous, définit très bien ce qu'est le trail pleine nature en alternant des chemins plutôt roulants avec quelques parties un peu plus techniques et en totalisant un dénivelé positif de + 572 mètres. Le tracé emmènera les coureurs dans des lieux somptueux en proposant notamment un ravitaillement au château médiéval de Chalencon dont les coordonnées GPS seront sur le site du TTT.

Description: Un trail de 36 kilomètres, sans aucun doute exigeant. Un profil « très agité » vous attend, pour un dénivelé de 1800 mètres. Vous rejoindrez les hauteurs du Livradois par des sentiers escarpés avec des vues somptueuses sur le massif du Sancy et le Puy-de-Dôme avant de redescendre sur Sauxillanges.Ce parcours, très varié dans son tracé, va tenir éveillé le trailer du début à la fin.Attention à bien gérer votre effort, pour en garder sous la semelle.  Le trail offre aux coureurs encore plus de proximité avec la nature. Vous en aurez plein les mollets, mais aussi plein les yeux !!
Entry Fee: 16 euros + 3 euros le jour de la course

Description: Un beau parcours tout sauf monotone de 23 kms pour un dénivelé positif de 1070 m. Le profil du tracé : escarpé et "agité" du début à la fin. Ne vous fiez pas aux altitudes moyennes de ce parcours qui vous réserve de belles surprises. Le Livradois ne va pas s'offrir à vous sans vous demander de donner de votre personne. lI éveillera à chaque instant les sens du trailer. Ce parcours vous fera découvrir des sections hors pistes, techniques et ludiques pour admirer le massif du Sancy et le Puy de Dôme . Un vrai plaisir de courir vous attend au cœur d'une nature en pleine effervescence et de magnifiques paysages.
Entry Fee:
14 euros jusqu'au 3 mai à 19h00
Supplément 3 € pour toute inscription dimanche 5 mai

Description: Un parcours de 12 kms pour un dénivelé positif de 500 mètres, accessible à tous sur le plan technique, mais néanmoins exigeant.Un parcours attractif de bout en bout par sa grande variété de paysages, ses passages en sous-bois, la succession de côtes et descentes, et ses parties successivement techniques ou agréables à courir.
Entry Fee:
11 euros en solo
22 euros en duo

Description: A 25min au sud de Bruxelles, le Trail des Cisterciens exploite admirablement la région la plus vallonnée du Brabant Wallon. Parcours extrêmement varié à 86% sur chemin et sentiers de terre, vous alternerez entre passage dans les bois et traversée de plateaux agricoles. Sur le 34km c'est 19 côtes qui sont au programme avec des dénivelés variant de 20m à 55m.

A 25min au sud de Bruxelles, le Trail des Cisterciens exploite admirablement la région la plus vallonnée du Brabant Wallon. Parcours extrêmement varié à 85% sur chemin et sentiers de terre, vous alternerez entre passage dans les bois et traversée de plateaux agricoles. Sur le 19.5km, la distance la plus courte, c'est pas moins de 11 côtes qui sont répertoriées avec des dénivelés variant de 20m à 55m pour vous proposer des montagnes russes et des relances en permanence.

Event: Travesia De Los Cerros - Homenaje Raul Elgueta 2019 2019
Race: Travesia De Los Cerros - Homenaje Raul Elgueta - 60K
Description:
Travesía de los Cerros es una carrera de Trail Running 100 % montaña, en donde podrán atravezar distintas dificultades, como nieve, cruce de arroyos y zona de mallines. Pero a su vez podrán disfrutar de los más hermosos paisajes y vistas que nos ofrece nuestra Patagonia. Por ultimo, está carrera es en homenaje a nuestro compañero e impulsor del Grupo de Rescate BRZA Raúl Elgueta. 
Description in English
Travesía de los Cerros is a Trail Running race 100% mountain, where you can go through different difficulties, such as snow, crossing streams and mallines area. But at the same time you can enjoy the most beautiful landscapes and views that our Patagonia offers us. Finally, this race is in tribute to our partner and promoter of the Rescue Group BRZA Raúl Elgueta.

Description: Com largada na sede Pau da Fome do Parque Estadual da Pedra Branca, o percurso iniciará por um curto trecho de asfalto até a entrada da trilha da Casa de Pedra, quando começa uma subida insana pela estrada das torres até a lendária Casa de Pedra. Na sequência teremos um downhill em single track até a sede Rio da Prata no bairro de Campo Grande, onde será o ponto de corte da prova.Do Rio da Prata seguiremos em direção ao Pico da Pedra Branca, cume da cidade do Rio de Janeiro, passando por sítios, cachoeiras e pela lendária Casa Amarela em um percurso 100% single track até chegarmos de volta à sede Pau da Fome. ​Tipos de terreno: 8% asfalto, 22% estrada de terra, 70% trilha single track

The Pembrokeshire 100 mile race is a challenging ultra-race along the stunning Pembrokeshire Coastal Path from Dale to St Dogmaels. The Pembrokeshire Coastal Path is a designated national trail and is widely regarded as the most breathtaking coastline in Britain-from rugged cliff tops and sheltered coves to wide-open beaches and winding estuaries.Â  This 100 mile race represents a formidable physical challenge set against a rugged, beautiful backdrop - one seasoned 100 mile runner said "that was the hardest Coastal 100 mile race I've done"!Â  The race starts in the pictureseque village of Dale, just outside Milford Haven and follows the Pembrokeshire Coast Path to the finish in St Dogmaels

"PREMIERE ÉDITION DU MYTHIQUE JURA SWISS TRAIL. Né d'un groupe de passionnés des sentiers du Jura Nord Vaudois, nous avons imaginés pour tous les amoureux du Trail Running, trois jolis parcours panoramiques au travers des sommets Nord Vaudois.C'est dans cet état d'esprit que nous voulons partager avec vous nos féériques sentiers qui vous offrirons une vue imprenable sur le plateau, le lac ainsi que sur les pré-alpes.Trois parcours conçus pour dépasser vos limites, du Suchet au Chasseron en passant par les aiguilles de Baulmes :19K - 35K - 55K"						 
Description in English

We have imagined for trail running lover three nice course with panoramic view through summits of Nord Vaudois. 19 km - 35 km and 55 km to discovers wild nature off the beaten track.

Description:
赛道坐落于玉龙雪山南侧，以玉龙雪山经典徒步线路为主。起终点位于白沙古镇，路线途经冰川风格的干河坝、玉龙大峡谷、玉柱擎天、玉龙第一峰以及丽江高山植物园。赛道整体海拔处于2400m-4460m之间，既有简单的土路和高山小径，也包含有一定技术难度的高山碎坡，赛道风光糅合了冰蚀湖、高山草甸、雪域冰川、原始森林在内的多重景观。无与伦比的高山赛道，迷人的雪域风光，一望无际的开阔视野，尽在2019玉龙雪山超级越野赛。
Description in English
The race course is set on the southern side of the Jade Dragon Snow Mountain, with a major part set on the snow mountain’s classic hiking route. It starts and finishes at Baisha Ancient Town, and takes the participants through glacier style Ganhe Dam,Yulong Grand Canyon,Skyreach Pilla,Yulong Peak and Lijiang Alpine Botanical Garden. At an altitude between 2,400m and 4,460m, the race course is a mix of off road, single track and rugged slope with certain technical difficulties. Scenes along the course are varied: glacial erosion lake, alpine meadow, virgin forest, etc... The incomparable mountain track, the stunning snow scenery, the great horizons, all these lend charm to 2019 Lijiang SkyView Adventure.

赛道坐落于玉龙雪山南侧，以玉龙雪山经典徒步线路为主。起点在玉柱擎天，终点在白沙古镇，线路途经玉龙大峡谷。赛道整体海拔处于2400m-4460m之间，既有简单的土路和高山小径，也包含有一定技术难度的高山碎坡，赛道风光糅合了冰蚀湖、高山草甸、原始森林在内的多重景观。无与伦比的高山赛道，迷人的雪域风光，一望无际的开阔视野，尽在2019玉龙雪山超级越野赛。
Description in English
The race course is set on the southern side of the Jade Dragon Snow Mountain, with a major part set on the snow mountain’s classic hiking route. It starts at Skyreach Pilla and finishes at Baisha Ancient Town, and takes the participants through Yulong Grand Canyon. At an altitude between 2400m and 4460m, the race course is a mix of off road, single track and rugged slope with certain technical difficulties. Scenes along the course are varied: glacial erosion lake, alpine meadow, virgin forest, etc... The incomparable mountain track, the stunning snow scenery, the great horizons, all these lend charm to 2019 Lijiang SkyView Adventure.

Розкрий усі таємниці Великого лісу
Description in English
An Inspiringly Awesome (but Tough) Trail Running Challenge in the "Hidden Gem" of Europe. LUT (Lviv Ultra-Trail®) is Ukraine's finest, longest, and most challenging city trail event in the format trail ultra XL. This inspiring trail race starts on the cobblestones right in the heart of the the Ensemble of the Historic Centre (listed in UNESCO World Heritage List) but quickly makes its way into trail running heaven in the surrounding foothills. Along the way, there is over 3500 meters of total vertical gain to be accomplished - this is more than many mountain ultras of similar distance have! The trail, created by veteran trail runners, is diverse underfoot with plenty of varied technical sections specifically chosen for interest and variety. As you proceed from checkpoint to checkpoint you'll both be never too far from civilization and yet also in a completely different world of nature, hidden spots of natural beauty and historic interest, and more. With a generous time limit, some participants may find themselves running into the night. Come experience the history and nature of charming Lviv in a race that's easy to get to - the start line is just 20 minutes from the airport. Join us and the community of some of Ukraine's finest ultra runners for an inspiring and challenging race! Number of race slots strictly limited. If you interested please sign up via lvivultratrail@gmail.com

An Inspiringly Awesome (but Tough) Trail Running Challenge in the "Hidden Gem" of Europe. VLT is the showcase, premier race of the Ukrainian series in 2019. This is a tough 70+ km challenge with as much or more total vertical gain as mountain races of similar length. VLT willtake you through some amazing and diverse scenery. Underfoot, the trail is as interestingand challenging as any you'll find anywhere - you really can expect to be pleasantly surprised here. This is not an easy race, but it's great both inherently as a race unto itself or as anearly-season training challenge for those who will be doing longer and/or technical raceslater in the summer. This race is solely for those with some trail running experience.Time limits are tough but fair, and have been set for most people to finish under moderatelymuddy conditions. If you are coming from abroad, we encourage you to sign up for thisdistance - you will not be disappointed.

LTM is a race at marathon distance.  It is open to all racers, even those without trail running experience.   The time limits and terrain here are such that it can *almost* be walked for much of its length and you'll still have a decent chance at finishing, especially if it's dry.  However, this is still a very serious trail challenge, especially if it's muddy.  It goes through some spectacular scenery and passes by some 'secret' landmarks in the Lviv area.   We expect that most foreign runners will opt for either the LTM or the VLT race.  Either is fine, though we do suggest that if you are considering both races and you are an experienced trail runner that you indeed go for the longer distance as that course is something special indeed.

An Inspiringly Awesome (but Tough) Trail Running Challenge in the "Hidden Gem" of Europe. CST is the perfect approximate half-marathon distance race for those who are ready for a bit more of a challenge. This includes those who have never run a trail race before.   Again, if you are a road runner unused to trails, you can expect that your time will be roughly 1.5 to 2x your road running time for a comparable distance. The CST race features a single refreshment point, roughly halfway, where you can fill up on water and a few snacks to help you on your way.   If you've never run trails before, this is a great challenge and you will feel a great sense of accomplishment even at this distance. CST passes by some very impressive and quite hidden Lviv landmarks.

Retour à un départ à 5h00 du matin pour cet Ultra revisité.Départ de Lalinde pour vous diriger assez rapidement vers le terrible sentier du Coulobre. Gageons que vous saurez vous faire discret afin de ne pas réveiller la bête. Une fois sortie de ce monotrace interminable vous vous dirigerez directement vers le Chateau de Lanquais appelé aussi "le louvre inachevé" où le 1er des 8 ravitaillements vous attends. Puis direction la grande nouveauté de ce parcours avec quasiment 35 km de traces ouvertes pour l'occasion. Monsac, Naussannes puis Beaumontois en Périgord s'ouvrent à vous .S'en suis Saint Avit Sénieur que nous retrouvons cette année après une apparté en 2018. De là vous reviendrez sur le majestueux château de Bannes. Ouvrez bien les yeux car à l'heure où vous passerez il devrait être baigné de soleil. Direction Bourniquel , la Motte puis la base de vie situé au km 58 à Molières. déjà 11 de course pour quelques uns alors que les 1ers seront sûrement passés en 5h de course!!!Direction Cales par un raccourci pour se diriger sur Trémolat où l'arrivée se fait proche . Il ne vous restera plus que 17 km et 400+. Ouvrez bien les yeux car le montrace qui longe la rivière est juste magique tout comme l'implantation de ce dernier ravitaillement au théâtre de Mauzac qui surplombre la rivière et son barrage .Il ne restera alors "que" 10 km pour rallier Lalinde par le GR. Un dernier km en descente vous permettra de savourer l'aventure effectuée.

La nouveauté du Trail des Bastides réside essentiellement sur un départ de la ville de Lalinde pour une arrivée à la Guillou .Après un départ sûrement un peu rapide vous entrerez directement dans le vif du sujet avec le terrible passage du COULOBRE , gare à vous car il veille nuit et jour sur la rivière Dordogne. Une fois sorti de ses griffes , vous tenterez de rallier Molières , en passant par le hameau de La Motte,afin de vous ravitailler. Attention à ceux qui se sont fait retenir par la bête , une barrière horaires risque de les stopper à ce 17 ème kilomètre.Puis une partie plus tranquille vous permettra de vous dégourdir les jambes afin d'arriver au pied du barrage de Mauzac situé aux portes de Cales . Un ravitaillement vous y attend mais ne tardez pas de trop car Trémolat vous attend.Puis vous arpenterez de magnifiques montraces en surplomb de la rivière, attention le vertige!!! Respirez bien et tentez de reprendre du souffle car le "mur perigourdin " vous tend les bras. Les mains sur les cuisses vous vous hisserez tout en haut. Il sera difficile de retrouver du rythme mais ne vous inquiétez pas, les copains ne sont pas mieux.Puis vous voilà à Mauzac . Surtout profitez du spectacle qu'offre ce théatre qui surplombe la rivière et son barrage . Dès lors il ne vous restera que 10 km et  300+ pour rejoindre Lalinde par le GR .

Description:
野獸山徑是在繁華熱鬧的大台北都會週邊的野生大自然裡，這是台灣第一個挑戰模式的賽事，路線是由對山徑越野非常癡迷及狂熱的山跑者所規劃設計:台灣跑山獸。賽道引領在非常深處的原始林，具有技術性及困難度。最長的組別為半自助模式，參賽選手需要攜帶完整的裝備及充足的跑步技巧，賽道裡有一段瀝青的路徑，深厚樹林及陡嶢的攀爬路線..等雖然沒有正式對最長距離賽程的要求，但是每一位參賽者必須考量自己的技能及身體狀況。主辦單位鼓勵大家能成賽事及開放兩人或以上組成的團體組。從這場賽事，您將獲得跑在新型態山徑路線寶貴的經驗，野獸模式及更有經驗準備下一場挑戰。
Description in English
The Beast Trail is designed in very wild nature of Taipei surrounding. It is definitely first race of challenge type in Taiwan. It was designed by obsessed trail runners, Taiwan Beast Runners. Race course leads in deep forests trails of Taiwan with very technical parts and many difficulties. The longest category is semi-autonomy and it requires carry full equipment and adequate physical skills of runners to cover this. There is a minimum of asphalt routes, but lot deep woods with steep climbs.There are not official requirements for longest course, but everybody has to consider own skills. Organizers encourage finish this course and opened category for team of two or max. three runners. In this race you will get priceless experiences in new style of trail running, Beast Style and be ready for another challenge.

Description:
carrera muy dura, sólo para corredores con experiencia en montaña
Description in English
very hard only for trail runners with mountain experience

Аз съм величествена. Аз съм могъща. Аз съм красива. Иска се желание и упоритост, за да ме покориш, но си струва всяка крачка от пътя, който ще извървиш, за да го направиш. Ще взема дъха ти, ще накарам кръвта ти да бушува, но накрая...накрая ще се слеем в едно и ще разкрия пред теб нови хоризонти. Ще почувстваш отново хармонията, за която толкова си копнял. И когато там горе на върха видя усмивката ти ще знам, че съм успяла - че съм те направила малко по-добър, малко по-силен и че отново ще се върнеш при мен.Аз съм КОДЖА КАЯ.
Description in English
Kodzha Kaya is the most picturesque competition in Bulgaria. Stunning views and a very hard race.

Description:
Il Madruk Trail si svolge a Vittorio Veneto ed il suo percorso si snoda tra colline,  boschi ed aree di arte e cultura della città e del comprensorio. La gara di circa 1800mD+ e 26Km fa parte del Circuito Trail delle Prealpi Venete.Il Madruk Trail permetterà di accumulare punti ITRA come gara di qualificazione per i più importanti trail internazionali, quali l'Ultra Trail del Monte Bianco (UTMB) o il The North Face Lavaredo Ultra Trail.
Description in English
The Madruk Trail is a race of about 26 km length and approximately 1.800mD+, starting from Area Fenderl in Vittorio Veneto (Italy). Madruk Trail provides a challenging route in Vittorio Veneto forests, during the beautiful spring colors of Venetian Pre-Alps. This is a medium technical trail (due to rocky areas). The trail surface varies from narrow forest trail to wide fire road, gravel, dirt, and paved roads. Several up and downhills are along the course.

Description:
La 5ª edizione del Madruk Trail prenderà il via dal cuore di Vittorio Veneto il 12 maggio 2019. Il percorso, certificato ITRA, sarà di circa 15 Km ed il dislivello toccherà circa i 1200 metri. 
Description in English
Madruk Trail 15 provides a challenging route in Vittorio Veneto forests, during the beautiful spring colors of Venetian Pre-Alps. This is a medium technical trail (due to rocky areas).The trail surface varies from narrow forest trail to wide fire road, gravel, dirt, and paved roads. Several up and downhills are along the course. The total ascent is approximately 1200 m. The length is about 15 Km

O Estrela Grande Trail® é uma prova que percorre os trilhos do Parque Natural da Sera da Estrela, onde irão encontrar os mais duros, mas deslumbrantes, caminhos.Aqui podem encontrar uma serra milenar no seu estado mais puro. Trilhos cheios de histórias que a cada passo são reescritos com a vossa dedicação e vontade de superação.

Aqui, onde tudo é maior que tu, poderás correr por trilhos que se fundem com a história de Portugal. É por esses trilhos, onde Viriato de forma heróica combateu, que te propomos. Este ano será prova de Campeonato Nacional.

Indomit es un Ultra Trail de montaña que se realiza en la provincia de Mendoza; en esta oportunidad Las Leñas será testigo de esta apasionante competencia, que se realizará los días 17 y 18 de Mayo.Indomit cuenta con certificación ITRA (International Trailruninng Association). La competencia incluye las siguientes distancias: 12k, 21k, 35k, 50k, 80k y 100k. Aquellos corredores que opten por las distancias de 100k y 80k deberán presentar un currículum deportivo para la aceptación del mismo en la prueba.

Description: Gian Domenico Nieddu

Vid Löruddens fiskeläger med anor från 1600-talet avgörs andra delen av Sundsvall Trail 2019. Banan bjuder på tekniskt utmanande traillöpning längs en vacker kuststräcka. Släta gnejsklippor, gles knotig tallskog, öppna hedar, klapperstensfält, snabblöpta singletracks och sandstränder. Kuperingen är måttlig, utmaningen och upplevelsen så mycket mer än så
Description in English
One of the most technical and beautiful trail races in Sweden

Med start och mål i Lörudden kommer milbanan bjuda på riktigt fin traillöpning rätt igenom - en utmaning både för dig som precis hittat till traillöpning och för den mer erfarna, helt beroende på vilken fart du väljer. Det är en hel del obanad löpning, men mestadels är denna med Medelpadsmått mätt lättlöpt.Banan går direkt ut i vacker tallskog som varvar snabblöpta hällar med riktiga finstigar och från början blir det nog lätt att dras med i ett högt tempo. Efter ca 4 km kommer banan byta karaktär, bli mer flack men samtidigt med lite tyngre underlag när löparna beger sig söderut.När banan väl vänder norrut igen så blir det på en riktigt fin och lättlöpt stig som går längs vattnet från Rönnhamn mot Lörudden. Kanske den mest snabblöpta stigen som det bjudits på i Sundsvall Trails historia?Väl tillbaka i Lörudden passerar banan ut i skogen via kapellet och avslutas slutligen med klipplöpning förbi Löruddens fyr innan den avslutande upploppsrakan längs kajen.Det blir alltså en del smalstig i vacker kusttallskog, snabbare stiglöpning längs vattnet, öppna hällar, lite myrpartier och en fin dos kustklippslöpning - en bra mix för ett traillopp i våra öron.
Description in English
One of the most technical and beautiful trail races in Sweden

En perfekt introduktion till traillöpning med en kombination av lättsprungna breda stigar som varvas med lite smalare och knixigare partier. Den obanade löpningen står för en mindre del av banan, och går på lättsprunga hällar och relativt släta havsklippor.Start och mål vid Löruddens hamn och löparna beger sig efter några hundra meter väg/bred stig in i en väldigt vacker gles kusttallskog som präglar hela bansträckningen.Banan delar avslutning med resterande distanser och passerar Löruddens fyr och därefter är det nästan bara upploppet kvar.
Description in English
A perfect introduction to trail running

En perfekt introduktion till traillöpning med en kombination av lättsprungna breda stigar som varvas med lite smalare och knixigare partier. Den obanade löpningen står för en mindre del av banan, och går på lättsprunga hällar och relativt släta havsklippor.Start och mål vid Löruddens hamn och löparna beger sig efter några hundra meter väg/bred stig in i en väldigt vacker gles kusttallskog som präglar hela bansträckningen.Banan delar avslutning med resterande distanser och passerar Löruddens fyr och därefter är det nästan bara upploppet kvar.
Description in English
A perfect introduction to trail running

1 km distansen passar likaväl barn och ungdomar som den motionär som vill få uppleva känslan och atmosfären av ett härligt traillopp, samtidigt som hela stigningen känns för övermäktig. Inga överdrivet tekniska partier väntar.Starten går på mellersta delen av "The Stig" och banan stiger snabbt 50 höjdmeter innan man når Nolbykullens rygg och under 600 meter följer en slingrig smalstig med stundvis underbar utsikt.Efter att långa banan viker av mot mer teknisk löpning tar sig 1 km löparna ut i slalombacken och avslutar de sista 50 metrarna till målet i ett svagt motlut.Upplev stämningen och ta chansen att njuta av den klassiska våfflan vid målgång samtidigt som du hejar fram de andra löparna till målet.
Description in English
Vertical race for the kids

Vackert backrace längs Nolbykullens rygg, möjligt att genomföra för alla, men var beredd på lite luftig scrambling under slutdelen.Starten går i Hemmanet och de första 750 meterna stiger 150 höjdmeter på stigar med mycket hällmarksinslag och vackra vyer innan man når banans högsta punkt. Sedan följer 600 meter småkuperad löpning på en härlig smalstig i gles tallskog.Efter att korta banan vikit mot mål rundar 1.8 km sträckningen Nolbykullen längs dess sydvästra brantsida där det bjuds på ett tekniskt skråparti där händerna kommer att komma till användning.Ett kort och snabbt parti på stig utför följs av de sista 50 metrarna uppför den branta liftgatan till den sannolikt mycket välkomna och välkomnande mållinjen.Upplev stämningen och ta chansen att njuta av den klassiska våfflan vid målgång samtidigt som du hejar fram de andra löparna till målet.
Description in English
Vertical race

L'ultra Boucle de la Sarra est un trail urbain sur un parcours en boucle à parcourir 55 fois.Tracé sur les pentes de la colline de Fourvière (un des plus importants sites touristiques de la ville de Lyon), le circuit utilise en grande partie le potentiel offert par le Parc des Hauteurs. Loin du tumulte du centre ville pourtant tout proche, il constitue un vaste espace paysager verdoyant propice aux balades : belvédères remarquables, pentes boisées, prairies et jardins des grandes propriétés religieuses invitent à la contemplation. Le tracé mixe allégrement des revêtements comme le bitume, les pavés, les escaliers, le stabilisé, l’herbe et même les planches de bois !

Description:
“明初，徐中山（徐达）筑边城墙，自山海关西抵慕田峪，一千七百余里，边防可云密矣。”——《同治十二年迁安县志》长城是我国重要的地理和文化标识，是中华民族的精神象征。中国南北朝时的北齐（公元550年—577年），就在慕田峪筑有长城，明朝初年，朱元璋手下大将徐达在北齐长城遗址上增建而成。2018年5月20日，第一届慕田峪长城越野赛以鲜花相伴，与大神同行。世界级越野赛明星们纷纷亮相，UTMT年度总冠军Gediminas Griniu、2018年UTMB黑马被称为高原雄鹰的贾俄仁加、斯巴达冠军夫妇Jacky Boisset和Myriam等共12个国籍的运动员们出现在慕田峪长城之上，一览中国最具代表性的历史建筑之一。2019年5月18日，第二届慕田峪长城越野赛将在慕田峪景区重新启航，本次比赛新增了50KM组及10KM组，旨在让更多国内外的选手和跑步爱好者能够近距离跑过这个世界上修建时间最长、工程量最大的一项古代防御工程，也是中华文明的精萃——慕田峪长城。
Description in English
The Mutianyu section of the Great Wall is located in the Huairou District of Beijing, 73 kilometers from the city center. It’s 5400 meters long , 535 meters high on average. The Mutianyu section remained as magnificent as it was built in 1368 AD. It is the largest in terms of construction, and most well-preserved among all sections of the Great Wall. In 1987, it was listed as one of the “16 Most Beautiful Tourists Sites of New Beijing”. In 1992, it was ranked as one of the “World’s Best of Beijing Tour”. And in 2002, it was ranked “AAAA scenic spot”.The Mutianyu section is accessible by cable car.  Rich forest cover （up to 96%),  perilous passes and closely packed stone road connected watchtowers, all of which make the Mutianyu section unique, special and one of a kind.

Estamos chegando a quarta etapa da Amazing Runs Garopaba, uma prova exclusiva pensada para surpreender todos os participantes. Reformulamos os percursos para que os atletas possam interagir com lugares ainda mais icônicos de Garopaba, passando por regiões completamente imersas nas incríveis paisagens e natureza do lugar, com percursos que cruzam a faixa de praia, dunas, costões, florestas e alta montanha. 
Description in English
We are reaching the fourth year of the Amazing Runs Garopaba, an exclusive event designed to surprise all participants. We redesigned the courses so that athletes can interact with even more iconic places of Garopaba, passing through regions completely immersed in the incredible landscapes and nature of the place, with paths that cross the strip of beach, dunes, cliffs, forests and high mountain.

We redesigned the courses so that athletes can interact with even more iconic places of Garopaba, passing through regions completely immersed in the incredible landscapes and nature of the place, with paths that cross the strip of beach, dunes, cliffs, forests and high mountain.

Estamos chegando a quarta etapa da Amazing Runs Garopaba, uma prova exclusiva pensada para surpreender todos os participantes. Reformulamos os percursos para que os atletas possam interagir com lugares ainda mais icônicos de Garopaba, passando por regiões completamente imersas nas incríveis paisagens e natureza do lugar, com percursos que cruzam a faixa de praia, dunas, costões, florestas e alta montanha.

Description: A KaptárkŐ Trail célja a kevésbé ismert Bükkalja és a kaptárkövek megismertetése. Az útvonal nagy része könnyen futható, széles erdészeti úton halad. Felsőtárkányból indulva, az Eged megmászását követően érkeztek a Nyerges-hegyi kaptárkő csoporthoz, majd Síkfőkút és Várkút érintésével értek vissza a célba Felsőtárkányba.

Located on the eastern, and sunny side of the North Cascades - on the edge of the Chelan Sawtooth Wildereness, above the Methow River Valley - these courses offer great mountain trail running early in the year. You can expect fields of wildflowers, beautiful, snow-capped peaks of the Cascades in the distance, and stunning single-track. In partnership with Methow Trails and Sun Mountain Lodge, we are happy to offer a well supported and scenic race.

Race Description:The Superior 12.5KM, 25KM and 50KM Trail Races are extremely hilly, rugged and technical trail-races which traverses the Sawtooth Mountain Range on the Superior Hiking Trail in the far reaches of northern Minnesota. The races start and finish near Lutsen Minnesota, approximately 4 hours North of Minneapolis. The course parallels Lake Superior, the greatest freshwater lake in the world, climbs to near 2000â˛ peaks with breath-taking vistas of the lake and inland forests and crosses whitewater rivers and serene streams while meandering through mystic Boreal forests. The races start and finish at Caribou Highlands Resort in Lutsen Minnesota. Due to their popularity, registration for the races are held via a lottery registration process which open on January 1st each year. More information can be found HERE https://www.superiorspringtrailrace.com/registration-info/History:The Superior Spring Trail Race was founded in 2003 as a companion event to the longer running Superior 100 Mile Trail Race / Superior Fall Trail Race which was founded in 1991 and is the 9th oldest 100 mile race in the country.About the Area:The North Shore of Lake Superior runs from Duluth, Minnesota at the Southwestern end of the lake, to Thunder Bay and Nipigon, Ontario, Canada, in the North to Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario, in the east. The shore is characterized by alternating rocky cliffs and cobblestone beaches, with rolling hills and ridges covered in boreal forest inland from the lake, through which scenic rivers and waterfalls descend as they flow to Lake Superior. The shoreline between the city of Duluth to the international border at Grand Portage as the North Shore. Lake Superior is considered the largest freshwater lake in the world by surface area. It is the worldâs third-largest freshwater lake by volume and the largest by volume in North America. The Superior Hiking Trail, also known as the SHT, is a 310+ mile long distance hiking single-track hiking trail in Northeastern Minnesota that follows the ridgeline overlooking Lake Superior for most of its length. The trail travels through forests of birch, aspen, pine, fir, and cedar. Hikers and runners enjoy views of boreal forests, the Sawtooth Mountains, babbling brooks, rushing waterfalls, and abundant wildlife. The lowest point on the trail is 602 feet above sea level and the highest point is 1,829 feet above sea level.

Description: TRAIL DES SEIGNEURS51km 3220d+Épreuve Défi Sud Trail’s + Points ITRALe Dimanche 19Mai 2019La 9ème édition de « La Course des Seigneurs » prendra son départ le 19 Mai 2019 à 6h00 du village de Cucugnan, elle va vous transporter entre 3 bastions cathares :« Le Château de Peyrepertuse » imposante citadelle cathare située au dessus du magnifique petit village de Duilhac sous Peyrepertuse puis, « Le Château de Quéribus » et « Le Château de Padern »Ce trail  de 50km et 3100mD+ va vous faire parcourir des sentiers hors du commun.Venez exprimer votre passion de la course nature en passant d’un château à un autre sur un tracé exigeant et varié : sentiers cathares, crêtes, passage au dessus des gorges du Moulin de Ribaute.Une ambiance authentique et chaleureuse grâce aux bénévoles du village et des villages voisins présents tout le long du parcours.Le départ sera donné à 6H00 de Cucugnan (place du village)/ arrivée CucugnanLe tarif est de 55 euros (+ 10 euros après le 1er Avril) , il comprend l’inscription + lot + repas d’après course + la bière à l’arrivée!

Тропа двух эпох, которая проходит по живописным историческим местам Республики Хакасия. Захватывающие дух просторы Хакасских степей в удивительной форме сочетаются с узкими тоннелями бетонных построек.
Description in English
The path of two eras which goes through picturesque historic places of Khakass Republic. From the ancient cliff drawings dated two thousand years ago to the buildings of the Soviet era in the "new" part of the distance. Amazing landscapes pared together with the narrow tonnels of concrete buildings.

Le Trail des Marcaires et le Défi de Muhlbach sont deux des Trails le plus techniques des Vosges. Ils vous entraineront sur le tour de la vallée de Munster en passant par la célèbre vallée de la Wormsa, les lacs du Fischboedlé, du Schiessrothried et de l’Altenweiher, véritables joyaux du massif. Vous passerez par le Hohneck, cheminerez par les Crêtes Vosgiennes vous offrant une vue à 360 dégres sur la vallée et les Alpes suisses.
Description in English
The Trail des Marcaires and the Défi de Muhlbach are two of the most technical trail races in the Vosges. The races wind up and around the Munster valley via the Wormsa Valley , passing the lakes of Fischboedle, Schiessrothried and Altenweiher. The high point of the race is the Hohneck.

Description: Grande nouveauté cette année! Le Trail du Coureur des Bois de Duchesnay permettra aux participants de vivre une expérience en pleine nature parfaite pour repousser leurs limites en réalisant une nouvelle longue distance d’approximativement 34 km!Découverte ou redécouverte des extraordinaires possibilités de la Station touristique Duchesnay, le parcours proposé se veut rapide, bien balancé et très diversifié. Il inclut un mélange de sentiers de type « single track », de sentiers aménagés, de raquettes, de ski de fond et quelques anciens sentiers dans une superbe forêt mixte. Les points de vue sur le lac Saint-Joseph sont merveilleux.C’est le défi parfait pour se mettre des kilomètres dans les jambes en début de saison de trail

Ultra Trail Tour Finland -osakilpailu. Vaativa puristus jonka aikana koet Kuusamon kevätluonnon päivän ja yön. Kunnon ohella taival testaa erityisesti henkiset voimavarat. Edestakainen reitti Ruka-Hautajärvi-Ruka. Täällä keräät maksimimäärän UTMB/ITRA pisteitä.
Description in English
Ultra Trail Tour Finland -event. Demanding race where you will sense the spring of Oulanka Nature park both night and day. This race will not only test your physical stamina, but also your mental health – are You prepared enough? Runners of this race starts from Ruka Ski Village heading to Hautajärvi, Karhunkierros Visitor Centre – and back. From this race you will collect maximum amount of UTMB / ITRA points.

“The Original”. This is the race from where it all begun by few runners on 2012 growing to one of the most discussed trail adventures in Finland. When hiking, Karhunkierros -trail can take up to seven days to complete – are You running it within one day?

BUFF® Trail Tour Finland -osakilpailu. Etenet Oulangan luontokeskuksen huikeista jokivarsimaisemista Rukan jylhiin vaaramaisemiin. Haastatko Suomen nopeimmat polkujuksijat, vai testaatko luontosi maratonia pitemmässä seikkailussa?
Description in English
BUFF® Trail Tour Finland -event. Trail starts from Oulanka Visitor Centre hugging rugged riverbanks and passing by Finland’s most impressive water fall, Kiutaköngäs, followed by aapa mires and forested hills of Ruka. Are you prepared to challenge the fastest trail runners of Finland or are you testing your own stamina on longer-than-marathon adventure?

Karhunkierroksen parhaat palat napsakassa paketissa! Kierrät Pienen Karhunkierroksen ja koet Konttainen-Valtavaaran upeat maisemat saapuen maaliin Rukalle.
Description in English
Best bits of Karhunkierros –trail: Route follows “Pieni Karhunkierros” where you’ll find spectacular scenery at Konttainen and Valtavaara finishing to Ruka Ski Village.

Description in English
Ecotrail Oslo is a full-blown trail in the heart of the Norwegian capital. The participants will have the chance to explore both urban trails and forest trails.These ultra runners will be taken through historical areas that are now used for recreation, such as picnics, swimming, fishing, walking, running and cross-country skiing, and they will see the heart of the city. On top of this, the route includes the forests that uniquely surround Oslo

Fem mil på myke stier, grusveier og litt asfalt er en perfekt måte å utfordre seg selv til å løpe lenger enn du noen gang har gjort tidligere. 50 km er også en passende distanse for maratonløperen som vil teste sin egen stayerevne i variert terreng.
Description in English
The 50 km is the perfect Ultra distance for both experienced runners and debutants to races longer than Marathon or even newbies that want a combination of nature and a long distance excerise.The course combines dirt roads and technical trail. Running from the start with a panorama view over Oslo , ecotrailers will reach Holmenkollen ski jump, Sørkedalen area, the fantastic country side  surroundings Bogstad Golf Court, Lysaker River and along the oslofjord to finish at Salt, Tollbukaia.

Формат дистанции - командная эстафета.Общая протяженность дистанции - 205 км: 1 этап ("Elton Night Ultra") - 84 км, 2й этап ("Botkul Ultra") - 100 км, 3й этап ("Gagarin Race") - 21 км. 
Description in English
This is a team race (relay). Start time is 18:00 (UTC time + 4:00)The total length of the distance is 205 km. Length of stages: 1 stage ("Elton Night Ultra") - 84 km, stage 2 ("Botkul Ultra") - 100 km, 3 stage ("Gagarin Race") - 21 km.

Event: Jiangnan100 Qingyuan Ancient Bridge Ultra Trail 2019
Description:
江南100庆元廊桥国际越野赛是江南100系列赛之一，已获ITRA认证。赛事在“中国香菇城”、“中国廊桥之乡”的浙江庆元县境内举办。其中兰溪桥、咏归桥、如龙桥是三座国保级廊桥。而月山村钟灵毓秀，人文鼎盛，仕宦蝉联，以“举溪八景”闻名于世。    浙江庆元县，隶属丽水市，位于浙江省西南部浙闽边境，面积1898平方公里，人口20.6万。境内多山，主峰“百山祖”，海拔1856.7米，是浙江第二高峰。根据《中国生态环境质量评价研究》结果，庆元县生态环境质量得分居全国2348个县（市）之首，生态系统非常完整，空气质量非常优秀，是“中国生态环境第一县”。    庆元县还是中国廊桥第一乡，境内有全国现存最古老的廊桥——如龙桥、全国单孔跨度最大的明代廊桥——兰溪桥、全国廊屋最长的单孔木拱桥——黄水长桥等均在庆元境内，各类廊桥共计97座，是全国廊桥最多的县。   比赛当晚，吃百家宴席，推杯换盏；看月山春晚，鱼跃虫鸣；听唐音宋韵，穿越历史。   梦幻廊桥，千年古道，庆元廊桥国际越野赛，5月25日到26日，2天，共65公里，多达25个补给点，200席位，静候君临。
Description in English
Now or never,explore the most romote part of Zhejiang province,east China.In the name of advanture,you can experience pure ancient chinese culture with timber arch lounge bridges or chinese style evening party within 2 days of trail running and have a good night rest in lovely frinedly beautiful Yueshan Village.Not to mention the classic style of banquet with hundreds of dishes called “Bai Ja Yan” which is stunning.We arranged 16 supply points in Day1 trail and 10 supply points in Day2 just incase the summer days burning hot hurt you.Please sign up now,it’s a calling from forest and hills,it’s a invitation from Qingyuannese people.

Description:
Bieg śladem historycznej trasy o kryptonimie Jaga-Kora, którą pokonywali w czasie wony kurierzy beskidzcy. Centralną bazą zawodów jest Uzdrowisko Rymanów Zdrój, położone w najdzikszej części Beskidu Niskiego.
Description in English
Central base of race is health resort Rymanow Zdroj, Subcarpathia Poland. Route of the race is placed at the wildest mountains in Poland - Beskid Niski. For many kilometers You can be alone with only wild nature. Name of the race had a historical background. In WWIII military messengers were crossing that trail to boarder many times. They named that "Jaga" and changed after few years to "Kora".
