Description:
2019 års stora nyhet under KIA Fjällmaraton Årefjällen blir Tour de Fjällmaraton!Konceptet är enkelt, det är löparens totalttid på samtliga etapper som räknas, minus eventuella bonussekunder på de etapper som har det.Hederspriser till topp 3 i dam- respektive herr klassen och självklart en hel del prestige i att bli de första två innehavarna av vandringspriset i den första upplagan av Touren 2019.Även Tourens bergakung och –drottning kommer att utses efter summering av varje deletapps uppförssträcka som ingår i bergstävlingen.Ledartröjor i totaltouren samt i bergatävlingen kommer att utdelas till ledaren i dam- och herrklassen fr.o.m. etapp två. Se nedan vilka etapper som ingår:
Description in English
The big news of 2019 during KIA Fjällmaraton Årefjällen is going to be Tour de Fjällmaraton!The concept is simple, it is the total running time of all legs that counts, minus bonus seconds if any, in the legs that contain bonus seconds.Price of honor to the top 3 in ladies and mens class and of course a great deal of prestige to become the first bearer of the challenge prize in the first edition of the Tour de Fjällmaraton 2019.Also, the King and Queen of the mountain in the Tour, will be appointed after the summary of the uphill slope in each leg that are included in the mountin race.Jerseys to indicate the leaders in the ladies and mens class will be appointed from leg 2 and forward. The races included in the Tour de Fjällmaraton are listed below:

Dags för den femtonde upplagan av loppet och det blir en fortsättning av banan som hade premiär i och med 2015 års arrangemang. Banan är extremt krävande och bjuder på varierad terräng och tekniska partier. De 43 km och 2100 höjdmetrarna ställer höga krav på deltagarna och ger sluttider långt över lopp med liknande distans. Beroende av hur blött det är i terrängen kan även tiderna påverkas från år till år. Banrekorden för dam respektive herr ligger på 4:01:10 och 3:31:29.
Description in English
The 3rd of August 2019 is set for the fifteenth edition of the race. Since 2015 the course leads runners from the start in Vålådalen over three mountain peaks, Ottfjället, Hållfjället and Välliste, to the finish at Trillevallen mountain station. The course is extremely demanding and offers varied terrain and technical sections. With a distance of 43km and 2100m height gain, there is an immense strain placed on the runners, and finish times are well over the norm for a run of a similar distance.Annual variations of the ground water along the course can impact on finishing times too. The new course for the 2016 event had the winner times of women respectively men at 4:01:10 and 3:31:29.
Entry Fee:
SEK 1250 per person to 31:th of December

SEK 1350 per person to 2:nd of August

After that SEK 1450 direct registration

Description:
Fjällmaratonveckans inledande lopp, Salomon 27K, tar deltagaren från starten i Ottsjö över tre fjäll, Hållfjället, Grofjället och Välliste, till målet i Trillevallen.Det blir en löpning längs den fina led som numera finns, upptrampad och skapad av deltagarna i 2015  års lopp, som till stora delar gick nydragen över obanat fjäll. Den upplevelsemässiga biten i valet av bansträckning har fått styra helt och resultatet blev 27 sagolikt vyrika kilometer med en total stigning på 1150 höjdmeter.
Description in English
The Salomon 27K is a 27 km race that confronts runners with the same terrain as the full race, but without the same demanding distance. This is a great opportunity for runners who missed out on a place in the KIA Fjällmaraton to test themselves over a really challenging event.The course covers 27 km with an altitude gain of 1 150 metres. Taking the participants from the start in Ottsjö over three mountains; Hållfjället, Grofjället and Välliste to the finish line in Trillevallen.
Entry Fee:
SEK 995 per person to 31:th of December

SEK 1150 per person to 26:th of July

After that SEK 1300 direct registration

Description:
Staza Ultra Traila je kružna ruta koja povezuje četiri planine Sarajevsko-romanijske regije: Jahorina, Ravna planina, Romanija i Trebević. Samu stazu čine strmi singltrekovi, dijelovi skijaške, bijatlonske i bob staze, šumski putevi, stjenoviti prolazi grebenom te uskotračna pruga koja vodi kroz petnaestak tunela. Kao posebna poslastica, na stazi je i via ferata koja otkriva čuda i ljepote Romanije.
Description in English
ULTRA Trail Course is a circular route which traverses four mountains surrounding the Sarajevo region: Jahorina, Ravna, Romanija and Trebević. The course varies from steep uphill and downhill single tracks, ski slopes, triathlon and bobsleigh course, dust roads, rocky ridge trails and narrow-gauge railway which takes participants through dozens of tunnels. As special treat, there is a via-ferrate route which reveals the wonders and beauty of Romanija mt.

Staza Maxi Traila je kružna ruta koja prelazi preko tri planine (Jahorina, Ravna planina i Trebević), povezuje tri olimpijska lokaliteta (skijalište Poljice, bijatlonska staza na Dvorištima i bob staza na Trebeviću) s dva grada te prati očaravajući kanjon Miljacke i uskotračnu prugu Sarajevo-Višegrad. Trka je savršen izbor za trail trkače koji će se po prvi put oprobati na ultraškom formatu.
Description in English
MAXI Trail Course is a circular route which traverses three mountains (Jahorina, Ravna and Trebević), connects three Olympic venues (ski slope Poljice, biathlon course Dvorišta and bobsleigh course Trebević) with two cities, follows along the amazing Miljacka canyon and narrow-gauge railway course Sarajevo-Višegrad! It is perfect for trail runners experiencing an ultra distance for the first time!

Midi Trail startuje u Sarajevu, na Baščaršiji i vodi vas preko Darive, Jarčedola, Apelovog puta, bob staze, grebena i vrha Trebevića do Jahorine preko vrha Ogorjelica do Rajske doline.
Description in English
MIDI Trail Race will take you from Baščaršija along Dariva, over the Goat`s Bridge, Jarčedoli, Apel`s road, bobsleigh track, over Trebevic ridge to Jahorina mt. over ridge Ogorjelica to Paradise valley.

Kružna staza koja kreće od Rajske doline preko Skočina i Kalajdžijinih stijena i uz ski stazu Poljice vodi na vrh Jahorine, Ogorjelica.
Description in English
The circular path that runs from the Paradise Valley through Skočina and Kalajdžija's rocks and along the Poljica ski slope leads to the top of Jahorina, Ogorjelica.

Ultra trail di circa 60 km con dislivello positivo di circa 3500 metri che si terrà sabato 27 luglio 2019 con partenza alle 6.00 dal centro del paese. Trail tecnico e molto impegnativo con vista sul Monte Bianco!
Description in English
60 km Ultra Trail with 3500m elevation gain. The race starts on Saturday 27 July 2019 at 6am from the centre of La Thuile. Technical race with amazing view on Mont Blanc and the Italian Alps.

Il trail da 25 km circa con dislivello positivo di circa 1500 metri si correrà sabato 27 luglio 2019 con partenza alle ore 9.00 dal centro del paese. Il tracciato percorre luoghi panoramici mozzafiato ed importanti siti storici di La Thuile. I corridori raggiungeranno il Rifugio Deffeyes tramite la bellissima e panoramica « balconata », da qui si avvicinerà fino a lambire il maestoso ghiacciaio del Ruitor, la sua morena e i suoi stupendi laghetti. Il percorso successivamente porterà i corridori a percorrere il vallone di Bellacomba, proseguire verso i laghi della Tchuielletta e scendere verso il paese passando trai boschi che d’inverno vedono protagoniste le piste da sci. 
Description in English
Running 25km with 1500m elevation gain in the amazing mountains surrounding La Thuile. Among others, the trail reaches refuge Deffeyes with a stunning outlook on the Rutor glacier.

Vallées d'Azun et d'Ossau seront le théâtre de montées et descentes sur sentiers monotraces pour des traileurs désireux de parcourir des paysages pyrénéens préservés. 31km et 2400m+ pour la Sky Race autour du massif des Gabizos au départ d'Arrens-Marsous avec passage à 2430m au sommet du Pic du Sanctus, puis direction la station de Gourette avant un retour par le col de Tortes et la col de Saucède.

Un lungo con dislivello positivo di 4.500 m, passaggio sulla Diga di Matmark/Saas Almagell e scollinamento al Passo del Monte Moro. Un percorso molto tecnico dalle grandi emozioni ed ottimo come allenamento per i grandi ultratrail autunnali (Es: UTMB / Tor de Geants)
Description in English
A long distance race with a positive elevation of 4500m, passing on the Matmark's dam and Monte Moro pass. A very technical course with great great emotions very good to train for the big Ultra Running races heading in autumn (UTMB/Tor Des geants).

Percorso che passa sotto la Est del Monte Rosa, una vista emozionante vivendo l’esperienza di correre su sentieri di alta montagna.
Description in English
Trail passing just below the East wall of Monte Rosa, an emotional view while experiencing to run on high mountains paths.
les crĂŞtes de la Riviera montreusienne
l'arriĂ¨re pays de Montreux par les sommets
Les adultes s'élancent sur le parcours de la MXSky après un premier relais d'un enfant. Arrivée en commun à Montreux

The Guzzler is a new ultra marathon held from at Mt Coot-tha, Brisbane on Saturday, 27 July 2019.The Guzzler 100km heads out from the green heart of Brisbane, Mt Coot-tha, to visit three of Brisbaneâs oldest reservoirs. Youâll take a trip through history, running past Enoggera Reservoir, opened in 1866, followed by Gold Creek Reservoir, opened 1882, before seeking out Lake Manchester, opened in 1916. From there you'll skip (or drag) your way home to a tall glass of Brisbane's finest (water)!

The Glass Half Full is part of The Guzzler Ultra festival.While The Guzzler is the main event of the weekend, the Glass Half Full packs a punch of its own, taking you around some spectacular and challenging Brisbane trails. We'll show you what locals know and love about our green city, just how much fun and how much nature you can reach directly from Mt Coot-tha, completely on foot, completely on trails! You'll tour two of our reservoirs in the order they were built, soaking up fire trails, single track, rolling hills and some mean ones too! Let us take you on an adventure in our backyard.

One of the toughest most spectacular mountain races in all of North America in a little known mountain range near Beaver, Utah. The Tushar Mountains are a hidden gem of high altitude peaks, mountain canyons, alpine lakes and stunning terrain. Come find out for yourself why this is a MUST DO race.The Tushars Mountain Runs are staged out of Eagle Point Resort at an elevation of over 10,000 feet. All race distances climb to the highest point in the Tushar range, Delano Peak at 12,174 feet. Join us this July for a spectacular and brutal race you wonât soon forget.

Entry Fee: 40 € jusqu'au 30 juin puis 45 € à partir 01 juillet

Description: Course à pied sur sentier de grandes randonnées reliant la station de Vars les Claux, via le Col de Vars, le sommet du Paneyron, les Couniets et retour à Vars les Claux par le Bois Noir.
Entry Fee: 30 € jusqu'au 30 juin puis 35 € à partir du 01 juillet.
25 € jusqu'au 30 juin puis 30 € à partir du 01 juillet.
10 € jusqu'au 30 juin puis 15 € à partir du 01 juillet

Description: Ouvert aux coureurs et marcheurs à partir de la catégorie junior Montée sèche de la piste de kilomètre lancé. Casque obligatoire
Entry Fee: 15 € jusqu'au 30 juin puis 20 € à partir du 01 juillet

Description:
どこまでも続く青空と草原の美しい国モンゴルで、第2回目となる『Bogdkhan Mountain Trail 2019』が7月28日に開催されます。首都ウランバートル周辺のボグドハン山を中心とした64kmのコースの他、10km・21kmのコースも用意しております。この時期のモンゴルは、緑豊かで驚くほど美しく神秘的な光景が拡がり、トレイルランを行うには最適の季節です。広大な山々と開放的な草原を爽快に駆け抜けられるコース（64km）は、あらゆるレベルのランナーも楽しめるコースです。本大会は、世界で活躍する登山家でトレイルランナーのキャロル・フークスがコースディレクターを務め、モンゴル長距離マラソン連盟、そして日本の運営チームが協力し、皆様にモンゴルの大自然を堪能していただけるように努めております。この夏、ぜひ一緒にモンゴルを走りましょう！
Description in English
Bogdkhan Mountain Trail 2019 is the second edition of the ultra-running event organized in the beautiful steppes of Mongolia, the country of the endless blue sky. We are excited to welcome runners to experience the beautiful steppes in Mongolia throughout a 64 kilometers run around its capital Ulaanbaatar. This unique race will take place during the last week of July, the best season to discover the mysterious steppes of Mongolia. Trail running offers a wonderful travel adventure. This ultra-distance race has been designed to fit a whole range of running levels and is welcoming to beginners and experienced runners. It will lead you through vast and breathless mountains, open grasslands and meadows in an amazing succession of landscapes.

The 50k Skyline is an out and back course doing all peaks twice, except for the mighty Errigal. The course is unique in that there is little or no defined path for most of the course - just wild open mountain, soft boggy heathery ground, and rock and scree on the technical sections.
Le classique depuis 7 ans ou comment rallier l’Isère à la Savoie par des paysages de montagne, lacs et le glacier de l'étendard.
Trail en ligne, qui reprend une bonne partie du 65 km, avec plusieurs col et lac d'altitude à découvrir ou à redécouvrir
parcours autour de St Sorlin d'Arves Ă  1500 m d'altitude. Entre pĂ˘turage et haute montagne.

Quatrième édition de la plus montagnarde des courses parisiennes. Au milieu de l'été, une boucle vallonnée à travers le parc des Buttes Chaumont qui fera chauffer vos cuisses et vos mollets avant de vous détendre autour du ravitaillement le plus sympa du monde.l'Epreuve la plus ultime de l'événement. Il faudra vous accrocher et traverser la nuit en courant...
Description in English
An urban trail organized around a loop to travel fifteen times. It offers a hilly and landscaped course that borrows all the emblematic passages of the most romantic, picturesque and the steepest park of Paris. UBBC has become a must for all those who really run to the Buttes Chaumont.
Entry Fee:
course gratuite
contribution volontaire au ravitaillement collectif autogéré et eco-responsable

Description:
Quatrième édition de la plus montagnarde des courses parisiennes. Au milieu de l'été, une boucle vallonnée à travers le parc des Buttes Chaumont qui fera chauffer vos cuisses et vos mollets avant de vous détendre autour du ravitaillement le plus sympa du monde.l'UBBC Hipster est la plus populaire de nos trois courses. Celle-ci est un peu plus longue que les précédentes; quatre tours de plus pour vous laisser davantage profiter d'une belle nuit d'été au milieu du parc.
Description in English
an urban trail organized around a loop to travel six times. It offers a hilly and landscaped course that borrows all the emblematic passages of the most romantic, picturesque and the steepest park of Paris. UBBC has become a must for all those who really run to the Buttes Chaumont.
Entry Fee:
course gratuite
contribution volontaire au ravitaillement participatif autogéré et éco-responsable.

Description:
Quatrième édition de la plus montagnarde des courses parisiennes. Au milieu de l'été, une boucle vallonnée à travers le parc des Buttes Chaumont qui fera chauffer vos cuisses et vos mollets avant de vous détendre autour du ravitaillement le plus sympa du monde.La plus accessible de nos trois épreuves. Une découverte joyeuse et conviviale du trail en milieu urbain.
Description in English
an urban trail organized around a loop to travel five times. It offers a hilly and landscaped course that borrows all the emblematic passages of the most romantic, picturesque and the steepest park of Paris. UBBC has become a must for all those who really run to the Buttes Chaumont.
Entry Fee:
course gratuite
contribution volontaire au ravitaillement participatif autogéré et éco-responsable.

Description:
Un parcours et une découverte entre montagne et mer, qui raviront les férus de distances intermédiaires. Ce Trail de La Perruche prend son départ à Alexandra Falls. Les passages en forêt et en montagne dans le centre et le sud-est de l’île se succèdent sur une bonne partie du parcours, qui suit subséquemment les pentes douces habillées de champs de cannes menant aux falaises du sud et à l’arrivée dans une ambiance festive sur la plage du Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa.
Description in English
The Trail de la Perruche has a breathtaking 47km course, connecting the mountainous region of the island's central and south-east area to the sugar cane fields, cliffs and beaches of the wild South. Runners will start at the same place as those participating to the more challenging Trail des 7 Couleurs, near the sacred Hindu lake of Grand Bassin. They will be welcome in the unique atmosphere of the UTRB village on the pristine beach of the Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa after running the final kilometres along the cliffs of Le Souffleur.

Le Trail du Nautile emprunte son nom au coquillage qui représente la nouvelle identité visuelle de Beachcomber. Une nouvelle identité, associée à une toute nouvelle course dans l’offre de l’UTRB. Depuis l'usine de l'Union, le parcours suit les pentes douces de cette région pittoresque, au charme rustique. Après la traversée de champs de canne à sucre, bordés parfois de lignes de cocotiers, les participants retrouveront les sentiers qui suivent le sommet des falaises entre Le Souffleur et les derniers kilomètres à l’ombre des filaos, qui mènent à la plage du Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa où aura lieu l’arrivée. 
Description in English
The Trail du Nautile (Nautilus Trail) takes its name from the new icon of the Beachcomber brand: the famous nautilus seashell. This all-new race in the UTRB offering will start at Union Factory, atop cliffs that mark the wild southern coast of Mauritius. It then takes runners across sugar cane fields, with the occasional line of coconut trees bordering them, through slight uphills and downhills - and subsequently along the coastline to the finish line on the sandy beach at Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa.

Le parcours de 10 km du Trail du Souffleur, le long des falaises du sud, attire de plus en plus de coureurs et de marcheurs, à la recherche de découverte et d’émerveillement sur des sentiers sans grand dénivelé. Toute la première moitié de ce parcours épouse les contours du littoral, avec une superbe vue sur l’océan depuis le sommet de falaises. Le reste de la course – ou de la balade - se fait à l’ombre de filaos puis sur la plage de sable blanc menant au village UTRB du Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa.
Description in English
With its 10 km track along the south-east coast, the Trail du Souffleur is attracting an increasing number of participants for competition or for pure enjoyment. Its path is relatively flat but it still offers many opportunities for discovery, amazement - and for some challenge to the competitor. From the start, the tracks first hug the lines of spectacular cliffs overlooking the deep blue ocean. They then lead the runners to more sheltered grounds under filao trees, before competitors and walkers alike reach the spotless beach leading to the finish line at Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa.

Se parte de la 2da fecha del Trail Running Series 2019 que se desarrollara en las hermosas montañas de Pichucalco, al norte de Chiapas con libertad de ritmo y teniendo como lugar sede de salida y meta el parque central de la localidad.Un poco de Historia:En 1660 los frailes dominicos le antepusieron el nombre de Pichucalco al de Santo Domingo, denominándose desde entonces Santo Domingo Pichucalco, que quiere decir en lengua náhuatl "casa de jabalís", pero debido a los altos tributos que tenían que pagar a la Corona Española, y la constante invasión de mestizos y de españoles, muchos de estos indígenas zoques emigraron a Huimanguillo, Tabasco. Pero más tarde en 1700 los pobladores de Pichucalco que habían emigrado regresan y vuelven a fundar la población, dándole el nombre de Pueblo Nuevo Pichucalco (Pitzo-Kalko) del nahoa Pitsotl-Jabalí y kalko-población (Población de los Jabalíes).En el recorrido los competidores correrán por caminos de tierra, piedra y especialmente montaña que no sólo reunirá a corredores y caminantes expertos con deseos de nuevos retos, sino también a principiantes en el Trail Running con ánimos de descubrir nuevas aventuras.Existen tres modalidades de distancias a competir: 27, 13 y 6 Kilómetros.

Se parte de la 2da fecha del Trail Running Series 2019 que se desarrollara en las hermosas montañas de Pichucalco, al norte de Chiapas con libertad de ritmo y teniendo como lugar sede de salida y meta el parque central de la localidad.Un poco de Historia:En 1660 los frailes dominicos le antepusieron el nombre de Pichucalco al de Santo Domingo, denominándose desde entonces Santo Domingo Pichucalco, que quiere decir en lengua náhuatl "casa de jabalís", pero debido a los altos tributos que tenían que pagar a la Corona Española, y la constante invasión de mestizos y de españoles, muchos de estos indígenas zoques emigraron a Huimanguillo, Tabasco. Pero más tarde en 1700 los pobladores de Pichucalco que habían emigrado regresan y vuelven a fundar la población, dándole el nombre de Pueblo Nuevo Pichucalco (Pitzo-Kalko) del nahoa Pitsotl-Jabalí y kalko-población (Población de los Jabalíes).En el recorrido los competidores correrán por caminos de tierra, piedra y especialmente montaña que no sólo reunirá a corredores y caminantes expertos con deseos de nuevos retos, sino también a principiantes en el Trail Running con ánimos de descubrir nuevas aventuras.Existen tres modalidades de distancias a competir: 27, 13 y 6 Kilómetros.

Gara di 112 km tra l'alta val tagliamento e la zona di Sappada , percorso in autosufficienza , con tratti impegnativi
Description in English
Race of 112 km in the Alta Val Tagliamento and the Sappada territory, with tough passages

Главная и без преувеличения культовая дистанция вокруг главной вершины Кавказа. Только здесь участники смогут увидеть Эльбрус со всех сторон, увидеть, как гора меняет свой облик днём, в лучах заката и при свете луны в окружении звёзд. Только здесь трейлраннерам предстоит испытать себя в условиях настоящей автономии: 109 км с набором 5400 м, которые надо преодолеть за 40 часов. Только здесь можно заработать 5 баллов ITRA. Race — вызов самым искушённым спортсменам. 
Description in English
The main and most iconic distance around the main peak of the Caucasus. Only here athletes will be able to see Elbrus mountain from all of it’s sides. See how the mountain changes its appearance during the day, in the rays of sunset and in the light of the moon surrounded by stars. Only here trail runners have to test themselves in terms of full autonomy: 109 km distance with total ascend 5400 m that must be overcome in 40 hours. Only here you get 5 ITRA points. Race is the challenge for the most tempted athletes.

Протяжённость 56 км. Набор высоты 4200 м. 3 балла ITRA. Сильнейшие спортсмены среди соперников. Самый сложный траверс и самый умопомрачительный вид на Эльбрус. Ultra — испытание для самых опытных трейлраннеров. Будет жёстко. Но вам захочется ещё.
Description in English
Length 56 km, total ascend 4200 m, 3 ITRA points. The best athletes among the competitors. The most difficult traverse and the most magnificent view of Elbrus mountain. Ultra — the best challenge for the most experienced trail runners. It'll be tough, but you'll want more.

46 км с набором 3500 м и крутыми каменистыми перевалами, где участников встречают палящее солнце или пронизывающий ветер, ¬— дистанция Marathon устроит вам проверку с ног до головы в буквальном смысле, от мышц и координации до умения концентрироваться и неотступно идти к цели. И в случае успеха вознаградит 3 баллами ITRA.
Description in English
46 km distance with 3500 m total ascend, steep rocky passes, scorching sun or piercing wind. Marathon distance will test you from head to toe literally, from muscle strength and coordination to the ability to concentrate and go to the goal. And, if successful, will reward 3 points ITRA.

Без отличной физической подготовки и безупречной мотивации преодолеть 33 км по крутым склонам со спускающимися вместе с вами камнями и общим набором 2200 м будет непросто. Но награда того стоит — 2 балла ITRA и виды, от которых можно потерять голову. Наш совет: уже сейчас никуда не ходите без треккинговых палок — лучшие шансы на Trail  у тех, для кого они станут органичным продолжением конечностей :)
Description in English
Without excellent physical training and impeccable motivation will be hard to overcome 33 km along the steep slopes with total ascend of 2200 m. But the reward is worth it — 2 ITRA points and breathtaking views. Our advice: do not go anywhere without trekking poles — the best chances in Trail for those, whose poles will become an organic continuation of the limbs.

«8 км? Да это, как по парку пробежаться», — скажете вы. Ага. Только вместо привычных дорожек «коровьи» тропы, вместо равнины и овражков набор высоты в 500 м, а вместо парковых пейзажей — вершины Приэльбрусья и звенящий горный воздух. Elbrus 8 — самая короткая дистанция, но это не делает её менее «горной» и менее захватывающей. Отличный выбор, чтобы открыть для себя гонку Elbrus World Race!
Description in English
"Just 8 km? It's like a park-run" – you might think. Yep. But instead of the usual paths there will be "cow" trails, instead of the plain and gullies there will be a 500 m ascent, and instead of park landscapes — the top of the Elbrus summits and the ringing mountain air. Elbrus 8 is the shortest distance, but that doesn't make it less "mountainous" and less exciting. A great choice to discover the Alpindustria Elbrus Race!

6-й ежегодный фестиваль трейл и скайраннинга в природном парке "Ергаки" Западных Саян Сибири. Забег-многодневка, состоящий из трёх этапов. В рамках фестиваля также состоятся два открытых Чемпионата Красноярского края по Скайраннингу в дисциплинах Высотная Гонка и Высотный Марафон. 
Description in English
6th annual trailrunning and skyrunning festival in "Ergaki" national park of the Western Sayan Mountains in Siberia. It is a 3-stage race. Within the festival there will be two Krasnoyarsk Krai skyrunning championships: SkyRace and SkyMarathon.
Entry Fee:
4500 RUB before March 1st
5400 RUB after March 1st

Description: Each loop has a mixture of pavement, single track trail, and wider double track or dirt road. Most of the time the tread is smooth, the grade gradual with a few rocky stretches.  Runners will be in the forest most of the time but on a clear day there are spectacular views of Mt Adams, Mt Hood and the Columbia River Gorge.

Each loop has a mixture of pavement, single track trail, and wider double track or dirt road. Most of the time the tread is smooth, the grade gradual with a few rocky stretches.  Runners will be in the forest most of the time but on a clear day there are spectacular views of Mt Adams, Mt Hood and the Columbia River Gorge.

Bieg Szlak Trafi PĂłĹmaraton

Bieg Szlak Trafi Halfmaraton

Since the start of the millennium, racers have come to the Canadian Rockies to cheat Death in one of the world's toughest ultramarathons. The 125km course begins and ends on a 4200-foot plateau, passes over three mountain summits, and not only includes over 17,000 feet of elevation change but a major river crossing at the spectacular Hell's Gate canyon at the confluence of the Smoky and Sulphur Rivers. Each year, extreme athletes push themselves to the limits of their endurance against the breathtaking background of the Canadian Rocky Mountains. Well-trained and totally committed, they battle heat, cold, altitude, and their own demons. Finishing is the prize and the bragging rights are priceless.

Race: Canadian Death Race Near Death Marathon
Description: Since the start of the millennium, racers have come to the Canadian Rockies to cheat Death in one of the world's toughest ultramarathons. The 125km course begins and ends on a 4200-foot plateau, passes over three mountain summits, and not only includes over 17,000 feet of elevation change but a major river crossing at the spectacular Hell's Gate canyon at the confluence of the Smoky and Sulphur Rivers. Each year, extreme athletes push themselves to the limits of their endurance against the breathtaking background of the Canadian Rocky Mountains. Well-trained and totally committed, they battle heat, cold, altitude, and their own demons. Finishing is the prize and the bragging rights are priceless.
THE NDW100 IS A 100 MILE CONTINUOUS TRAIL RUN ALONG THE NORTH DOWNS WAY. THE COURSE TRAVELS FROM FARNHAM IN THE SURREY HILLS TO ASHFORD IN KENT. TOTAL CLIMB OF 10,000 FEET. 9TH ANNUAL.

CM6 is aimed to be an events for those with some degrees of familiarity with ultra-distance trail running.As familiarity often breeds contempt, we feel that CM6 offers the right degree of challenge for runners who ultimately will be seeking greater challenges elsewhere. At CM6, climbs are long, steep in places and with a lot of elevation gain but not with a lot of technical difficulties – all within easy reach of Chiang Mai City.
A 5 pointers with just over 100km means that climbs are plentiful.
A 50-miler which starts with a visit to a waterfall.
One big loop and you are done for the day!
Visiting our race HQ at the top of the mountain twice and its all over. Two ups and two downs is the name of the game.
A not so gentle introduction to CM6 - 10km up and 10km down and it's done!

Entry Fee: Inscription in the amount of 180 reais, approximately 47,50 euros

RUCO ULTRA TRAIL 20189Sexta ediciónRUCO ULTRA  TRAIL, es una carrera que se desarrolla en un marco único en el Volcan Pichincha , ofreciendo a los corredores una experiencia de alto nivel, y que tiene como fondo a Quito capital del Ecuador y Patrimonio de la Humanidad declarada por la UNESCO  , una de las ciudades más hermosas de Sudamérica. 
Description in English

Description: The Sheep Mountain 50 throws everything it has at runners, challenging you from start to finish, among the mountains and hills lining the western slope of the South Park Valley. Description:
Východniarska stovka je ultra trail pre jednotlivcov, ktorého trasa spája dve najväčšie mestá na východnom Slovensku (Prešov a Košice). Trasa dlhá cca 129 km vedie východnou časťou Slovenského rudohoria, prevažne časťou Volovské vrchy.
Description in English
Východniarska stovka is approximately 129 km continuous point to point ultra trail race for individuals and relay teams. The course connects Košice and Prešov, two of the biggest cities in the east part of Slovakia – and for a majority of the race follows Volovské vrchy: a very beautiful part of the „Slovenské rudohorie“ mountain range.

La Plenilunio Tejeda Trail es una carrera nocturna que transcurre en la zona alta de la Caldera de Tejeda, de origen volcánico que pasa por ser una de las mayores de toda Canarias. el encanto de la noche donde las estrellas son las compañeras de fatigas y  la salida y llegada en el casco municipal de Tejeda, considerado como uno de los pueblos más bonitos de España hacen de la carrera algo mágico.
Description in English
The Plenilunio Tejeda Trail is a night race that takes place in the upper area of ​​the Caldera de Tejeda, of volcanic origin that happens to be one of the largest in the Canary Islands. the charm of the night where the stars are the companions of fatigue and the departure and arrival in the municipal center of Tejeda, considered one of the most beautiful villages in Spain make the race something magical.

Description: Participate in Greenland's first Ultra Trail race, a race with a total distance of 70 km and 2,000 altitude meters. You will be running on trails tracks, untouched terrain, huge rocks, glaciers and much more of the spectacular Greenlandic nature. It is a race that requires concentration, physical and mental stamina from start to finish. The race is 90% self-supported, which will require a lot of demands from the participants.

One of the oldest trail 50k races in the United States, Skyline 50k is known to be a great competitive race, and a great first ultra with limitless support on trail and BBQ at the end. Skyline 50k is part of the Pacific USATF Grand Prix.

MAÇAĞEL EKOLOGİK ULTRA TRAİL Parkurlarının bulunduğu Macahel Vadisi-Karçal Dağı; yeryüzünün en temeiz havası, en berrak dereleri, en heybetli ormanları, ilk kez görebileceğiniz kır çiçekleri, el değmemiş yaban hayatı ve zengin kültürüyle bir yeryüzü cennetidir. Koşmak için bu cennet vadiyi seçen doğa/koşu severler dağların en mahrem yerlerine kadar girip Karçal Dağlarının modern yaşamdan gizlediği doğal güzelliklere ulaşacaklardır. Artvin Ultra parkuru her metresinde gücünüz elverdiğince size koşma olanağı verir. Yayla evlerinde veya yöresel pansiyonlarda konaklama, hayvansal ve bitkisel organik ürünlerden tatma, yöresel eğlenceler ile eğlenme, Alpleri andıran uçsuz bucaksız yaylalarını, renkli çiçeklerini, eşsiz buzul göllerini insanı hayrete düşürecek kadar heybetli yağmur ve anıt ormanlarını görme, şelalelerle süslenmiş buz gibi derelerinde yüzme gibi güzellikler ultra trail ve doğa sevenleri beklemektedir.
Description in English
I am pleased to announce Artvin Ecological Ultra Trail. Tens of athletes from various countries participate in the event.MAÇAĞEL EKOLOGİK ULTRA TRAİL is built on the Macahel Valley and Karçal Mountain. Macahel Valley is a UNESCO protected biosphere reserve area.MAÇAĞEL EKOLOGİK ULTRA TRAİL located within the municipal borders of Borçka District in the Province of Artvin and declared as a first biosphere reserve of Turkey, the Camili Basin is an ecological and cultural treasure hidden in Karçal Mountains. The basin, which begins green valleys and reach to high alpine meadows has not been much intervented by human activities. Having a large natural ecosystems and with old growth forests and its humid climate the Basin has temperate rain forests characteristics.MAÇAĞEL EKOLOGİK ULTRA TRAİL Trails in the Macahel Valley - Karçal Mountain; the most primeval air of the earth, the clearest rivers, the most imposing forests, the wildflowers you can see for the first time, the untouched wildlife, and the rich culture. Nature / joggers who choose this heavenly voyage to run will enter the most intimate places of the mountains and will reach the natural beauty that the Karçal Mountains hide from modern life. Artvin Ultra allows you to run as long as you can with all of your mistress. The beauty of swimming, swimming in the ice-like orchards decorated with waterfalls, enjoying the vast expanses of the Alps, the spectacular rainforest and monument forests to amaze the uninhabited glacier lakes of colorful flowers, and nature lovers await.

Ultratrailrunning race on Hedmark plateau from Gåsbu to Persbu.130 km2500 D+*Unmarked trail *100% selfsupport*Orienteering running by GPS* Pacers or pets are not allowed*Own support is not allowed *1 Aid-stations + drop-bag service at CP-KORPERUD (Km 59) + warm meal at the finishline by Bèrghem.no (info. about the food at www.facebook.com/berghem.no/)*It will be possible to download the map with the all water refills places on the plateau.*GNT400 qualify*36 hours cut-off *Max 25 participants. N.B. It`s not supposed to be easy!Description of the route:The Bèrghem Ultra Trail starts from Gåsbu (at the bottom of the Gåsbu hill)and finish to the Persbu cabin by following our GPS track through the Hedmark plateau (Hedmarksvidda), it’s partly primeval forest and on various marked trails (blue/red), as well as marked and unmarked dirt roads.The Hedmark plateau is a landscape with small mountain peaks, birch and spruce forest, but the real challenge is the marsh that predominates the whole area.There are 2 river crossing on the track with an alternative route in case of flood.P.S. Don’t be fooled by the low altitude profile because the terrain on the Hedmark plateau (Hedmarksvidda) is one of the toughest in Norway!GPX: BU130 at https://caltopo.com/m/J5EU

You will pass through plenty of juicy forest, catch views of splendid vistas where gorge after gorge rolls away into the distance, negotiate awesome, highly runnable single track winding above the Lerderderg River on the way back into Blackwood â a lovely, historic mining town thatâll transport you back in time. You will emerge from your efforts renewed and energised.

Endure Trail er et af Danmarks hårdeste og flotteste Trailløb.Endure Trail 120 Km afholdes i 2019 lørdag den 10. August.Endure Trail støtter i 2019 Ung I Odsherred & Julemærkefonden.Har du mod på at bestige ”Bjergene” og Vejrhøj, Sjællands 3. højeste punkt, opleve de smukke græs beklædte fårefolde på Ordrup Næs og de snørklede single trail i Kårupskov. Så er Endure Trail lige noget for dig, uanset om du er til 10 km, 30 km, 60 km eller 120 km.Når du løber i ”Bjergene” som er op mod 121m over havet, er udsigten over Nekselø Bugt, Vestsjælland, markerne og engene helt fantastisk. Du vil helt sikkert få en naturoplevelse ud over det sædvanlige.Løbet er et trail løb der løbes på en 10/30 km rundstrækning i et meget varieret terræn omkring Ordrup Næs, Kårupskov og ”Bjergene”. Du kan vælge imellem at løbe 10,30, 60 eller 120 km. Underlaget er sand- og stenstrand, græs, små snørklede skovstier, grusvej og meget lidt asfalt. Der er ca. 600 positive højdemeter op og ned pr. 30 km runde.
Description in English
The Endure Trail is one of Denmark's toughest and most beautiful trail runsEndure 120 Km will be held in 2019 on Saturday the 10th of August.When you run in the "Mountains" which is up to 121m above sea level, the view over Nekselø Bay, West Zealand, the fields and meadows is absolutely fantastic. You will definitely get a nature experience out of the ordinary.The race is a trail run that runs on a 10/30 km roundabout in a very varied terrain around Ordrup Næs, Kårupskov and the "Mountains". You can choose between running 10, 30, 60 or 120 km. The surface is sand and pebble beach, grass, small twisted forest paths, gravel road and very little asphalt. It's about 600 positive height meters up and down per 30 km round.

Un défi à la hauteur de vos ambitions : un maratrail de haute montagne. L’intégrale du Méribel Trail à découvrir.Le 50 km aura lieu le samedi  10 Août – Départ à : 6h00Dénivelé positif : 4200 m/dDénivelé négatif : 4200 m/dDescriptif parcours :Le Méribel Trail dans sa version panoramique intégrale !Avec les trois quarts du parcours à plus de 2000m d’altitude, c’est un tracé aux allures de Skyrunning pour faire le tour de la Vallée de Méribel par ses plus beaux points de vue qui vous sera proposé !Mont de la Challe, Mont de la Chambre, Mont Vallon, Col du Fruit, Sommet de la Saulire, Dent de Burgin, Rocher de la Loze, Col de Leschaux, Roc de Fer… autant de lieux emblématiques de la vallée auxquels vous accéderez par des sentiers variés !Un parcours où la gestion de son effort sera la clé d’une course réussie !Record homme : Sylvain Court 5h 49min 27 secRecord femme : MANIVOZ Stephanie 7h05

The Stour Valley Path is a 100km (62 mile) long footpath in England, which starts in Newmarket (Suffolk) and ends in Cattawade, a village near Manningtree (Essex). The SVP50 covers the last half of the well marked trail.

Stranda Fjord Trail Race er ett av de mest varierte fjelløpene i Norge. Traseen tar deg med på fine flytstier, fantastisk bratte motbakker, spektakulær fjordutsikt, teknisk nedoverløping, gjennom gamle støler, toppen av Strandafjellet skisenter og en folkefest i Stranda sentrum. 
Description in English
Stranda Fjord Trail Race 48k takes you on flowy trails fjord trails, four  summits with technical  running down ridges, all with  awesome fjord views the entire course.
Entry Fee:
Registration for Stranda Fjord Trail Race 2018 costs 1350NOK from until 01.05.2019
Registration for Stranda Fjord Trail Race 2019 costs 1500NOK from 02.05.2019 until 01.08.2019.

Description:
30 km de course qui vous amènera à l’altitude mythique de 3 000m!!!Un format unique de Trail qui laisse la première place aux dames!Messieurs en partant après elles… rattraperez vous les meilleures ou serez vous séduits par les magnifiques paysages de balcons des Belleville?
Description in English
A 30km race along mountain paths, taking you to the legendary altitude of 3000 metres !A unique trail format, where ladies go first! The guys leave after the girls…will you catch up with them or hang back, seduced by the magnificent scenery surrounding you?

Partez sur les sentiers du Lac du Lou pour un Trail découverte de 15 km accessible à tous les coureurs, quel que soit votre niveau.
Description in English
A 100% natural, 100% gourmet fun ramble to enjoy with family and friends.  A great opportunity to admire the magical Belleville Valley, with original and fun stops to entertain you along the way.

8ème édition du kilomètre vertical de Val Thorens.2019, Grand Fond… le retour ! Arrivée à 3003m.4.6 KM / 1000D+ / Pente moyenne : 23.5%Altitude mini : 2003 m – Altitude maxi : 3003 mRecord à battre : 41 :16 ; Temps moyen : 1 :11 :15Temps de référence 42 min 20 sec, prêt à le battre ?

Yang Yang International Trailrun is most difficult and famous race in Korea.

Description in English
It is most difficult and famous race in Korea. Pls apply and enjoy your race.

Description:
Course de montagne reliant Morzine à Avoriaz, le trail des Hauts-Forts vous emmène à la découverte des plus beaux panoramas des Portes du Soleil, autour du sommet des Hauts-Forts, point culminant du Chablais et des Portes du Soleil.Au départ de Morzine, 2 courses vont sont proposées. Elles se terminent toutes les deux à Avoriaz, à 1800 m. d’altitude. L’itinéraire vous permet de franchir plusieurs cols et sommets en tournant autour des Hauts-Forts, parcourant les plus beaux sentiers des Portes du Soleil : crêtes du Pléney, Pointe de Nyon, Vallée de la Manche, lac des Mines d’Or, col de Cou et arrête du Vanet, col du Fornet, Morzinette…
Description in English
Mountain race which connects Morzine to Avoriaz, the Trail des Hauts Forts will show you the most beautiful panaromas of Portes du Soleil, around the summit of les Hauts Forts.Started from Morzine, two races are proposed. Both ending at Avoriaz, at 1800 meters.The itinerary allow you to pass several summits around the Hauts Forts, through the most attractive paths of the Portes du Soleil : crêtes du Pléney, Pointe de Nyon, Vallée de la Manche, lac des Mines d’Or, col de Cou et arrête du Vanet, col du Fornet, Morzinette…
Entry Fee:
22 € jusqu'au 31 mai 
27 €  jusqu'au 9 juillet
32 € jusqu'au 7 août

Pour deux participants : 

40 € jusqu'au 31 mai 
50 €  jusqu'au 9 juillet
60 € jusqu'au 7 août

Description:
Plus de 40 % du parcours entre 2000 et 2682 m, plus de 70% de monotrace, un tracé technique, exigeant et engagé.Des surfaces variées, des sections rapides, de franches montées et des descentes techniques, de la forêt, des alpages, des passages rocheux où il vous faudra "crapahuter" avec pieds et mains, au milieu de crêtes, sommets et paysages magnifiques.Vous devrez franchir 4 cols de montagne et gravir un sommet à 2682 mètres d'altitude sur 9km et 1200m de dénivelé positif dont les 2 derniers kilomètres à + de 33%.
Description in English
Over 40% of the course between 2000 and 2682 m, over 70% of single track, a technical track, demanding and engaging.Varied surfaces, fast sections, sharp climbs and technical descents, forests, alpine meadows, rocky passages where you will have to "trudge" with hands and feet, amidst beautiful mountain peaks and scenery.You will have to cross four mountain passes and climb a summit of 2682 metres altitude over 9km and a 1200m elevation gain of which the last two kilometres are + 33%.

Un parcours facile et agréableAccessible à tous avec 1 col à gravir et des sections communes aux parcours "Découverte" et "Élite", pour celles et ceux qui privilégient les distances plus courtes ou qui découvrent le trail en montagne.
Description in English
An easy and pleasant trail for everyone, with one pass to climb and common sections with the "Discovery" and "Elite" courses.An easy and pleasant trail for everyone, with one pass to climb and common sections with the "Discovery" and "Elite" courses.For those who prefer shorter distances or those new to mountain trails.

The TransRockies Run is a multi-day point-to-point trail running race which allows athletes to access and traverse wild and fantastic scenery, while building camaraderie, overcoming adversity and sharing a singular adventure.

Event: The Himalayan Crossing And The Spiti 2019
The Himalayan Crossing And The Spiti 2019
Description: Itâs a celebration of the mountain spirit with 4th edition in 2019. These mountains sing to you with their silence, enchant you with their color hues, and silence you with their majesty. True to its name, the route criss-crosses through mountain ranges of The Himalayas, taking you through Kinnaur and Spiti Valleys before ending on one of the toughest passes on this planet â The Rohtang La (3,978 m (13,050 ft)). This route cuts through mountains and splendid landscapes, is surrounded by snow capped majestic peaks, goes over two of the highest passes, Kunzum and Rohtang, extends through wide valleys, camps by high altitude lake, The Chandra Taal, and takes you to the highest village in Asia, Komic.

Event: The Himalayan Crossing And The Spiti 2019

Description: The 7th Annual Kodiak Ultra Marathons presented by CarboPro are situated in the San Bernardino Mountains of Southern California at an elevation of 7,000'. The cozy, cool, alpine village of Big Bear Lake is ready to host you and your crew! This course is the MUCH anticipated complete loop around Big Bear Lake with the most epic views and climate you could ask for in an Ultra. Period. In 2019 we will again be running the clockwise direction of travel around the lake! With nearly 17,000′ of vertical climbing and sustained running over 7,000′ in elevation this course will challenge the best ultra runners on the planet. The Kodiak is a true mountain one hundred. Technical. Steep Climbs to 10,000′ summits and cool nights. Gorgeous views. Thin air. Flowing single track. Epic canyon passages. Huge climbs. Welcome to the mountains! Our volunteer and staff will see to it that you have every opportunity to succeed. We pride ourselves on the design of this route, the aid stations, and a COOL little town that will host you. Bring friends, family, kids, dogs ….it will be classic summer season in the Bear.​Proceeds from the Kodiak benefit the San Bernardino Search & Rescue, Big Bear Valley Trails Foundation, Mountain Top Radio Association, and the Big Bear Middle School Interact Club.

Welcome to the Run Larapinta Stage Race. Run Larapinta is a 4 day, 4 stage trail running race along the most spectacular sections of the iconic Larapinta Trail in Australia's Northern Territory.Boundless beauty, breathless exuberance, day-old friendships that will last for years and the unspoilt grandeur of a landscape that transcends timeâŚ this is an extraordinary run that should be on every bucket list.

Veliki medvjed je trail-trka na planini Bjelasici u Crnoj Gori. Staza trke je duga 58km i prolazi kroz nacionalni park Biogradska gora, pored žičara dva ski-centra kao i kroz divlje i netaknute predjele planine Bjelasice.
Description in English
The Great Bear is a trail race on Mount Bjelasica in Montenegro. The race course is 58km long and passes through the national park Biogradska gora, next to the ski lifts of two ski centers as well as through the wild and pristine parts of the mountain Bjelasica.

Trka “Mali Medvjed” je namijenjena brzim trkačima i ljubiteljima trčanja u prirodi, onima koji vole izazov i svakodnevno se suočavaju sa njim. Predstavlja nešto kraću verziju trke Veliki Medvjed.
Description in English
The "Ursa Minor" race is intended for fast runners and fans of running in nature, who love the challenges and face daily with him. It represents a slightly shorter version of the Big Bear race.

Вже вчетверте на території України пройде фестиваль гірського бігу Chornohora Sky Marathon!Влітку 2017 року запрошуємо Вас відвідати Chornohora Sky Marathon та спробувати свої сили на дистанції близько 60 кілометрів з сумарним набором висоти понад 3000 метрів або меншу дистанцію, довжиною 23 кілометри.Мальовничі Українські Карпати чекають як на спортсменів-професіоналів, так і любителів бігу.
Description in English
This year the trailrunning event Chornohora Sky Marathon will be held for the 4th time in Ukraine!In summer 2017 we are inviting you to challenge yourself and participate in the Chornohora Sky Marathon 60 km race with total elevation gain of over 3000 meters or to try a shorter 23 km race.The picturesque Ukrainian Carpathians are waiting for both professional sportsmen and passionate hobby runners.
Chornohora Sky Race gives you the opportunity to conquer  the 2000-meter peak and become a winner, as mountains are the best test of your willpower!

100% women.  100% single track.In 2018, 29 ultramarathons were won outright by a female runner.  We want to see that number go up in 2019, so we created the Triumph 50K and 25K — all-women’s races designed to celebrate shared successes and big mountains.  Triumph is set on 100% single track through the gorgeous Sawtooth and Salmon-Challis National Forests, just outside of Triumph, ID.  It’s a world-class rendezvous point for women who love to run, be outside, push themselves and achieve their goals.We hope you’ll join us.

Description in English
For many runners running can be part of relaxing and enjoyment of surrounding landscapes. But what result we will achieve when we will add such elements as delicious local food on aid stations, forest trails just next to lakeshore and the cleanest region in Poland? The answer is: Maraton Wigry!
Entry Fee:

Paid from 1st March till 31st May 2019: 160 PLN
Paid after 31st May 2019: 180 PLN

Sign up for the Challenge - Run it for the BeautyHerzlich Willkommen beim Swiss Alps 100 Trailrennen. Hier werden Läufer aus der ganzen Welt die schönsten Trails und besten Panoramaaussichten in den berühmten Schweizer Alpen entdecken. Unsere Strecken zeigen sehr schöne Landschaften, sind aber auch teilweise technisch herausfordernd und anstrengend. Manche Streckenabschnitte, wie zum Beispiel der 1'128 meter Aufstieg zum Breithorn in nur 10.3KM, wird jeden Läufer testen. Mach in deinen Sommer etwas Spezielles und mach mit beim Swiss Alps 100.
Description in English
Sign up for the Challenge - Run it for the BeautyWe welcome you to the Swiss Alps 100 trail race, where you will experience some of the finest trails and views of the famous Swiss Alps mountains. Our courses are incredibly scenic, yet strenuous and challenging. Some parts of the course, like the 1'128 meter (3,700ft) climb to the Breithorn in only 10.3km (6.4 miles), will test each runner with terrain and surroundings that are truly magnificent. Make your summer special and come run the Swiss Alps 100 trail race.

Descubriendo Paraguaná XL Trail se desarrolla en el entorno natural de Santa Ana de Paraguaná (Google Maps --> https://goo.gl/maps/6nNUAuGbGyH2), un ecosistema xerófilo peninsular con exigentes transiciones al cruzar cerros, sabanas, salinas y el istmo de lo medanos en el desierto. Correras entre los paisajes más hermosos de Venezuela. En algunas partes del recorrido los vientos pueden superar los 50 km/h, la temperatura puede fluctuar entre los 20 y 40°C.
Description in English
Descubriendo Paraguana XL Trail is a race in the natural surroundings of Santa Ana de Paraguaná (Google Maps --> https://goo.gl/maps/6nNUAuGbGyH2), a xerophytic ecosystem with demanding transitions while crossing mountains, plains, saltfields, coasts and the Medanos isthmus in the desert. You will run in some of the most beautiful landscapes of Venezuela. Wind velocity in some zones could be 50 km/h or more and temperature may fluctuate between 20 - 40°C.

La traversée intégrale dans le plus pur esprit montagnard. Vous partez à deux et arrivez à deux. Ce parcours emprunte le parcours intégrale de la traversée de Belledonne. Elle fait l'objet d'un classement spécifique DUO.

Vi tycker att det är allas rätt att någon gång få känna sig oslagbar. Inte i förhållande till någon annan, utan i förhållande till dig själv. Oslagbar för att du uppnått något du inte trodde var möjligt. För att du vågat något du inte trodde du kunde. För att du tog dig ut i okända marker och vann. Vann över den där lilla rösten som sitter och säger att du inte kan. Därför finns 2XU Idre Fjällmaraton. För att ge dig möjligheten att känna dig oslagbar.
Description in English

Buff® 50K är ett årligt återkommande ultramaraton i spektakulär Jämtländsk fjällmiljö. Den 24:e augusti 2019 är det dags för den sjätte upplagan.Bansträckningen tar deltagarna från Bydalen över Västerfjället via Mårdsundsbodarna tillbaka över Västerfjället, därefter upp över Drommen och ner för en spektakulär passage upp genom Dromskåran efterföljt av löpning längs kanten av densamma innan en avslutande runda bort till Falkfångarfjället tar deltagarna åter över Drommens topp innan välförtjänt målgång kan ske i Höglekardalen. Banan är extremt krävande och bjuder på varierad terräng och tekniska partier.De 50 km och 2900 höjdmetrarna ställer höga krav på deltagarna och ger sluttider långt över lopp med liknande distans. Beroende av hur blött det är i terrängen kan även tiderna påverkas från år till år. Banrekorden är ifrån 2017 för herrar och ligger på 5:03:05, och för damer på 05:20:58 efter Jennifer Asps monsterlöpning 2016.
Description in English
Buff® 50K is a stunning ultra marathon held over Jämtland’s remarkable mountains.The 24th August 2019 marks the sixth edition of this ultra. The course sees runners head out from Bydalen over Västerfjället via Mårdsundsbodarna, before returning over Västerfjället, then up and over Dromen. The descent from here leads you up again and along an incredible stretch through Dromskåran. After running along the ridge, you’ve just got a final loop over Falkfångarfjället, then back over the summit of Dromen, before the well-deserved finish in Höglekardalen.The course is extremely challenging, presenting tough terrain and technical sections. The 50km and 2,900 height metres will test your endurance, and mean that the race times are much longer than over a regular run of this distance. Similarly, wet ground can affect times from year to year. The male course record form the inaugural 2017 edition stands at 5:03:05, and the women’s is 5:20:58 from the year of 2016.

Trasa PUT 85K vam bo predstavila vzhodni in osrednji del Pohorja. Ponuja odlično in prvinsko priložnost za doživetje teka po stezah neokrnjene narave pohorskega hribovja. Teče preko vinorodnih pohorskih gričev, razglednih grebenov, po smučarskih strminah, mimo gostoljubnih pohorskih koč, skozi strnjene pohorske gozdove, čez številne potočke, mimo samotnih jezer po mehkih z mahom obraslih stezicah pohorskih barij in skozi divje pohorske soteske. Ponuja nepozabno tekaško izkušnjo, združeno s spoznavanjem pohorskih znamenitosti kot so Meranovo, Bolfenk, Mariborska koča, Areh, Trije Kralji, Črno jezero, Osankarica, Tiho jezero, Pohorska barja, Koča Šumik, soteska Lobnice in še mnogo skritih kotičkov neokrnjene narave Pohorja.
Description in English
The PUT 85K route will introduce you to the Eastern and Central part of Pohorje. It offers an excellent and original opportunity to experience trail running on the trails of the unspoiled nature of Pohorje. The trail winds over the wine-growing region of Pohorje hills, observational ridges, along ski slopes, past hospitable cottages, through rich forests, across numerous streams, past secluded lakes, following the moss overgrown pathways of Pohorje marshes and through wild gorges of Pohorje. It is an unforgettable trail running experience combined with discovering the attractions of Pohorje such as Meranovo, Bolfenk, Maribor cottage, Areh, Trije Kralji, Črno jezero, Osankarica, Tiho jezero, Pohorje marshes, Šumik cottage, Lobnica gorge and many other hidden corners of the pristine nature of Pohorje.

Trasa PUT 53K vam bo predstavila vzhodni del Pohorja. Nudi edinstveno priložnost za doživetje teka po stezah neokrnjene narave Pohorja. Poteka preko vinorodnih pohorskih gričev, razglednih grebenov, po smučarskih strminah, mimo gostoljubnih pohorskih koč, skozi strnjene pohorske gozdove, čez številne potočke in skozi divje pohorske soteske. Ponuja nepozabno tekaško izkušnjo, združeno s spoznavanjem pohorskih znamenitosti kot so Meranovo, Bolfenk, Mariborska koča, Areh, Pragozd Šumik, Slap Šumik, Koča Šumik, soteska Lobnice in še mnogo drugih skritih kotičkov neokrnjene narave Pohorja.
Description in English
The PUT 53K route will introduce you to the Eastern part of Pohorje. It offers an excellent and original opportunity to experience trail running on the trails of the unspoiled nature of Pohorje. The trail winds over the  wine-growing region of Pohorje hills, observational ridges, along ski slopes, past hospitable cottages, through serried forests, across numerous streams, and through wild Pohorje gorges. It is an unforgettable trail running  experience combined with discovering  the attractions of Pohorje such as Meranovo, Bolfenk, Mariborska koča, Areh, Šumik forest, Šumik waterfall, Šumik cottage, Lobnica gorge and many other hidden corners of the pristine nature of Pohorje.

Trasa PUT 35K vas bo popeljala po dveh pohorskih soteskah. Najprej skozi Bistriški vintgar, mimo Črnega jezera, skozi strnjene pohorske gozdove do Koče Šumik in nato posoteski reke Lobnice mimo slapa Šumik ter skozi Pragozd Šumik do Ruš. Ponuja nepozabno tekaško izkušnjo, združeno s spoznavanjem pohorskih znamenitosti.
Description in English
The PUT 35K route will take you through two Pohorje gorges. First, through the Bistrica Vintgar gorge, past the Črno Jezero Lake, through rich forests to the Šumik cottage, and then along the gorge of the Lobnica River past the Šumik waterfall and through the Šumik virgin forest to Ruše. It offers an unforgettable trail running experience combined with discovering the attractions of Pohorje.

Trasa PUT 17K vas bo popeljala po obronkih Pohorja med Rušami in vinorodnimi griči na Meranovem. Pot se vzpne vse do Doma na Pečkah in ni zelo zahtevna. Nudi vse trail užitke, tako nekaj vzponov, kot tudi spustov, ozkih stezic in senco v zavetju neokrnjene pohorske narave. Manjkalo ne bo niti prekrasnih razgledov.
Description in English
The PUT 17K route will take you along the slopes of Pohorje between Ruše and the wine-growing hills of Meranovo, ascent to the Dom na Pečkah cottage. The path is not very demanding, it offers all the trail running pleasures, several climbs as well as descents, following narrow trails into the shade of the unspoiled Pohorje nature. However, there will be no shortage of breathtaking views.

Experience the Trail Running Capital of North America! Ponderosa and lodgepole pines line the course as you roll along ancient volcanoes and the Deschutes River valley. Start and finish along the Cascade Lakes Scenic Byway in the shadow of the majestic Mount Bachelor.

美丽野川，魅力高平
美丽野川，魅力高平

Tromsø Mountiain Ultra 50km starter i Snarbyeidet og følger Troms Turlag sin løype sørover og passerer fire av hyttene på fjellet. Ved disse hyttene er det service stasjoner. Videre går lypa ned nordfor Tromsdalstinden ned til øvre del av Tromsdalen før man stiger opp til toppen av Bønntuva. Så løper man ned over Fløyafjellet ned til Fjellheisen, videre ned til Tromsdalen og i mål.  Fantastisk terreng med variert underlag, myr, fine stier, steinur, skog og grusvei. Du får alt!
Description in English
Tromsø Mountiain Ultra 50km take place outside the Arctic City of Tromsø in northern Norway.  Fantastic terrain with varied surfaces, marshland, fine paths, stone walk, forest and dirt road. You get everything!Starts in Snarbyeidet and follows walking trail south and passes four of the cabins on the mountain. At these cabins there are service stations. Further, the trail goes down north of Tromsdalstinden down to the upper part of Tromsdalen before rising up to the top of Bønntuva. Then you run down the Fløya mountain down to Fjellheisen, further down to Tromsdalen and in the finish.

The HalfUltra 25km trail offers varied conditions, larger trails, lush mountainsides, rocky areas, tough hills and good paths. If the weather gods are good to us you will have a fantastic view of TromsĂ¸ city at the top of the trail at BĂ¸nntuva. Or, you could experience some rough North Norwegian weather. The contrasts are big, both on the trail and weathervise

Motbakkeløp med start ved Tromsø Camping og mål på toppen av Tromsdalstinden 1238 moh
Description in English
Uphill race with start from Tromsø Camping and finsh at the top of Tromsdalstinen 1238 meter over sea level

53 КИЛОМЕТРА СКВОЗЬ ДИКУЮ И НЕВЕРОЯТНУЮ ЧУКОТКУЭто одно из самых необычных трейл- путешествий 2019 года, которое разбудит вашу внутреннюю силу и перевернет все представления о реальности. 53 километра сложной трассы - тундровых болот, бродов, курумников, ручьев. 1800 метров набора высоты и финиш на горе Золотая, где победителей ждут медали из настоящего золота Чукотки.Ставь большие цели, будь ближе к мечте, прими вызов «Территории»!
Description in English
53 KILOMETERS THROUGH THE WILD AND INCREDIBLE CHUKOTKAThis is one of the most extraordinary trail-adventures of 2019, which will wake up your inner strength and turn all perceptions of reality upside down. 53 kilometers of difficult trails - tundra swamps, fords, rock rivers, streams. 1800 meters of climb and finish on Mount Zolotaya (Golden), where the winners will be awarded with real gold medals from Chukotka. Set big goals, be closer to the dream, accept the challenge of "Territory"!

Doživjeti ljepotu prirode!Žumberak Trail međunarodna je trail utrka koja će se održati na području Parka prirode Žumberak Samoborsko gorje, samo 30-ak km jugozapadno od Zagreba. Osim trčanja netaknutom prirodom, trkači će prema svojim mogućnostima moći odabrati između četiri različite duljine staza: Rekreativna (8 km), Kratka (15 km), Duga (25 km) i Ultra (50 km). Nastup na stazama Challenger i Ultra omogućava osvajanje svjetskih bodova u trail trčanju (ITRA).Žumberak Trail je jedina utrka takvog tipa u kontinentalnom dijelu Hrvatske, a ujedno će biti i jedna od utrka Hrvatskog trail kupa.
Description in English
Enjoy the beauty of nature !Žumberak Trail is an international trail running race that is going to take place on the area of nature park Žumberak Samoborsko gorje (Samobor’s surrounding hills), only 30km southwest of Zagreb. Beside running through untouched nature, the runners will according to their abilities have the opportunity to choose among 4 different routh lenghts Rekreativna (8 km), Kratka (15 km), Duga (25 km) i Ultra (50 km). The competition on the routes Challenger and Ultra enables participants to obtain world points in trail running (ITRA).Žumberak Trail is the only race of such kind in the continental part of Croatia and will at the same time be the only race of the Croatian trail cup.

Die interessanten Strecken machen 250 Jahre Industriegeschichte hautnah erlebbar. Dazu erschließt der Hartfüssler Trail markante Orte, wie die alten Grubensiedlungen Von der Heydt, Camphausen und Brefeld. Er führt uns auf spannenden Single-Trails durch verwunschene Täler im Erholungsraum Saarkohlenwald (Urwald vor den Toren der Stadt) und vorbei an ehemaligen Absinkweihern und Bergbaufolgelandschaften zu den Fördertürmen und ehemaligen Produktionsstätten des Saarbergbaus. Eine besondere läuferische Herausforderung stellen die bizarren Halden dar, die in Püttlingen, Göttelborn, Camphausen, Brefeld und in Rußhütte zu erklimmen sind und die bei entsprechendem Wetter eine Aussicht bis weit über die Landesgrenzen hinaus präsentieren
Description in English
Relive 250 years of coal mining in one dayFor many early coal miners, the way to work implied a long foot march. With no other means to reach the mines, miners would have to cross long distances on trails, a practice that carried on well into the early 20th century. Hence the term “Hartfüßler” became popular as an honorable title, given to these “people with hard feet”.The Hartfüßler Trail stands as a reminder of this era and its cultural heritage.

The Coffee Trails, 5th race in the Hell Race Trail Series, is set to happen in Coorg on 25th August 2019. The route goes through coffee plantations, jungle and open grassland while climbing three high peaks in Coorg; Kabbe Motte, Chomakund and Thadiandamol. Itâs a 31k loop with 2040m elevation gain, which will leave you breathless.

It's a terrain like no other - Shola, which is a combination of grassland and evergreen forest. But not to be fooled by it's beauty, it also brings to the table a pretty rough and demanding course with rocky sections and steep climbs. Come race the Coffee Trails in Coorg, the Scotland of India.

24 - 25 августа 2019 года ЛЫСКОВСКИЙ ТРЕЙЛ НА ВОЛГЕЛысковский Трейл — это трейловый забег в окрестностях старого русского городка Лысково, расположившегося на побережье величайшей реки Волги между двух гор — Лысой и Олениной.Непередаваемой красоты виды на Макарьевский монастырь на противоположном берегу Волги, вид с Венца на испещренную озерами прибрежную линию, Оленина гора с ее историей (когда-то на ней и стоял город-крепость), источники с ключевой водой, небольшие речушки Сундовик и Валава то тут, то там образующие труднопроходимые преграды, абсолютно соленый источник, бьющий из самого сердца древнего Девонского моря и по-своему уникальные пейзажи средней полосы России позволят сделать Ваше участие незабываемым.Мы постарались чтобы Вы могли выбрать дистанцию по душе и возможностям, а также подготовили забег для самых маленьких участников: маршруты — 8,7 км, 21 км, 51 км, 90 км, 160 км, эстафета 4 х 40 км и детский забег на 1,5 км.Но даже если Вы не готовы бежать, то можете поучаствовать в этом незабываемом мероприятии и помочь нам его организовать — возьмите на себя роль одного из создателей этого праздника — станьте волонтером!До встрече на земле Лысковской!Старт у отеля Парус (https://parrus-hotel.ru/)P.S. Кстати, здесь можно почитать про историю города Лысково - http://www.nn-obl.ru/история/история-города-лысково/
Description in English
24 - 25 august 2019 LYSKOVSKIY TRAIL ON the VOLGAThe Lyskovsky Trail is a trail race in the vicinity of the old Russian town of Lyskovo, located on the coast of the greatest Volga river between two mountains — Bald and Venison.Indescribable beauty of the views Macarius monastery on the opposite Bank of the Volga river, view from the Crown dotted with lakes coastal line, Deer mountain with its history (once it was a fortress city), the sources of spring water, small stream Dundovic and Walawa here and there forming an impenetrable barrier, is absolutely salt spring gushing from the very heart of the ancient Devonian sea and unique landscapes of Central Russia will allow to make Your participation memorable.We tried to make you choose the distance to your liking and opportunities, and also prepared a race for the youngest participants: routes — 8,7 km, 21 km, 51 km, 90 km, 160 km, relay 4 х 40 km and children's race for 1 km.But even if You are not ready to run, you can participate in this unforgettable event and help us to organize it — take the role of one of the creators of this holiday — become a volunteer!See you on the ground Lyskovskiy!Start at Sail hotel (https://parrus-hotel.ru/)P.S. by the Way, here you can read about the history of the city of Lyskovo - http://www.nn-obl.ru/история/история-города-лысково/

24 - 25 августа 2019 года ЛЫСКОВСКИЙ ТРЕЙЛ НА ВОЛГЕЛысковский Трейл — это трейловый забег в окрестностях старого русского городка Лысково, расположившегося на побережье величайшей реки Волги между двух гор — Лысой и Олениной.Непередаваемой красоты виды на Макарьевский монастырь на противоположном берегу Волги, вид с Венца на испещренную озерами прибрежную линию, Оленина гора с ее историей (когда-то на ней и стоял город-крепость), источники с ключевой водой, небольшие речушки Сундовик и Валава то тут, то там образующие труднопроходимые преграды, абсолютно соленый источник, бьющий из самого сердца древнего Девонского моря и по-своему уникальные пейзажи средней полосы России позволят сделать Ваше участие незабываемым.Мы постарались чтобы Вы могли выбрать дистанцию по душе и возможностям, а также подготовили забег для самых маленьких участников: маршруты — 8,7 км, 21 км, 51 км, 90 км, 160 км, эстафета 4 х 40 км и детский забег на 1,5 км.Но даже если Вы не готовы бежать, то можете поучаствовать в этом незабываемом мероприятии и помочь нам его организовать — возьмите на себя роль одного из создателей этого праздника — станьте волонтером!До встрече на земле Лысковской!Старт у отеля Парус (https://parrus-hotel.ru/)P.S. Description in English

24 - 25 августа 2019 года ЛЫСКОВСКИЙ ТРЕЙЛ НА ВОЛГЕЛысковский Трейл — это трейловый забег в окрестностях старого русского городка Лысково, расположившегося на побережье величайшей реки Волги между двух гор — Лысой и Олениной.Непередаваемой красоты виды на Макарьевский монастырь на противоположном берегу Волги, вид с Венца на испещренную озерами прибрежную линию, Оленина гора с ее историей (когда-то на ней и стоял город-крепость), источники с ключевой водой, небольшие речушки Сундовик и Валава то тут, то там образующие труднопроходимые преграды, абсолютно соленый источник, бьющий из самого сердца древнего Девонского моря и по-своему уникальные пейзажи средней полосы России позволят сделать Ваше участие незабываемым.Мы постарались чтобы Вы могли выбрать дистанцию по душе и возможностям, а также подготовили забег для самых маленьких участников: маршруты — 8,7 км, 21 км, 51 км, 90 км, 160 км, эстафета 4 х 40 км и детский забег на 1,5 км.Но даже если Вы не готовы бежать, то можете поучаствовать в этом незабываемом мероприятии и помочь нам его организовать — возьмите на себя роль одного из создателей этого праздника — станьте волонтером!До встрече на земле Лысковской!Старт у отеля Парус (https://parrus-hotel.ru/)P.S. Кстати, здесь можно почитать про историю города Лысково - http://www.nn-obl.ru/история/история-города-лысково/

Ring O' Fire is a coastal ultra marathon which takes runners on an extraordinary 135 mile journey around the Isle of Anglesey, North Wales. The epic foot race is staged over three consecutive days and follows the rugged and spectacular Anglesey Coastal Path.

Un parcours extraordinaire, technique et exigeant ! Un concentré de sentiers dans la forêt, traversant des alpages mais aussi de la haute montagne à travers un immense pierrier ralliant le point culminent de ce parcours : le Col de Pra fleuri à 2987 m d’altitude.Ce parcours laissera sans voix ceux qui sauront apprécier le paysage qui s’offrira à eux !

Au départ de la plaine des Ecluses à Nendaz, ce parcours intermédiaire offre un magnifique paysage aux concurrents sur des sentiers traversant forêts et alpages. Le retour depuis Siviez emprunte le mythique bisse de Saxon jusqu’à Nendaz. Le point culminant, le Basso d’Alou à 2337 m, offrira un magnifique panorama aux coureurs.

Ce parcours permet de se lancer dans la compétition de Trail, de découvrir ce milieu, tout en appréciant les paysages environnant. En effet, la région de Nendaz dispose de magnifiques sentiers traversant forêts et clairières permettant de s’évader.

70km:n pituinen Nuuksio70 Trail Ultra esittelee Nuuksion kansallispuiston parhaat juoksupolut ja hienoimmat maisemat. Matka otettiin tapahtuman ohjelmaan osanottajien pyynnöstä ja järjestetään tänä vuonna toista kertaa.
Description in English
Nuuksio70 Trail Ultra presents the finest running trails and the most beautiful spots of Nuuksio National Park, a large wilderness area  only 30min from Helsinki, Finland.

Nuuksio Classic Trail Marathon on yksi Suomen perinteisimpiä polkujuoksuja. Se juostaan Nuuksion kansallispuistossa lähellä Helsinkiä.
Description in English
Nuuksio Classic Trail Marathon is one of the most iconic trail runs in Finland. Its beautiful course winds on wild forest trails in Nuuksio National Park close to Helsinki. The event takes places for the 8th time in 2019.

Tom walker 
Description in English
Southcoast@ultrachallenge.com
Entry Fee: Self funding 100km places are  £195 , Mixed funding places are £99 and Charity places are  £15 with a agreement to fund-raise £625 pounds for there chosen Charity

Description:
Trail d'une longueur totale de 115km pour 5000D+, découpé en 10 boucles de 10 Km à 12 km environ avec chacune un parcours différent.En vous inscrivant vous n’aurez pas à choisir la distance de votre course. La distance “libre” de ce trail varie de 10 Km minimum (1 boucle) à 115 Km maximum (10 boucles).Toutes les boucles ont le même point de départ et d'arrivée, le camping de la Marette, situé sur la commune de Joannas, qui sera également le lieu de ravitaillement commun aux 10 boucles.Pas de contrainte kilométrique vous êtes seul maître de votre défi. De 1 à 10 boucles, vous êtes libre d’arrêter ou de continuer la course à la fin de chaque boucle.
Description in English
Trail with a total length of 115km for 5000D +, cut into 10 loops of 10 Km to 12 km each with a different course.By registering you will not have to choose the distance of your race. The "free" distance of this trail varies from 10 km minimum (1 loop) to 115 Km maximum (10 loops).All the loops have the same point of departure and arrival, the camp-site of Marette, located on the commune of Joannas, which will also be the place of supply common to the 10 loops.No kilometric constraint you are the only master of your challenge.From 1 to 10 loops, you are free to stop or continue the race at the end of each loop.
Entry Fee:
Trail 35 euros
Pasta party 10 euros (vendredi soir)
Repas 15 euros (samedi soir)

The "free" distance of this trail varies from 10 km minimum (1 loop) to 115 Km maximum (10 loops).All the loops have the same point of departure and arrival, the camp-site of Marette, located on the commune of Joannas, which will also be the place of supply common to the 10 loops.No kilometric constraint you are the only master of your challenge.From 1 to 10 loops, you are free to stop or continue the race at the end of each loop.
Entry Fee:
Trail 35 euros
Pasta party 10 euros (vendredi soir)
Repas 15 euros (samedi soir)

Description:
Trail d'une longueur totale de 115km pour 5000D+, découpé en 10 boucles de 10 Km à 12 km environ avec chacune un parcours différent.En vous inscrivant vous n’aurez pas à choisir la distance de votre course. La distance “libre” de ce trail varie de 10 Km minimum (1 boucle) à 115 Km maximum (10 boucles).Toutes les boucles ont le même point de départ et d'arrivée, le camping de la Marette, situé sur la commune de Joannas, qui sera également le lieu de ravitaillement commun aux 10 boucles.Pas de contrainte kilométrique vous êtes seul maître de votre défi. De 1 à 10 boucles, vous êtes libre d’arrêter ou de continuer la course à la fin de chaque boucle.

Description: The Grand Tour of Skiddaw is a 44 mile fully waymarked ultra trail event with 7136 feet of ascent, held in the beautiful Lake District in the UK.

The Pyrenees Stage Run is a 7 stage race beginning in Ribes de Freser and finishing in Salardu with two stages in Andorra. It offers the possibility to cross the Pyrenees following the GR11 and going through places that you will never forget. We offer two registration options, one without accomodation, and another in hotels. Dinner every night included. The participation in the PSR will be in teams of 2 or 3 runners.
Semi-Marathon de Montagne

Corsa che percorre il giro completo del Monviso alla sua base con partenza ed arrivo nel paese di Crissolo Valle Po, caratteristico il transito nel buco di Viso la prima galleria montana aperta nel 1480 a 2.882 m di quota.
Description in English
A race that runs along the complete tour of Monviso at its base with departure and arrival in the village of Crissolo Valle Po, characteristic transit in the hole of the face the first Galleria Montana opened in 1480 to 2,882 m of altitude.

54km 5400m 5 cabanes, 2 glaciers, 3 passages à plus de 3000m le tout sur des itinéraires alpins extrêmement techniques. Le défi ultime du Trailer alpin au cœur des cinqs 4000.
Description in English
54km 5400m5 huts, 2 glacier, 3 passages over 3000m all on very technical alpine paths. The ultimate challenge of the Alpine Trailer in the heart of the swiss alps

Trail alpin court au coeur des cinq 4000
Description in English
Short alpin trail in the heart of the Swiss Alps

Event: La Via Di Annibale - Hannibal Trail 2019
Description:
Questa corsa vuole ricordare il passaggio di Hanniba’al nel 218 a.C. dal Colle dell’Autaret nell’Alta Valle di Viù, nelle Valli di Lanzo. E questo è un pretesto per correre in un ambiente naturalmente integro dove l’altitudine, il sole, il vento e la neve sono i dominatori e padroni. Corsa di alta montagna che parte ed arriva ad Usseglio (To) passando per due passi oltre i 3000 m e sul nevaio dell'ex ghiacciaio Bertà. La gara si svolge il primo week-end di settembre.Il percorso “La via di Annibale®” Sky Marathon (ASM) è classificato con il bollino rosso: EE  itinerario per escursionisti esperti. Si snoda prevalentemente su strade forestali, mulattiere e sentieri in quota. E’ un itinerario che richiede la capacità di muoversi su terreni particolari, tracce o sentieri impervi o infidi (pendii con affioramenti rocciosi o detritici), talora impegnativi ed esposti. Con due colli oltre i 3000 m, attraversamento di nevai e i resti del ghiacciaio Berta. Sono possibili nevicate durante la gara che seppur relativamente breve ha un alto fascino tecnico e paesaggistico. Il percorso segue il seguente itinerario: Usseglio 1260, Margone 1410, Rifugio Cibrario 2616, Colle Sulè 3073, Colle Autaret 3071, Punta Costan 3305 in territorio Francese, Rifugio Tazzetti 2642, Lago di Malciussia /rifugio Vulpot 1805, Usseglio 1260.La descrizione e documentazione del transito del condottiero cartaginese è descritta nel romanzo storico "La Druida di Margun" di Sisto Merlino www.druida.info
Description in English
This race wants to recollect Hanniba'al’s crossing of the Alps in 218 BC. across the Autaret Pass in the Upper Valley of Viù, in the Lanzo Valleys. And this is a pretext to run in a naturally intact environment where altitude, sun, wind and snow are lords and masters.A high mountain race that starts and finishes in Usseglio (To) going through two passes of more than 3000 m and across the snowfields of the former Briere glacier. The race takes place in the first weekend of September.The route "The way of Hannibal®" Sky Marathon (ASM) is classified with the red dot: EEA route for experienced hikers. It mainly runs on forest roads, mule tracks and trails at high altitude. It is an itinerary that requires the ability to move on particular terrains, tracks and inaccessible or treacherous paths (slopes with rocky outcrops or loose stone), sometimes challenging and exposed. It includes two passes of over 3000 m, the crossing of snowfields and the remains of the Berta glacier. Snowfalls are possible during the race which, even though relatively short, has a high technical and scenic appeal. The route moves along the following itinerary : Usseglio 1260, Margone 1410, Rifugio Cibrario 2616, Colle Sulè 3073, Colle Autaret 3071, Punta Costan 3305 in French territory, Rifugio Tazzetti 2642, Lago di Malciussia / refuge Vulpot 1805, Usseglio 1260.The description and documentation of the Carthaginian leader's journey is described in the historical novel "La Druida di Margun" by Sisto Merlino www.druida.info
