“Volcanoes Marathon” inicia-se no território mais jovem de Portugal, o Vulcão dos Capelinhos, autêntico cenário lunar onde é possível pisar terreno formado por cinzas, tufo e bombas vulcânicas com apenas 60 anos de idade, tendo como linha de partida o Porto do Comprido à cota zero, naquela que foi a principal e maior estação baleeira dos Açores entre 1940 e 1957. Sobe a península do Capelo onde atravessará 10 vulcões adormecidos, entrando na Levada, a maior obra de engenharia hidráulica da década de 60 nos Açores. Após percorrer 9 Km desta espetacular levada, atravessando pontes e tuneis, chegará à Caldeira do Faial, uma das maiores e mais espetaculares caldeiras vulcânicas que existem no planeta, percorrendo o seu perímetro. Daqui desce, por caminhos antigos, até à cidade da Horta, umas das mais belas baías do mundo.Considerado pela Comissão Europeia como um Destino Europeu de Excelência, o Parque Natural do Faial está repleto de paisagens arrebatadoras, aves nativas, plantas únicas e formações geológicas emblemáticas, tudo rodeado por um magnífico mar azul, puro e vivo. Criado em 2008, é missão do Parque Natural a conservação deste magnífico património natural e a preservação da herança cultural de uma longa história de convivência entre o Homem e a Natureza, assentes num desenvolvimento sustentável e duradouro.
Description in English
The Volcanoes Marathon – starts in the youngest piece of land of Portugal, the Capelinhos volcano, were you have the sensation that you are on another planet. Here it´s possible to walk on a terrain formed by ashes, tuff and volcanic bombs with 58 years old. The start line is at the sea level in the “Comprido´s” port, the most important and biggest whaling station of the Azores between 1940 and 1957, the year that the volcano started his eruption.The trail rises up through the peninsula of Capelo and crosses 10 sleeping volcanoes entering in the “Levada”, considered the biggest work of hydraulic engineering of the 1960´s decade in Azores. After 9 Km passing through bridges and tunnels of this artificial and spectacular water channel, there´s the arrival to the Caldeira of Faial, one of the most spectacular volcanic caldera´s on the planet. After making it´s perimeter, it starts the descent through old roads to the city of Horta placed in one of the most beautiful bays in the world.

Race: From The Vineyards To The Mountain

Description:
As fajãs são o elemento que confere à orla costeira de São Jorge a sua singularidade, caraterizando-se por serem pequenos retalhos de terra plana encaixados entre as montanhas e o mar, que resultam do desabamento da encosta ou por arrefecimento de lava proveniente de uma erupção.O “Trail das Fajãs” está assim pensado para as contemplar e permitir o contato direto com as diferentes realidades existentes, pois cada uma tem as suas caraterísticas distintas e únicas.O trail, de cerca de 30 Km, inicia-se no complexo vulcânico mais antigo da ilha, na freguesia de São Tomé, percorrendo de seguida algumas fajãs da costa sul, onde se cultiva o inhame, a banana e o café (únicos lugares da Europa onde existe a produção de café devido à existência de microclimas favoráveis). O trail segue para o alto da colina para descer em direção às fajãs do norte, reconhecidas e classificadas pela presença de uma paisagem singular. Aqui integra-se a Fajã da Caldeira de Santo Cristo, um dos destinos turísticos mais procurados, principalmente pelos amantes do surf sendo este local um spot privilegiado para esta modalidade. As fajã da Caldeira de Santo Cristo e dos Cubres são também dois locais reconhecidos internacionalmente como Sítios Ramsar, pelo valor estético e paisagístico atribuído pela presença das suas lagunas costeiras, únicas no arquipélago. É na Fajã dos Cubres, junto à Ermida que termina esta 2ª etapa.
Description in English
“Fajãs” are the elements that gives the singularity and the peculiar aspect of the São Jorge Island shorelines. They are small pieces of flat land stuck between the mountains and the sea. They result from the collapse of material that accumulates on the foothills of the shore or by the cooling of lava that reaches the water.Each one of this “Fajãs” is unique, and this trail is prepared to contemplate and to allow the contact with all of them different aspects.The trail with about 30 Km starts at the most ancient volcanic complex of the island at the São Tomé parish. At the beginning it passes through some of the “Fajãs” of the South coast were the yam, banana and coffee is cultivated (it´s one of the few places in Europe that has production of coffee due to the existence of favorable microclimates). The trail follows to the top of the hill and descents into the “Fajãs” of the North coast like the Fajã da Caldeira de Santo Cristo, one the most popular touristic sites of the island, a privileged spot for surfing. The Fajãs of the Caldeira de Santo Cristo and Cubres are also two places internationally recognized has Ramsar Sites due to the aesthetic and landscape value and because of these two unique lagoons in the Archipelago. This second stage ends at the Fajã dos Cubres near a small chapel.

MESASTILA PEAKS CHALLENGE â is a unique and extreme trail running event that aims to challenge the inner spirit and the physical condition in the heart of Java. This yearâs races will definitely be more challenging and offer more beautiful Javanese scenery, with five categories 100k/65k/42k/42k/21k/11k Escape onto unused tracks, overgrown jungle trails, small village roads, rice paddies, cross and climb up to five mountains in Central Java Mt. Andong 1726m, Mt. Merbabu 3145, Mt. Merapi 2930, Mt. Telomoyo 1894m and Mt. Gilipetung 1400m with a cumulative gain of up to 7758 m, finishing in the retreat of MesaStila

Description:
Ultra Trail Tour Finlandin finaalikisa Kolin kansallispuistossa. 
Description in English
Vaarojen Maraton is pioneer among the Finnish trail running events. It is the final race of the BUFF Trail Tour Finland (42,5 km) and Ultra-Trail Tour Finland (130 km). Other courses 13,5 km and 65 km. Alternating altitudes, technically challenging trails and ascetic service points are our cornerstones. The event takes place in Koli, Finland's most well-known national landscape, in and around the Koli National Park, close to the Finnish-Russian border in North Karelia.

This challenging 43ish mile route takes in some of the most stunning views the west pennine moors has to offer as well as taking in all 3 iconic towers, Rivington, Jubilee and Peel Towers, the event boasts an elevation of 7500 ft!The route skirts Darwen and quickly climbs up to the first of the 3 towers, the Jubilee Tower before heading across to White Coppice via Cartridge Hill and Great Hill.   You will then navigate your way towards Jepsons gate before a steep climb up to the second tower, Rivington Tower. ​From there, you will navigate your way across Rivington and Longworth moor.  Continuing to Turton Heights and onwards in to Hawkshaw.Then the final phase of the event tackles the challenging Holcombe Moor and the final climb up towards Peel Tower before making your way across down to Cronkshaw Fold Farm.  From here you will skirt Bull Hill and head back towards Darwen, finishing at the Ranken Arms Pub for a cheeky pint! ;) The terrain is hilly and undulating over the entire course, and in parts hits public roads.. there will be check points throughout the route with a strict & enforced cut off time at CP 3.  One (of many) positive comments of last and this year was how awesome each CP was... We certainly load them with a variety of food and drink to help keep you fueled throughout the run... Such as:BananasOrangesSoreenTrail mix/peanutsSweets/Jelly babiesPiesSausage RollsFalafelsCoke WaterEnergy drink​When you successfully cross the finish line, you will receive a very bespoke and unique 3 towers medal for your efforts plus hot food provided by the Ranken Arms Pub! ​This event has a 13 hour cut off with a strict cut off at the Red Lion Pub check point at 29 miles in Hawkshaw. You MUST be at this checkpoint no later than 3pm. You will be stopped there if this is not achieved. ​Pre req: It is strongly advised you have completed a trail marathon & have experience in trail running & navigation prior to entering this event. ​Mandatory kit listUltra running belt or backpack with the ability to hold 500ml -1L of fluidsHat and glovesFully charged mobile phoneSuitable race wearPrescribed medicationMoneyMap of route (GPX will be emailed to registered runners) (OS287)
100K single track trail race in Dahlonega, GA with over 11,000ft of climbing

Antik Mysia Bölgesi’ nin sınırları içinde Erdek ’in de (ARTEKA) bulunduğu, Yunanistan’ın Thessalia Bölgesi’ nden buraya göç eden Dolionlar’ ın yaşadığı bir bölgedir. Yunanistan’ın ünlü Argonautlar Destanı’ nda ismi geçen Dolionlar’ ın genç kralı olan KYZİKOS, Thessalialı bir kahraman olduğu belirtilmektedir.

1893-1923 yılları arasında eskiden yöredeki Rumlar’ ın dini merkezi olarak kullanılıp, Havari Lukas’ın eseri olduğuna ve mucizeler yarattığına inanılan Panagia Theotokos Faneromeni Manastırı ( Kirazlı manastır) o dönemde binlerce kişi tarafından ziyaret ediliyordu.

Eski dönemlerde papaz Apostol’ un ismiyle anılan “Ayia Apostoli” isimli küçük kır kilisesine dayanarak bölgeye ‘“APOSTOL” ismi verilmiştir. Dilek ağacı olarak bilinen yaşlı çınarın dibinden kaynayan berrak su, çifte oluklu bir çeşmeden akıtılmış olup  çeşmenin yalağı mermer bir lahitten oluşur.

This section of the Oregon Coast is rugged, remote and stunning! The courses vary from running on the sandy beaches to the grassy bluffs hundreds of feet above while waves crash onto the rocks below. Runners will also be graced with trails through dark old growth forest, old sand dunes now covered in trees, and stunning tree tunnels. It is one jaw dropping, camera grabbing view after another, all day long! You're going to be smiling ear to ear, mile after mile.

爆發熱情及色彩的山林體驗>>野人支援站特別補給除了賽事必需的能量飲料及水份補給，我們更會為野人跑手準備本地特色食物等。>>游擊打氣支援我們廣邀各路表演者及啦啦隊，於賽道突撃出現，為野人跑手打打氣、醒醒神。>>終點圖騰派對野人跑手完賽後，可參與圖騰派對，享用特色美食，甚至與其他野人一起載歌載舞，享受汗水過後的歡樂氣氛。
Description in English
Experience a blast of passion and colours>>Special refreshments at Tribe Support StationsApart from the usual energy drinks and water, we have prepared an array of special local snacks for Wild Runners.>>Guerilla cheering spotsDifferent performers are invited to pop up any time in the race course and cheer for our Wild Runners.>>Totem PartyAfter the race, all Wild Runners are welcome to join the Totem Party. Enjoy the sumptuous refreshments as you celebrate the crowd.

Description:
I percorsi della TARTUFO TRAIL RUNNING ® fanno parte dell'Appennino Tosco-Emiliano che l' UNESCO ha dichiarato “Riserva MAB ” (Man and the Biosphere), un importante riconoscimento che promuove e dimostra una relazione equilibrata fra “L'Uomo e la Biosfera”, fra la nostra comunità e gli ecosistemi di questo terrritorio. Un'occasione unica per correre nell'Appennino Parmense tra storia e natura, alla riscoperta di vecchie piste e sentieri.
Description in English
The routes of TTR® are part of the Toscan-Emiglian Appenines, that whose declared “M&B Reserve – Man & Biosphere Reserve” by UNESCO on 9 Juine 2015, an important award that promotes and confirms a balanced relationship between “Man and Biosphere” and between our community and the ecosystems of this Region. A  unique opportunity to run in the Parmesan Appenines, following ancient paths and routes in the midst of history and nature.

Course de montagne à allure libre, en  semi- autosuffisance sur trois  distances : 9k500;  16kms et 42kms. Ouverte aux catégories cadet (uniquement pour les 9k500), junior (uniquement 9.5kms et 16kms)  espoir, seniors, vétérans hommes et femmes licenciés ou non. Un bidon ou une ceinture à boisson est obligatoire.  Cette course est organisée dans le plus pur esprit des  épreuves de TRAIL , respect du  site, de la  nature. Seul le 16kms est ouvert aux marcheurs. L'épreuve compte pour le Challenge Trail Nature 06 et le   challenge du Spiridon. (Seulement le 16 et 42kms)

Здесь нужно писать эпичные слова о том, какая тут жесть и как каждый станет героем, пройдя её. Но мы не будем. Для нас каждый, кто выходит на дистанцию — герой, совершающий свой подвиг.Кто отправится в путешествие — увидят больше, чем кто-либо. Прочувствуют столь многое в столь долгом мгновении. Здесь сменятся для них лесные тропы и чащи, песчаными карьерами, просеками, бескрайними полями, болотистыми местностями, заросшими хвойными аллеями, деревянными мостиками, озерами. Каждый километр принесет новые испытания и яркие воспоминания.Это уже нечто большее, нечто особенное, на что нам хочется написать: да, тут будет жарко! Как только вы сойдете с асфальта, вас будет ждать настоящий дикий трейл. Возможность выйти за грани возможного и найти себя настоящего!
Description in English
For the most experienced trail runners, confident in their capabilities or strive in testing them

Дистанция собрала в себя, как калейдоскоп, — разнообразие Подмосковных красот, способных удивить многих. И если в какой-то момент покажется, что вы уже видели всё на этой трассе — сделайте еще несколько шагов, неожиданно для себя обернитесь или просто даже посмотрите под ноги: насколько всё разное!Здесь будет сложно. Резкие спуски и подъемы. Разнообразие леса, наполненное и беговыми тропинками, и непролазной чащей. Броды, дарящие прохладу уставшим ногам и стремящиеся вас поглотить средь тростника. Кочки, грязь, трава и поля, среди которых не видно друг друга. Поваленные деревья.И всё столь разное. Наполненное чувствами. Позволяющее увидеть нечто большее в бескрайних полях, уходящих в небо. Позволяющее ощутить себя «здесь и сейчас» в каждом шаге.
Description in English
Exciting trail running adventure, when you’re looking for something new…and spicy!

Вы катались на «американских» горках? Мы не просто так спрашиваем вас об этом. Дистанция — тот самый аттракцион, от которого переполняет эмоциями.Лес, хвойный лес, зачарованный лес, смешанный лес, но при этом он разный, в нём сокрыты поля, броды, песчаные горки, живописные тропы. Целый мир, способный подарить невероятное множество впечатлений.Это не классический полумарафон. Это настоящее испытание. Возможность проверить себя и свои способности. Дистанция, которая, уверены, вас заворожит, влюбит. Мир, который мы хотели бы показать каждому, кто готов решиться на большее!
Description in English
Exciting trail running adventure, when you’re looking for something new…and spicy!

Оставьте ботинки и шпильки в ваших шкафах. Сложите платья и костюмы. X-Race Wild Trail — возможность пробудить себя настоящего. Поистине дикий трейл, знакомящий с удивительной природой, скрытой в Подмосковных лесах.Каждый километр трассы не похож на предыдущий! Здесь и наполненные прохладой леса, и песчаные горки, и колосящиеся поля. Несколько бродов с различным уровнем воды подарят настоящий всплеск радостных эмоций!Дистанция отлично подойдет для знакомства с трейлраннингом или для любителей скоростных забегов. Дистанция позволит вам ворваться в мир, полный эмоций и приключений!

THE AUTUMN 100 (PREVIOUSLY THE WINTER 100) IS A 100 MILE CONTINUOUS TRAIL RACE BASED IN THE TWINNED VILLAGES OF GORING & STREATLEY ON THE RIVER THAMES. THE COURSE REFLECTS THE SHAPE OF A CROSS AND TAKES RUNNERS ON A SERIES OF 4 DIFFERENT 25 MILE OUT AND BACK SPURS USING SECTIONS OF BOTH THE RIDGEWAY AND THAMES PATH NATIONAL TRAILS.

The sixth annual Cloudsplitter 100 will take place on High Knob, deep in the heart of Central Appalachia, during the weekend of October 12-13, 2019. High Knob is located at the highest point in the Cumberland Mountains at an elevation of 4,223 feet above sea level. The 100 mile course, as well as the accompanying 100k, 50k and 25k distances, wind along extremely rugged and rocky trails within the City of Norton and Jefferson National Forest trail systems. Although parts of this region have been developed, strip mined or heavily logged, High Knob remains relatively untouched, and it is home to some of the greatest diversity of plant life in the Commonwealth of Virginia, making it a true ecological treasure. The unique trails on High Knob pass through dense forestland dotted with cliffs, water crossings, waterfalls, rock shelters, rhododendron thickets, caves and enormous sandstone boulders. This is one of the more physically demanding trails in the East, and it remains a significant unprotected wilderness area. On a clear day, four other states can be seen from the High Knob summit: West Virginia, Tennessee, Kentucky and North Carolina. Due to the difficulty of the 100 mile distance, the cut off time will be 40 hours.Start times are at 8:00 a.m. for all distances. (Note: All distances have a cut off time of 40 hours).

One final ultra of the season can’t hurt that bad, or can it? The Indian Creek Fifties takes advantage of the challenging terrain lying within the South Platte Ranger District of Pike National Forest. Dropping down into the Front Range Valley for a few miles within Roxborough State Park, the Indian Creek Fifties will give you something to think about as you begin to plan the year ahead.Join us for an unforgettable day on some of Colorado’s least used singletrack trails and a few miles on the Colorado Trail. Through aspen groves and pine stands, this race will challenge you to the core. One last hurrah for the year you just had.

AN EPIC DESTINATION RACEBoth races start and finish along the Central Oregon Coast, with both the 50K & 30K races finishing in Yachats, Oregon at The Adobe Resort.The 50K is on Saturday October 12th, 2019 & the 30K (and free Kids 1K fun run) is on Sunday October 13th, 2019.The 50k course starts by running 6 miles on the beach, an out and back section from Yachats, from there both races run on trails (and a little bit of paved road) to Cape Perpetua. Both races do a loop (the 50K loop is about 9 miles and the 30K loop is about 6 miles) in the coastal forest of Cape Perpetua before heading back to a seaside finish at The Adobe Resort in Yachats.

Entry Fee: USD 90 (Includes race kit, meals and lodging. You need to bring your sleeping bag).

Description:
Una manifestazione Outdoor nello scenario mozzafiato del Supramonte di Baunei, considerata una delle pochissime wilderness in Europa e dell'intero bacino del Mediterraneo.Ti faremo correre sui sentieri dei pastori, veri custodi da sempre di questo aspro e selvaggio territorio, sulle mulattiere a picco sulle falesie, costruite dai carbonai nell'800.Mare, boschi e tanta roccia, tanto duro calcare per i trailers piĂš tosti, ma affontabile da tutti grazie alle tante distanze di gara presenti.
Description in English
An outdoor event in the breathtaking landscape of the Supramonte of Baunei, considered one of the very few wilderness in Europe and the entire Mediterranean basin.We will let you run on the paths of the shepherds, the true custodians of this harsh and wild territory, on the mule tracks overlooking the cliffs, built by the charcoal burners in the 19th century.Sea, woods and a lot of rock, so hard limestone for the toughest trailers, but everyone can count thanks to the many distances of the race.

Beautiful, community-driven trail right at the edge of town.There are few towns in the US as outdoor-focused as Bend, OR.  Driving around, you’ll quickly lose count of the vehicles that appear to be going to, or returning from, a few days in the woods.For the great folks who live in Bend, they needn’t travel far to get outside.  The Deschutes National Forest starts right at the edge of town and offers miles and miles of beautiful, accessible trail.  In fact, the Deschutes River 50K and 25K start right where the city ends and the National Forest begins — still within a ten-minute drive of a gazillion breweries. The trails are a monument to the sense of community in Bend.  While running the race, you’ll see runners, paddlers, walkers, hikers, bikers, horses, dogs — all enjoying the outdoors.  Say hello and be sure to thank them for sharing their beautiful backyard!

位于浙江龙泉的江南之巅天空越野赛，从“华东第一虐”徒步线路脱胎而来，是江南100系列赛，曾获“最具挑战百公里越野赛”奖与“浙江省十佳商业赛事”荣誉，是一场难度拔尖的超长距离越野跑比赛。赛事以阿尔卑斯风格的欧式赛道呈现，具有严苛的强装要求和报名门槛，多个技术指标创造纪录：ITRA耐力值510、山地系数15，将是今年世界唯一6积分百公里越野赛。赛道不止难度，更有江南不常见的亚高原风光，接近2000米的海拔突破云层，几乎全是非铺装土路。万米爬升的百公里越野赛，用浙江山水定义世界越野新极限，就在浙江龙泉，再一年，2019江南之巅。
Description in English
 Peak of Jiangnan100 Skyrunning Race-2019 is one of the JiangNan100 event series, and is full of customs of south area of Yangzi River,China. The race challenges human of physical and mental limits through long distance outdoor running. The event will be held in Longquan, Zhejiang province,China.

The Blackall 100 is a  50km trail race located on the Great Walk of the Sunshine Coast, Queensland. (1 hour from Brisbane Airport). The course travels through National Parks consisting of Rainforest and some stunning waterfalls.

Only the bravest, toughest and the most curious ones will choose this ULTRA race track. They will be running along the way the of whole Curonian Spit (Kuršių nerija). Imagine: it’s 6.00 AM and you are on the way to one of your biggest challenge. Nida city, dune of Parnidis are finally here; the sundial is showing nothing because of the fog, which is starting to spread out. You can feel the humidity and the wind in the air and right before your eyes you can see the magnificent sand dune and beautiful lagoon. The siren announces start of one of the best adventure in your life. Track is leading you through Nida's forest, the lighthouse, highest hill in Curonian spit (Vecekrugas 67m) there the view of Curonian Lagoon and Baltic sea will shock you. Preila city, long wild beach reservation of Naglis (11,5 km), the dark and dense forest of Juodkrantė city, where you will see the big colony of gray gooseberry's and cormorants, the hill of Witches and more than ten highest hills and dunes. When you will overcome the whole distance you will reach about 1000 vertical meters. And that’s not all that you are going to see - this track is the real guarantee of new impressions.More info, GPX and regulations you will find in our website: www.trailkursiunerija.com

Those who want to explore the Curonian Spit more will have to wander more.      In this half marathon distance you will see all places of the shortest tracks - climb to the Hagen's hill, run through Neringa's forest and WWII defensive fort which was saving Klaipėda city from air attacks in the World war II, but also you will be able to feel the freedom of forgotten, wild and wide beaches.     In this track you will find 2 refreshment points with cookies, fruits, energy drinks and more, don't forget to replenish your water reserves.     Once you’ll reach the top of the "Bear's head” dune do not forget to turn around - you will see the panorama of Klaipėda city.    In the whole distance it's able to collect 190 vertical meters.   The last kilometers goes near Curonian lagoon, you will see there our port from the other side as well as liquefied natural gas storage ship "Independence".More info, GPX and regulations you will find in our website: www.trailkursiunerija.com

Those who want to explore the Curonian Spit more will have to wander more.      In this half marathon distance you will see all places of the shortest tracks - climb to the Hagen's hill, run through Neringa's forest and WWII defensive fort bunkers which was saving Klaipėda city from air attacks in the World war II, but also you will be able to feel the freedom of forgotten, wild and wide beach.          Once you’ll reach the top of the "Bear's head” dune do not forget to turn around - you will see the panorama of Klaipėda city.      The last kilometers goes near Curonian lagoon, you will see there our port from the other side as well as liquefied natural gas storage ship "Independence".

宁海越野挑战赛起源于2013年，是一项在中国东部山区举行的长距离大规模越野赛事。宁海位于浙江东部，400多年前中国古代旅行家徐霞客就是从这儿开始了他长达34年、足迹遍布大半个中国的伟大游历。而现在，宁海有中国第一条符合国家标准、长达500公里的登山健身步道，无数户外爱好者的足迹踏上保持着山间天然原始状态的山径。宁海越野挑战赛的赛道就在宁海西部山区的登山步道上，途径原始森林、溪流、山峦、竹林，比赛饱览江南自然风光，并极具原汁原味的山野风格。
Description in English
Ultra-Trail Ninghai started in 2013. It’s a large-scale long-distance trail race held in East China’s mountain areas.Ninghai is located in Eastern Zhejiang. Four hundred years ago, Xu Xiake, a travel writer in ancient China, started his 34-year-long great journey from here and travelled throughout China. And now, Ninghai possesses China’s first 500-kilometer-long hiking trail that meets the national standard. This primordial natural trail has received numerous outdoor enthusiasts.Ultra-Trail Ninghai’s race course is part of this hiking trail in the western mountain areas of Ninghai. Going through primeval forest, streams, mountains and bamboo forests, it offers the participants a great opportunity to enjoy the natural landscape of the southern part of the Yangtze Delta and the authentic mountain feeling.

宁海越野挑战赛起源于2013年，是一项在中国东部山区举行的长距离大规模越野赛事。宁海位于浙江东部，400多年前中国古代旅行家徐霞客就是从这儿开始了他长达34年、足迹遍布大半个中国的伟大游历。而现在，宁海有中国第一条符合国家标准、长达500公里的登山健身步道，无数户外爱好者的足迹踏上保持着山间天然原始状态的山径。宁海越野挑战赛的赛道就在宁海西部山区的登山步道上，途径原始森林、溪流、山峦、竹林，比赛饱览江南自然风光，并极具原汁原味的山野风格。
Description in English
Ultra-Trail Ninghai started in 2013. It’s a large-scale long-distance trail race held in East China’s mountain areas.Ninghai is located in Eastern Zhejiang. Four hundred years ago, Xu Xiake, a travel writer in ancient China, started his 34-year-long great journey from here and travelled throughout China. And now, Ninghai possesses China’s first 500-kilometer-long hiking trail that meets the national standard. This primordial natural trail has received numerous outdoor enthusiasts.Ultra-Trail Ninghai’s race course is part of this hiking trail in the western mountain areas of Ninghai. Going through primeval forest, streams, mountains and bamboo forests, it offers the participants a great opportunity to enjoy the natural landscape of the southern part of the Yangtze Delta and the authentic mountain feeling.

The UK's classic  50 mile ultra 2019 is  the 12th Running of this fabulous race n and is one not to be missed!A tranquil run along the Thames from Oxford to Henley. Ever changing scenery on the river and Red Kites frequently seen soaring overhead. One of the best way marked routes we have come across.This is great race to prepare for even bigger challenges, using the banks and towpaths of England's largest river as well as footpaths and bridleways we have created an Ultra distance course that will always keep you interested. Well stocked feed stations and enthusiastic support complete what promises to be a great day out.

There is no doubt that the views and trails out here are sure to impress all who participate.

Event: Grand Trail Nocturne Des Hauts De France 2019
Description:
Dès le début, notre ambition pour le Grand Trail Nocturne des hauts de France à été d’organiser une course trail-ultra sur du terrain varié et nature. Nous sommes convaincu d'avoir réussi. En plus, avec une infrastructure splendide au départ et à l’arrivée, on vous offre la possibilité de courir dans notre jardin, sur les sentiers magnifique de la foret de Olhain,fréniscourt le Dolmen,l'Abbaye de Mt st éloi,la colline de notre dame de lorette,l'Anneau de la mémoire et les contours des collines de l'Artois. Avec une équipe de bénévoles incroyables, vous mangerez aussi très bien avant, pendant et après la course. Comme le Grand Trail Nocturne des hauts de France sera couru en fin d'année cette course sera pour nous la clôture de la saison de trail. Une nuit qui devrait rester dans vos mémoires !
Description in English
From the beginning, our ambition for the Grand Trail Nocturne of the Hauts de France was to organize a trail-ultra race on varied terrain and nature. We are convinced to have succeeded. In addition, with a splendid infrastructure at the start and finish, we offer you the opportunity to run in our garden, on the beautiful trails of the forest of Olhain, freniscourt the Dolmen, the abbey of Mt st eloi, the hill of our Lady of Lorette, the Ring of Memory and the contours of the hills of Artois. With an amazing team of volunteers, you will also eat very well before, during and after the race. As the Grand Trail Nocturne of the Haut de France will be run at the end of the year this race will be for us the closing of the trail running season. A night that should stay in your memories!

Description:
Percurso por trilhos da Serra de Aire e Candeeiros, muito técnicos e com alguma pedra. Acresce a passagem pelo pinhal do Rei e castelo de Ourém. Os atletas terão a oportunidade de contemplar paisagens magníficas, passando por trilhos criados para o evento. Uma experiência única de corrida, conjugar a natureza com toda a envolvência medieval.
Description in English
Route by rails of the Serra de Aire and Candeeiros, very technical and with some stone. In addition the passage through the pinewood of the King and castle of Ourém. The athletes will have the opportunity to contemplate magnificent landscapes, passing rails created for the event. A unique racing experience, combining nature with all medieval surroundings.

Description: Montanhas e trilhas muito técnicas e desafiadoras e o litoral de testemunha! Após o grande sucesso da etapa da Ilhabela 2016 com as 3 distancias, curta, media e longa, a KTR inova o seu circuito com a introdução da 1a. Ultra Kailash com 80k. Percurso duro e desafiador com trilhas em montanhas e o litoral de fundo na paisagem.

A proposta da KTR Series, é proporcionar aos atletas uma experiência diferente nas montanhas da região serrana da serra da mantiqueira e na Ilhabela. São três opções de percurso: a prova longa, a prova média e a prova curta. A prova longa que tem normalmente 30-40km, é para aqueles que querem superar seus limites de brutalidade.  
Description in English
The proposal for the KTR Series,  is to offer to to athletes a different experience on the mountains and trails of the Serra da Mantiqueira and the Island of Ilhabela.  There are 3 different courses with the main event always having around 30-40k. The main event is for those who wish to overcome its limits of brutality.

A Extremo Sul Ultramarathon – A maior praia do mundo é mais que uma ultramaratona, será também uma porta de entrada para o mais fascinante o belo de  Chuí, Santa Vitória do Palmar e Rio Grande. E a região para além do famoso chimarrão e churrasco, é também natureza pura, tradições, aromas, história e pessoas. Esperamos estar ao nível das expectativas dos participantes. Trabalharemos para que possam desfrutar com tranquilidade e prazer desta grande e magnífica aventura.
Description in English
The Far South Ultramarathon - The largest beach in the world is more than an ultramarathon, will also be a gateway to the most fascinating of the beautiful  Chui , Santa Vitória do Palmar and Rio Grande . And the region beyond the famous mate and barbecue, is also pure nature, traditions, flavors, history and people. We hope to be at the level of expectations of the participants. We will work so that they can enjoy with tranquility and enjoyment of this great and magnificent adventure.

The SkyRun 65 is unique in that it is truly self-supported and self-navigational races, where athletes tackle the remote terrain of the Witteberg Mountain range with a Map a Compass or GPS unit and a back pack containing all there food, water and compulsory equipment that will enable them to survive in this harsh environment.

The SkyRun 38Km will kick off once the winner of the SkyRun 100 finishes. Starting and Finishing at the Wartrail Country Club. Tents are NOT included in the entry, bring your own tent and camp in this is the perfect setting in Wartrail Country where runners, seconds and families can share war stories under the starry-studded sky at Wartrail Country Club.

Description:
L’objectif principal du Costa Rica Trail, La Transtica est de faire découvrir le pays et son mode de vie à travers une compétition sportive à caractère solidaire. Une traversée du Costa Rica en 5 étapes, 200 km de la plage de Manuel Antonio Côte Pacifique, à Manzanillo Côte Caraïbes, une véritable aventure humaine et sportive.Entre deux océans, la course se définit par une traversée unique d’un paradis naturel sur une terre de feu à la découverte de la  culture et des populations locales.Les concurrents, découvriront une faune et une flore exceptionnelle et seront associés des donations de matériel médical et scolaire, moments d’émotions, d’échanges et de partage.Au fil des bivouacs, organisés par les communautés locales, ils sauront apprécier l’accueil des Costa Ricien.Le dépaysement est total, les coureurs sont plongés dans le Costa Rica profond loin des standards touristiquesLe dépassement de soi, l’aide et la solidarité seront l’âme de ce défi, dans un cadre naturel particulièrement exceptionnel, le COSTA RICA.
Description in English
The main goal of the race is to discover the Costa Rica and its way of life and to share this experience with the locals through a sporting competition with humanitarian goals.Between two oceans, the race defines itself by a unique crossing of a natural amazing paradise in the discovery of a new culture and way of life, "Pura Vida".Starting from Pacific Coast to reach Caribbean Coast through amazing and varied landscapes combining beaches, valleys, river crossing, rainforests, coffee trees, sugar cane plantations and palm groves.On the way the competitors, will discover an exceptional flora and fauna and will be associated to donations of medical and school equipment, moments of emotion, exchanges and sharing.During the bivouacs, managed by the local communities, they will enjoy the welcome from Costa Rican people

Tenemos el placer de comunicaros que ya tenemos fechas para la 6ª edición de los 3 días Trail Ibiza - Ultra Ibiza. Este año será los días 29 - 30/11 y 1 de diciembre evitando así la temporada de verano, buscando que los precios para viajar sean más económicos, que los hoteles nos ofrezcan mejores precios y que podías disfrutar de la Isla de Ibiza sin aglomeraciones.Los recorridos serán más técnicos, con más desnivel que años anteriores, ajustándonos a los cambios de ITRA y su puntuación.
Description in English
We are pleased to inform you that we already have dates for the 6th edition of the 3 days Trail Ibiza - Ultra Ibiza. This year it will be 29 - 30/11 and 1 December, thus avoiding the summer season, looking for cheaper travel prices, better prices from hotels and that you could enjoy the island of Ibiza without crowds.The routes will be more technical, with more unevenness than previous years, adjusting to the changes of ITRA and its score.Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator

Back in the day, a small community of lumbermen, dairy farmers, bootleggers and hermits started to develop in the far reaches of the Santa Cruz Mountains above the town of Woodside.  King's Mountain, named after the King family that settled in near Tunitas and Summit Springs grew into a township and a stopover for the tired travelers and working men that made the trek from Redwood City to San Gregorio, just south of Half Moon Bay.The Mountain Brow House run by the King matriarch, Hanora, was a favorite destination for all of them, offering a place for rest, food and drink in a pastoral mountain setting.  For a while up there on Kings Mountain the rowdy spirit of the Gold Rush was still at play with bar room brawls, gambling and the occasional shoot out. But as the dawn of a new century approached the days of the Gold Rush gave way to a new era and the Brow House eventually closed its doors.  Even so, the legend of the Mountain Brow House lives on and you can still revisit the spot where it all took place,Where all runners turn around at the top of Purisima Creek Road, and just across Skyline Boulevard is the site where the long forgotten Brow House once stood.  Sadly you won't get much rest here on your 50k journey through the Purisima Creek Redwoods but we will offer you some much needed aid and hydration to get you through the next 26 miles of this grueling 50K.

Description:
Evento de Trail Running, que se realizará en Villa Cerro Castillo, Aysén, Patagonia, Chile. El próximo 29 de noviembre 2019.Distancias en competencia: 20K - 35K - 50KTendrá un ambienté único, ya que la inscripción contempla 2 noches de alojamiento (desde viernes 29/11 al 1/12) y cenas de ambos días. Esto en el hermoso pueblo de montaña de Villa Cerro Castillo, justo abajo del glaciar el mismo nombre, con 600 habitantes.
Description in English
Trail running event, will take  place in Villa Cerro Castillo, Aysén, Patagonia, Chile. November 29th, 2019.Distances: 20K - 35K - 50KIt will have a unique atmosphere, the entry includes 2 nights accommodation (from Friday 29/11 to 1/12) and dinners of both days. This in the little mountain town of Villa Cerro Castillo, just next to Cerro Castillo Glacier, with 600 inhabitants.
Entry Fee:
35K
Early Ticket: Between USD 208 - 244
Pre Sale: Between USD 254 - 298
Normal: Between USD 284 - 329
*Entry fee, depends wich type of accommodation you choose

Description: The 5th Edition of Mountain-Trail Ultra in Mindanao on the 30th day of November 2019, 12:01am to 8pm @ MAREX Beach Resort, Babak Samal Island, Davao Philippines. Categories into 3 distances, 50 miles (80km), 50kms and 25kms of pure mountain-trail running mixed with dirt-roads. Trail routes are engineered to capture the most amazing scenic view of this island. Mountains, trailporn, peaks, ridges, rocks, cliffs, beaches, blue waters, waterfalls, and spring, all in one race -The Punisher 50!

Es una prueba de Ultra Resistencia con salida en Aguamarga (Níjar) y llegada a Retamar – Toyo, el recorrido propuesto recorre los términos municipales de Nijar (Parque Natural Cabo de Gata–Nijar, Aguamaga, Las Negras, Rodalquilar, Isleta del Moro, San Jose) y Almería ( La Fabriquilla, Cabo de Gata, Retamar-El Toyo).ESTE AÑO LA NOVEDAD es un nuevo circuito adentrandonos en el corazón del PARQUE NATURAL CABO DE GATA-NIJAR terminando en el TOYO – RETAMAR así como la adhesión de la modalidad TRAIL.ULTRA MARATON : Runner   (84,3 Km, D+: 2207 m , D-: 2196 m )MARATON : Runner (43,7 Km, D+: 763 m , D-:760 m)
Description in English
It´s an ultra-endurance competition, starting in Aguamarga (Níjar),  finishing in Toyo-Retasmar (Almería). Choosen route goes across the towns of Nijar (Parque Natural Cabo de Gata–Nijar, Aguamaga, Las Negras, Rodalquilar, Isleta del Moro, San Jose) and Almería ( La Fabriquilla, Cabo de Gata, Retamar-El Toyo).THIS YEAR THE NEW is a new circuit in the heart of the NATURAL PARK CABO DE GATA-NIJAR ending in the TOYO – RETAMAR as well as the adhesion of the TRAIL mode.ULTRA MARATON: Runner (84.3 Km, D +: 2207 m, D-: 2196 m)
TRAIL COSTA DE ALMERIA

The race takes place at Deception Pass State Park which is named for the narrow and dramatic channel of water that separates Whidbey and Fidalgo Islands in the northern Puget Sound. The area is famous for it's rugged coastline, steep cliffs, dense forests and great views. The race covers just about every inch of the park, running at times right at sea level and other times high above on bluffs and hills and twice crosses the pass itself via the historic Deception Pass Bridge which sits about 180 feet above the water.
This race will take runner through 84KM of jungle trail with total elevation of 4500m.
This race cover 2500m of elevation gain over 50KM
This race is a 25KM race covering 930m elevation gain.
This is a fast course with 3 climb with total elevation gain of 350m.

Desafío Pilancones Tunte Trail 2020 ," Caldera de Tirajana" , enorme volcán surgido del centro de la isla hace millones de años formado por los dos inmensos barrancos del sur , Tirajana y Fataga, y de la mano del club Gallotia te anuncian un nuevo reto de recorrer las entrañas de esta isla un recorrido inédito que no te dejará indiferente 
Description in English
Pilancones Challenge Tunte Trail 2020,  "Caldera de Tirajana ", huge volcano emerged from the center of the island millions of years ago formed by the two immense ravines of the South, Tirajana and Fataga, and the hand of the club Gallotia you announce a new challenge to traverse the bowels  Of this island an unpublished tour that will not leave you indifferent

“Aconcagua Ultra Trail” es una competencia internacional que se realiza en el Parque Provincial Aconcagua en la Provincia de Mendoza.Aconcagua Ultra Trail es la máxima expresión del desafío. Con un exigente circuito trazado, con el marco del cerro Aconcagua y una altimetría que puede llegar a superar 4500 mts SNM, este circuito de Trail y Utra Trail se convertirá en uno de los íconos del deporte a nivel mundial.Este evento deportivo de alto nivel está orientado a corredores de Trailruninng de todo el mundo, con certificación del ITRA (International Trailruninng Association) y contará con 5 distancias acordes a los niveles de los distintos corredores.Los circuitos serán de 15K (principiantes), 25k, y las distancias de 38k, 60k y 100k con puntaje oficial del ITRA.El imponente Cerro Aconcagua y la cordillera mendocina con sus maravillosos paisajes, invitan a corredores de todo el mundo a participar de esta carrera de nivel internacional. El desafío está en marcha, enmarcado en un impactante escenario.

Inside the "Crown Jewel" of the Alabama State Park system, this course is very spectator friendly.  With challenging terrain and 6000ft of elevation gain the race is, err... less friendly to it's hopeful competitors. Sweeping lake and mountain bluff views greet runners along the verdant course.

The 50Miles. SallandTrail offers a beautiful natural course over the Sallandse Heuvelrug, in the eastern part of the Netherlands, not far from the German borders. 95% unpaved,  and 900 heightmeters to overcome! Certainly not an easy task, but a wonderful challenge for those trail runners  that are not afraid for a 50Miles trailrun. (-;
